review: Wonderful experience, service, food, and location. Attentive, polite staff and beautiful view. Would highly recommend.

Dubravka 1836 was an absolute win. We scored a table right beside the ocean, and when the breeze got a bit chilly they handed us blankets like we were VIP burritos. The service was perfect. The servers were smiling, friendly, attentive, and somehow managed to be helpful without hovering like seagulls eyeing your fries. You could tell they actually liked their jobs, which was refreshing.

Atmosphere? Check. Stunning view of the ocean, the city walls, and Fort Lovrijenac making me feel like I was in a postcard or possibly a Game of Thrones episode. Then the food arrived and wow. Cooked to perfection, tasted amazing, and looked good enough to make me pause before eating just to appreciate it. The best part? The bill did not make me question my life choices when I checked my bank account the next day.

Highly recommend. Come for the view, stay for the food, and enjoy being wrapped in a blanket like a happy, well-fed tourist.
Friendly, efficient service with a smile. The food was very good and portions were large. Our table was right on the sea wall with great views and the sound of the waves crashing below. Perfect.

Seafood risotto was very tasty. A glass of house white wine was inexpensive and good. The service was excellent Zeljka. It is always a good sign when a restaurant is continually busy. The restaurant has been operating since 1836!
Great meal with amazing views of the city walls. Our host Duje was very friendly and attentive. We’d definitely eat here again.
After some lovely cocktails we had great food. Veal was excellent and the ‘gratinated’ potatoes were delicious. Thanks to Dragan our server.

Beautiful position on the outside of the walls of Dubrovnik.
Lovely service. 
Food delicious. Felt like 'romantic' with lovely views, table cloths, candles etc.

I arrived at this restaurant without a reservation. I was satisfied with the quality of the service, presentation and kindness of the staff. I had grilled squid as the main course and as a dessert I had the cheesecake. Both meals were presented well and cooked perfectly. I do feel that the portion size was small especially from the main course but it doesn’t affect my review. Definitely worth a visit to anyone local to Old Town in Dubrovnik!
The service was very nice and staff are very friendly and knowledgeable. The view and location is spot on. Great place to just relax.

The setting, service and food was very good. We made a reservation to sit at a table along the sea. There during the food festival and their special price fixe menu was delicious. The wait staff was highly efficient.

Very nice staff. Diversified menus and correct prices. More than correct quantity and quality. Well chosen wines. 
Very nice terrace. Zeljka,Niksa and Kristoba are the Best 👍👍👍

Right at the entrance to the old town, very fine exquisite cuisine!
Fine cuisine, particularly friendly service, incredibly beautiful views, highly recommended

Our 3rd visit tonite. We had the veal schnitzel. Superb. Lovely crust and melt in your mouth feel. Great views of the Backwater Bay, the Fort, and the Old Town Walls. Great service from good hard working young people. Great value. Best restaurant in Dubrovnik.

The best place we ate in Dubrovnik!! Loved it that much we even came back 4 times, breakfast, lunch and dinner twice! It was amazing. 

The staff were lovely, the service was second to none. They couldn’t have been nicer 

Also ps. Amazing view both day and evening time

We loved the location. The food. The drinks. Would give it a 4 star but the waiter short-changed us and before my husband could say how much, he said here's 10 Euros. So it was obviously intentional. Just be aware.
View was nice as was staff but let down by food and loud crude guests and we wish we’d left after drinks sadly. We were very excited and we left disappointed

Lovely views and a really nice atmosphere. Our waiter, Dragan, was very polite and friendly. I had the pizza, which was surprisingly good and great value for money—especially considering how overpriced some places around the Old Town can be for what they offer. The restaurant also has a nice, classy touch inside, making it feel extra special. They even serve wine for just €4, which you can’t beat, especially with such a beautiful view!
 5/5 for me overall
Very good dinner, great quality Welcoming, perfect food and wine, we highly recommend this place overlooking the old town fortifications
the service was good, the view was phenomenal. as for food it could have been better. the carpaccio was nice but my main was a disappointment. it was cold and stiff tasteless.
kosta and slagjana provided amazing service ,while quality of the food is in the Michelin two star level,definitely will back to here because of above reasons
We had the most wonderful meal here, Kosta out waiter was so friendly and recommend some lovely suggestions from the menu, vibe was good, views glorious! Highly recommend!
Best place we found to eat in Dubrovnik, the food and service we had was excellent and at affordable prices. Would highly recommend. Also great views!
We were at this restaurant on Sunday. Good Food and Best Service. It is eaten on an indoor or outdoor terrace. As it rained we were in the covered part. All right.
We came here after looking around local restaurants. The food was incredible, the service was wonderful, we had the best views! Fabulous place and Dragan, our server, was great!! Highly recommend.

Visited this restaurant for lunch and was so glad I booked ahead — it’s in a very busy area near the Pile Gate, and every table was taken when we arrived. The service was super quick and efficient, even with how busy it was.

I ordered the burrata pizza, which was absolutely delicious (and very filling!). The real highlight, though, is the incredible view — overlooking the sea with perfect views of Fort Bokar and the Lovrjenac Fortress.

A beautiful setting, great food, and friendly service — definitely worth a visit!

Amazing restaurant. Our waiter Dragan was so polite and so lovely. The food was delicious and the atmosphere was great. It was a chilly evening but we got a heat lamp and a blanket. Really recommend this place!
Great atmosphere,amazing food and fantastic service.The staff were so friendly and efficient.Highly recommend to anyone visiting Dubrovnik!
Great atmosphere, great food and great price. The food was excellent and the waiter was very professional and kind. Great Place

Great location with fantastic views of the Old Town, food was flawless and the waitress offered great recommendations on pairing dishes with wines. Service was faultless as well, very friendly and attentive, refilling our wine glasses for us from the bottle we purchased within seconds of us finishing a glass. Even checked with us that we had a Dubrovnik pass to give us a 10% discount that we had no idea we were entitled to! Would gladly return again, not a cheap meal but definitely more than worth the price.

Restaurants in the old town are overpriced and food is average. We had an okay meal here nothing special. Service was decent and we thought we’d have a great view, but it was also a photo point for tourists so it was blocked most of the time. Avoid the hype and the main touristic areas for the really good food.

Arrived without a booking, so we’re added to the waiting list. A table was offered quickly. We enjoyed the house wine with gratinated steak. Which was cooked perfectly. Probably the best meal we had over a 6 night stay. We attentive waiters even at a busy time.
Wonderful food, excellent service. Nice Mood, excellent music. Beautiful people, fair price and well served

Enjoyed our first meal in Dubrovnik....we had just completed a two hour walking tour of Old Town...and walked the wall...and were so ready for a light meal, glass of wine, and a beautiful view!! The pizza was delicious...I loved my seafood risotto!! We opted for the house white wine which was perfect with our meal. Definitely recommend!

A delicious dinner with Amazing service from Anna! We will definitely be back again!
Booking a table is a good idea however we were lucky to get a table after a 10 minute wait.

We had a seafood risotto and vegetable risotto along with their house wine, bread and cheesecake.
All of the meals were delicious and all are recommended. 
The service was good and the view was exceptional.
The prices were reasonable.

Despite a storm preventing us from sitting out on this restaurants beautiful terrace, we enjoyed a quality meal with a very decent/reasonably priced house red wine and friendly/efficient service. Highly recommend.
Food was perfect and service was incredible. Atmosphere is unmatched. Overall an amazing experience. Would absolutely come back.
Steak was perfectly cooked and wait staff never missed a beat and we're always there when i wanted something. I would highly recommend it
Great service and an excellent location. Waiting staff very attentive. Food very good and not at all expensive compared to the UK
Despite the crowd of tourists, our reserved table was waiting for us. We were served by Irina who was very professional, pleasant, smiling and efficient. We had a great time and had a nice dinner.

The food was very nice.
The portions are good.
The service is amazing.
Definitely a place to visit for a nice lunch or dinner.

This place is near the Pile Gate, so a perfect spot for a lazy lunch or dinner with a view. We went here for both and the food was really great with a simple menu and plenty of choice. It gets busy on an evening, as people come to view the sunset. However the lovely staff managed to get us in, as it seems really popular with people booking well in advance. Luka was a great, friendly server who was very knowledgeable. 
Thank you for making us welcome.
Nice breakfast with a great view of the city walls and fort, the staff was super friendly!!! and the prices are for once fair in this city!!!
The food exceeded my expectations. I had the gravitated beef fillet. It was superb. Other family members also enjoyed their meals.

Luka our server was amazing! 
He answered all of our questions, gave great suggestions and made the experience! The food was phenomenal! Highly recommended the grilled squid.
Delicious food, beautiful view and very good service from our waiter Jasmin. Highly recommended. We will visit again for sure
Our waiter was amazing and the food was delicious. Despite being busy our service was prompt. Would love to come back here again someday
This is the only restaurant in Dubrovnik in which we ate twice in 7 days. The setting (reserve if you want by the wall) is lovely, the staff very helpful and courteous, the food delicious.
Absolutely recommended. Friendly waiter, especially Jasmine. Good food, good service, good environment. Love the view❤️

Good service from Jasmine! Nice and friendly. Good view from the restaurant. We went to 3 branches from this restaurant in one day. Only serve breakfast before 1130am. But we like all kind of fish over here. Recommended.
We really have a great breakfast time in this restaurant. Friendly waiter especially Jasmin, nice atmosphere and great view. Truely recommended here.

Ivan was so pleasant and kind to interact with! He made the best recommendations and suggestion the timing as to when I should order each based on the portion size! I will def be bringing my family here next year and hope we’re lucky enough to be served by Ivan. The atmosphere was exciting and full of energy and movement from the crowd. I was sat right next to the side walk and got to enjoy watching tourists taking pictures by the water.

Beautiful setting. View at sunset sensational. Food was very mediocre. Seafood was not fresh and overcooked. Pork was overcooked and tough. Main dish was served before the first course. Drinks were OK. Go for the view but not the food. 2 stars for the view. 0 stars for the food
Had a sensational dinner sitting on the terrace ar Dubravka - but also come twice for breakfast and coffees. Delicious food and excellent service.

Great service , fantastic location and delicious food. Highly recommend. 
Tip - get there early when they open as it gets very busy quickly

We had booked 3 days in advance and requested a seat beside the sea view. The waitress could not guarantee this but we got off to a good start with an excellent table. We shared the swordfish carpaccio as a starter and it was excellent.
 My wife had octopus which was perfectly cooked.
Fork our last night in Croatia I tried the fish brodet .I was sorry I didn’t try it on my first night. It was one of the best meals I have had on the Dalmatian coast.
Well done to all concerned

This restaurant was recommended to us so we came here for lunch within hours of arriving in Dubrovnik. We enjoyed an amazing pizza and friendly service and were back a few hours later for dinner. We had chicken tagliatelle, seafood risotto and feta salad for dinner. All were wonderful. Highly recommend this place for a gorgeous view and reasonably priced, delicious meals.

Wonderful service! The food this evening and earlier today was wonderful(Americans).
Sifra is an outstanding waiter, prompt, professional, aware. 

We will come back, I highly recommend the location and server!
Dragon provided excellent service and the food was wonderfully fresh and delicious. The local wine Dragon recommended was perfect with our Sea Bass.

I used it on my honeymoon. Jasmine's service was gentle and we had a great time!
The recommended Dubrovnik dishes are also very good and it is a must-visit restaurant when you come to Dubrovnik.
Food and service was so good we came back the next day for dinner at sunset. Kiara was amazing and everything was perfect.

During our stay in Dubrovnik, we had the pleasure of experiencing the Nautika Collection of restaurants, and we were truly impressed with all of them.

Dubravka 1836 Restaurant & Café quickly became our favorite. Since we were staying nearby, we visited often and couldn’t resist their beautifully delicious pizza. The combination of stunning views, welcoming staff, and wonderful food made it a place we returned to again and again.

Panorama Restaurant & Bar was a highlight one evening. We were lucky enough to be seated with a perfect view of the sunset — an unforgettable experience. The food and staff were, once again, outstanding, and the setting was absolutely breathtaking.

Gradska Kavana Arsenal Restaurant & Bar offered yet another gorgeous location with amazing views. The service and food were consistently excellent here as well.

We highly recommend visiting all three of these restaurants — each one offers something special, and together they showcase the best of dining in Dubrovnik. They truly do not disappoint.
Exceptional service, quality food and general all round good vibes. House wine excellent. Pizza gorgeous. Salads exceptional. Pudding delicious

Great service and food !
Great views of ocean and walls 
Can’t go wrong
Number one reviewed restaurant in 
Dubrovnik

Our waiter Jasmin was great with his service and recommendations 

Would definitely visit again
Nice dinner, great setting. I had the salmon, and my husband had the sea bass. Both were wonderful. And you can't beat the setting! Our waiter, Luca was fantastic. Attentive and discerning!
Enjoyed a lovely lunch with stunning views by the water and city walls for my husband’s birthday. Our waiter Jasmin was fantastic, highly recommend for when you’re in Dubrovnik.

Came here after completing the city walls walk and for my birthday lunch - was recommended here by our airbnb host and they delivered! The food, drinks and location are all outstanding, along with incredible service from the wait staff. Will definitely be back
Amazing meal with beautiful view, everything we had was excellent and the staff was extremely nice and welcoming. Zeljka was very nice! Highly recommend!
We had pizzas and a couple of drinks,and everything was superb and waiter Zeljka was extremely kind! Recommend this place!
fantastic food and service -loved out server Kosta . He was amazing and very attentive - we had the vegi pizza and feta salad which i recommend !
10/10 location, view, service, and food. Fantastic staff, perfect environment, great cocktails. Easy walk from Old Town (right outside Pile entrance).

Beautiful restaurant with an amazing view. Yes the food a bit on the higher end but so is the quality of food. In the US we are use to getting some side included with the main dish. Here not so. Just good to know. The service was really good despite being busy. Reserve ahead of time to avoid disappointment

I had great food and kind services in this restaurant. Zeljka especially is friendly and I am so happy for her service. The atmosphere in the restaurant is also wonderful, with stunning views of City Walls next to the table.

Such good food with a great view!!! Our waiter Jasmine was wonderful and provided great service. I will reccomend this place to all of my friends and will definitely be coming back for future trips! Thank you Jasmine!
Thank you, jasmine for your great service. Our meal was delicious and the view is amazing. Great prices and food… We sat here for hours. Couldn’t recommend more!!!!

Very helpful staff and rather prompt Service.
We went there for dinner. The view is breathtaking especially as we sat on the edge.
We opted for an assortment of seafood, fish, a mocktail, a herbal potato gratin, two desserts (a pie with a scoop of ice cream and a split banana.
Quality: it was frankly good, well prepared, good fresh produce. 
Quantity: very satisfactory.
Value for money: correct. for two courses, two desserts, a mocktail, a herbal potato gratin, the rating is 93 euros. It's not given in absolute, but the stunning views as well as the quality and quantity cuisine seem to justify this price.
I recommend this restaurant!
Chose this for 50th Wedding Anniversary meal and we were not disappointed. Lovely food, good service and lovely atmosphere overlooking the sea and city walls. An evening to remember.
Nice place restaurant & great view to the sea. Dinner - Foods was alright as no much flavour in. Good service. Nice waiter.
Such a nice experience to be able to enjoy the delicious food by the water with amazing views. Must try if in Dubrovnik and close to old town
Great customer service, excellent food and beautiful views. Jasmine took great care of us! Take your time to eat and enjoy!

We had a beautiful evening at Dubravka with an exceptional view of the Fort this restaurant boasts a delicious menu the food was stunning and the staff were amazing especially Kosta he was so helpful, very polite and had a lovely presence

Certainly one of the best restaurants in Dubrovnik.
We had a really excellent dinner. We tried to book but no reservations were available - however the helpful staff on the phone recommended that if we arrived early (7:30) they would find us a table - and they did!
It has a wonderful seafront location with views of the castle walls. A great place to enjoy a meal as the sun goes down.
The menu has something for everyone - the food was all excellent.
The waiting staff were charming and very good at their jobs - very attentive and helpful.
It was a nice touch that they brought complimentary glasses of slivovitz with dessert.
Not cheap, but good value

What an excellent last night in Dubrovnik!
Food was to die for, every single person at the table agreed it was the best meal we had all week. Prices are worth the quality, views (in daylight and night) are so special, dessert is a must (recommend the apple pie) 🥧 

The waitress was very attentive and made sure we were looked after and toped up with wine. Thank you all for an highly memorable night x

Jasmin was extremely gracious host to us. We were here to celebrate my wife's birthday. They got us great seating and were very timely and efficient. Jasmin made the experience very memorable and gave us some great tips along with some great conversation. Would highly recommend!

Gibi was our server and he was excellent! Friendly, welcoming and helpful! We ordered the fish stew which was amazing. The seafood risotto was perfectly al dente and you could taste the sea! So so good. I’d say the only let down was the sea bass fillet. No doubt food is pricey but overall 5/5 experience and would happily come back in future! Also you have to order their apple pie!
Gibi was an excellent server. Stunning views, with GREAT food. 10/10 would recommend the seafood risotto and the apple pie. Toilets were also 5 stars.

Perfect setting plus terrific food ! Be sure to make a reservation because this restaurant is very busy. our server, Luka, took excellent care of us! The apple pie is NOT to be missed, you’ll thank me later🍎

Wonderful...
Restaurant overlooking the sea.
Top staff.
They make you feel great for the duration of dinner.
We would stay again right away. 
Thank you.

We were in Dubrovnik for 6 days and ate in this restaurant twice- and also visited for drinks on another occasion. We both enjoyed pizza and the service was first class. We plan to revisit Dubrovnik in future and will definitely be back

Was heading to the old town to beat the crowds and this one had an 8am opening and looked a great view and start to the day. The 1A, B or C bus from the station drops you right outside before it turns back. 
Had a black American coffee with asparagus omelette. Spot on, not greasy. Very fresh. Waiter was great.

I booked, but wasn’t that busy at 8am. Midday it was rammed

Nice location, good food, pizza for children if needed, very nice! 
Prices are as everywhere, a high pru, but quality is worth them.
Delicious !!!! Excellent Service!! They attended us very kindly. We ordered different pastas and entrees and all delicious.
Beautiful view and great food and drinks! Lovely for all ages and I love how beautifully everything is arranged. Great for if you’re going to or coming from Fort Lovrijenac.
Ana is so kind and professional, everything was excelent and food was amazing and brilliant, landscape on the old city castle was wonderful!!!
Amazing place, unbeatable Service. Ana, our waitress, a 10. Great food, especially scalope. Everything perfect

Very Beautiful restaurant. Very nice and very patient servers!! (Dealing with hungry travelers to their beautiful city.) 
The Margarita pizza was perfect and just what I needed. The water views are Amazing!

Duje, my server, was excellent and super friendly. Please go visit him if you are in the area!!
Breakfast was lovely, my experience was v chill - with Anna attentive, warm and giving me excellent space to relax. The surroundings and view were wonderful
Exceptional experience in Dubravka, the entire menu is worth exploring, delicious food, kind staff and amazing service, will be returning again for sure!

If you're looking for a restaurant in Dubrovnik that delivers both beautiful scenery and a culinary experience to match, this place is a must-visit. Perched above the shimmering Adriatic, the view alone is worth the reservation.
But the real magic begins when the food arrives. The Dalmatian ham was a standout: delicately sliced, perfectly cured, and rich with flavor that speaks of tradition and care. The steak was equally impressive—succulent, expertly cooked, and seasoned to perfection. And the grilled squid was spectacular. Tender, it was easily one of the best seafood dishes I’ve had in Croatia.
Service was impeccable throughout the evening. Davor struck the perfect balance—attentive and warm without ever hovering. He seemed genuinely proud of the food he served.
Whether you're celebrating something special, (which they noted and provided the most perfect ending) or simply want to treat yourself to an unforgettable meal, this restaurant offers a slice of Dalmatian heaven. Highly recommended.

Davor the best waiter 
Service was great three things to write so make it short.
Davor’s suggestion for the wine matched out pallet perfectly! Beautiful experience all round!
Good food and good service....service was also very very excellent....The area or place is also wondeeful! Very recommendable place if you are hungry and thirsty

We had the seafood risotto, great. A pizza to be divided into four for reinforcement, more than adequate, a banana split, good. The house wine deserves. If you pass by and want to treat yourself to a little cuddle, stop here.
Jasmin was a great waiter. We highly love his food reccmendations. The food is delicious and services is amazing! We highly recommend a visit!

The food was wonderful- light and tasty. Jasmin provided exceptional service. I have a gluten allergy and he even brought me a plate of GF bread. Very courteous and professional. You need to eat here.

My partner and I had an evening meal here in early July 2025.
The location is right next to the entrance to the walled old town with a great view over the sea.
The service was good and the food was excellent. We both had the beef gratin. 
Slightly pricey but this is expected in this type of location. 
I would highly recommend a visit.
Beautifull terace with astonish view , food are well prepared and tasty , service was very good. Nice place to have dinner and relax after hot day .
Absolutely the best service and food! Thank you to Jasmin! Fabulous care and attention to detail! It’s a must in Dubrovnik!
Really good food and nice service. Pricy but place like this is never cheap. So if you are looking for a place to have romantic dinner. That's the place I think should be chosen.
Jasmin, great server, very friendly and let us change tables. Excellent food, good shade and amazing view. We were also seated very quickly

We visited Dubravka 1836 in the late afternoon. It was the ideal time to take in the breathtaking views of the city walls while enjoying a wonderful meal. We were immediately impressed by the way the staff were attentive and friendly, making our meal even more enjoyable. Our stop at the restaurant served as a fantastic starting point before our leisurely stroll down Stradun and a beautiful sunset boat ride around Dubrovnik.

A very good breakfast at a reasonable price!
The restaurant offers a simple but complete formula, with fresh and well presented products. The coffee is good, the pastries are crispy and the juice pleasant. Service is fast and smiling, making the experience even more enjoyable. Excellent value for money to start the day well, I highly recommend!

Amazing view, amazing food and amazing staff! Would highly recommend :) the host Jasmin was so lovely, that we came here twice(which we never do as we love to try new places each day) so exceptional! Come early to get a table with sea views!
We walked by here several times, and finally stopped in for a late afternoon spritz under a tree. Stunning view overlooking the walls and sea. Aperol spritz was so refreshing. Just lovely.
Another fantastic meal with this restaurant group. Kosta was a wonderful server and the food was excellent. Highly recommend here and the other 2 sister restaurants.

Beautiful experience. Food was fantastic, I had the salmon and my partner had the chicken breast. Service was fast. Drinks were good, little bit expensive but that’s Dubrovnik! The view was incredible. Cannot recommend enough, super nice!!!

Really good restaurant just outside the Walls of Old Town Dubrovnik. Staff was very conscientious and nice and the food was excellent. I had the tortellini with prosciutto and truffle and for about 20 euros I was shocked to how good it was and how much trouble they added to the dish. Would highly recommend . My wife and kids had some different pizzas which were both delicious as well.
Beautiful service , elegant and formal. English breakfast really good for quality and price. I suggest you tò come over there you won't be disappointed

Utility service. We ordered “Hot starters” as the main dish (the portions are large). I recommend “seefood risoto” and “tortilini with trufle and pruchutto”. Our waiter was absolutely super and gave very good recommendations! The apple pie was very good! Just a short walk through the old town and you're there. Ask for a table outside and enjoy the fine views at sunset.

Fantastic food. And even better service. The food came out quickly and was just amazing. Definitely recommend if in Dubrovnik. 
The sea perch was to die for.

During the journey of 20 days, the best omelet, fantastic views and friendly and experienced servers made Jasmin a place to come back.
I can't! 👍👍👍👍

Great restaurant in a lovely and very picturesque spot just outside the old town walls. It is an exceptionally busy area, tour groups, taxi drop offs and pick ups etc and I recommend booking to avoid a wait. Very varied menu, service was excellent.. fast and attentive. Highly recommend.
Food was delicious and our sever Luka was great! Beautiful restaurant, a must go! We ordered the steak, lasagna and truffle tortellini and everything was amazing.
Awesome view, great service. Lavender spritz and fish stew was Devine, absolutely delicious. Then the chocolate bowl for dessert.
After a Good Welcoming we ate very well! The main advantage of this restaurant is of course the splendid view of the walls of dubrovnik and Fort Lovrijenac. I highly recommend!

lovely place by the castle and in bustling area. The food was lovely and service was excellent.
prices are reasonable for the venue
Good food, nothing outstanding, great view of the old town and castle, but in the great crowds, nice service, very fair prices

On our first night in Dubrovnik we went to dinner in Dubravka 1836 and this immediately gave us the right breathtaking feeling of Dubrovnik. A prime location with views of the Pile gate and Lovrjenac Fortress. The food was of very good standard and the service was also great there with the necessary kindness and humor. We rightly give this restaurant five stars and definitely recommend it to anyone visiting Dubrovnik. Tip: have the super tasty Fish Stew!

I had the best experience at this restaurant! The view was the best in the city, and the prices were very reasonable for the location. Our server (didn’t get his name) gave us the best service, he was so kind and helpful! I highly recommend the truffle and prosciutto pasta.
The view from the terrace is amazing, atmosphere very nice and Dragan, our server, was attentative and friendly. Would recommend!
Really good pizzas and drinks, and perfect location. We got a table every night even without a reservation. Really helpful staff

Just the most magical setting and the most impeccable service! Huge thanks to the team at Dubravka for a wonderful evening with special thanks to Anita for her customer service which goes above and beyond! This family of restaurants is a must if u are travelling to Dubrovnic!
We were group of 6. Great food & wine. Great service, amazing location. Thank you Jasmin and Anita for great experience. We will come again.
Stunning sea terrace overlooking Lovrijenac, Bokar and ancient city walls – perfect location right at the Pile gate.

We loved this restaurant, perfect location at the gate to the Old Town, and the view was amazing over the sea. We had the seafood risotto and pepperoni pizza and would rate each one 10/10! Prices were reasonable.
Book just before sunset to enjoy the best view

The restaurant enjoys an exceptional position just outside the Pile Gate to the Old Town with amazing views of the walls, fortress and the sea, and one might think they'd be tempted to capitalise on their good fortune either in terms of high pricing or corner-cutting. This is most assuredly not the case at Dubravka. Everything we ate was beautifully presented and delicious - in particular the tuna salad starter and fish stew. Service was perfect - professional, friendly and well-paced. The house white wine (by the litre/or half litre carafe) was also excellent. Portions are generous and pricing is extremely reasonable considering the location.
We had originally tried to make a booking online but found availability seemed extremely limited, but when we enquired in person at the front desk we were easily able to book for the evening we wanted - and were also lucky enough to be allocated a table on the terrace adjacent to the wall overlooking the sea with lovely views, so a perfect meal all round.
Definitely a must-visit restaurant!

We dined here 3 times during our multiple days stay in old town Dubrovnik. It is at a perfect location: near the city wall, the Lovrijenac Fortress, and the Pile Gate entrance. The patio is under shade of many large umbrellas, with large fans going, just comfortable even on a warm summer day. They have the market on a million dollar view to the gorgeous Adriatic Sea. The staff is super friendly and efficient. We never made reservations, and yet they've always had a table for us. Feel very special and welcome each time.

They serve breakfast until 11:30 am and the omelets were very nice. We also got a pizza for lunch one day, generous size and fresh ingredients. One evening we stopped here just for dessert! We tried the Dubrovnik famous rozata - it is similar to crème caramel, custard pudding, or flan (although we think it is lighter than a flan). Wish we had room to each enjoy the rozata and not shared; it was divine.

Very good experience since we do not like to repeat a restaurant while on vacation. Excellent job!

Everything is worth the Service, the view and the fish and the great variety. In the letter. Tortellini pasta with extraordinary truffle, very good pizzas and fish as they can only be served in Dalmatia

Good food, excellent view. Great for lunch. Fresh food. We had a quick lunch right before entering the old town, as it is by Pile Gate and it was perfect. The staff was very attentive and service was quick. I had a fresh grilled chicken salad, my husband had the grilled octopus. Just what we needed to keep us going. The view of part of the wall that surrounds the Old Town and the fort that stands right outside on a cliff and the water below, ask for a table right against the balustrade: is really lovely.
We had an amazing time, food was delicious and our waiter Kosta was very friendly. The place has a splendid view on an old city and Adriatic sea.

The place is amazing, amazing views, very nice waiters, excellent meal. This is our first trip to Croatia and after testing several restaurants this one is really perfect. I recommend it to you. Less affordable than some but worth the price

We were recommended this restaurant by a local tour guide, and it turned out to be a fantastic suggestion. The terrace was the perfect spot to dine with beautiful views. Although the restaurant was busy, the staff were very friendly and we never felt rushed. The seabass was cooked to perfection. We would highly recommend it!

My partner and I dined at your restaurant on July 1st, 2025. The terrace setting was idyllic, offering breathtaking views of the Dubrovnik fortress and city.
We were particularly delighted with the service provided by Ivan Raguz (Gigo), whose kindness and professionalism truly stood out. We also want to extend our thanks to Niko, who assisted us with our celebratory cake and even captured a wonderful photograph of us.

While we also enjoyed meals at Gradska K Arsenal during our stay, our overall dinner experience at Dubravka was elevated than GKA due to the impeccable service from the staff! We wholeheartedly give Dubravka a 10/10 rating and recommend it without reservation to anyone visiting the beautiful city of Dubrovnik.
Amazing restaurant, food was delicious, best stake I have ever had. Our waitress Slagjana was really friendly. Would highly recommend!
This is a very nice restaurant just by the gate to Old Town. Visited here twice during our holiday. Ate different seafood dishes with great experience.

This restaurant is right across the street from the Hilton. We were walking by and stopped for dinner. The have a patio as well as a dining room. We chose the dining room after they led us out to the patio next to screaming children. 

 We had a good feta salad to share, lasagna for me a similar pasta for my husband. Similar to Gradska Kavana Arsenal, as we later found out has the same owners. Food was fair, not great. Service also, ok not great, the place was very busy. 

There were 2 tables, each with 8 or more people. One was all women and children, the other all men. We have seen this since and guess that the men like to sit together and the women and children separately. They were fine except one of the women was smoking. We were told inside restaurants smoking was not allowed. No one said a word to her. The smell of smoke was annoying. We skipped dessert because of this and walked back to the Hilton.

2days ago I had lunch at Dubravka Restaurant in Dubrovnik with my friend, and everything was simply perfect. We had the sea bass and brodet, both dishes were absolutely delicious and fresh. What truly made our experience special was our lovely waitress Željka – her warm attitude, attentiveness, and kindness really made us feel welcome. The service was more than excellent. Highly recommend this place for a memorable meal with a stunning view!
Gorgeous views, great service and excellent food! Highly recommend the cheese starter and the grilled squid. Pizza’s were also excellent
Wonderful food great service. You must make a reservation here. Food is one of our best meals in Croatia. We had the lasagne and the meat pizza. Drink menu is great

Ivan was a wonderful server. He was extremely kind and had great recommendations of the menu. The view was terrific. On a very hot summer evening, the breeze outside the gates with the fans made the evening so enjoyable. My sons love the sea bass filet and steak. The pizzas were similarly delicious

This restaurant was wonderful beautiful setting just as you enter the old town, nice views, great friendly staff and service and delicious food I ordered the sea bass and potato gratin and my husband ordered a pizza and fries, a wonderful birthday meal for my husband would definitely recommend

Best service we have received in Dubrovnik- very attentive waiters who would top up glasses (water and wine). The view is unreal. The food is very reasonably priced considering the view and that it is just outside the old town. Food was unbelievable as well.

After a wonderful walking tour of Dubrovnik we opted for lunch at Dubravka 1836. It is located right outside the old city and has beautiful views of the water or the city walls! The food was delicious and our the service especially our waiter Mario was fantastic!!
Excellent restaurant, top service, very decent prices for Dubrovnik. Very good pizzas, risottos.We highly recommend. Located at the foot of the ramparts , very nice in the evening.

We came to dinner here three nights in a row because it has an unbeatable location with beautiful views, a relaxed and elegant atmosphere, and friendly service.

The food is delicious, I recommend truffle pancakes and burrata salad.

Best meal and a service in a while. Mario was my waiter and Catherine was helping him. 

I can just say, WOW!!!
I was felt so welcomed. 
Thanks for everything, can’t wait next visit!!!

This place is super cozy in the evening and has an amazing view. The staff is really friendly, and it’s a big plus that they speak English well. I have some food allergies, but they handled everything perfectly, no issues at all.
This is a restaurant with an amazing view. You can see the old town walls. Food was also very good. Strongly recommend to visit.
Beautiful first lunch in Dubrovnik with family. Delicious food and amazing view of the fort and sea. Great service too.
Beautiful restaurant with insane views!!!! Kosta was the best waiter we ever had to date!! he made the experience way more enjoyable! THANK YOU KOSTA ❤️❤️

We were in Dubravka for dinner for two. It was a wonderful evening, we enjoyed cocktails, we ate salmon, bitek, burata, octopus salad, with various side dishes. A perfect five for the restaurant managers Ivan and Niksa, who provided us with a wonderful place to enjoy, the food is, in a word, pure fantasy.

I booked reservations at this restaurant prior to our Croatia trip. It did not disappoint. The location is fabulous beside the Pile gate, and the atmosphere is wonderful. We all had a light dinner and drinks, but there are many great menu choices.
First night after airport. Just outside the old town. Perfect if it’s hot. The food is good. The view is beautiful.

An outstanding restaurant visit! Very friendly and helpful staff. We had cheese tray for starter and grilled seabass with grilled vegetables for main course, everything tasted fantastic. In addition, the location on Dubravka is hugely beautiful, we had asked for tables by the water and got it. Can really recommend a visit here!
Amazing foods and atmosphere! Definitely recommend. Perfect for any occasions like celebration, light meals, bars, etc.

Very nice experience last night at Dubravka 1836! I did not have a reservation but was kindly told that I could wait about 15 minutes to have a table, which was the case. I had the fish stew, it was very good - don't forget the bread to enjoy the delicious broth to the last drop. Service was professional and curteous, I was given good suggestion on which wine to pair my meal with. I am so glad I decided to try this beautiful restaurant by the walls and the sea! The general vibe was fantastic.

We had a lovely dinner outside with an amazing view of the walls, the water and the castle! The octopus salad is not to be missed. We also got the cheese board with local cheeses and ham and olives. The sea bass and potatoes gratin were also delicious! 
I know it seems touristy but worth the view!

The scenic location immediately adjacent to the Old City walls and the pristine Adriatic Sea are really eye-catching. The food was impeccably prepared and presented. The Smoky Old Fashioned and the Spicy Mojito cocktails are both well worth trying. The waitstaff are efficient, personable, helpful, and gracious. We would definitely return if we ever are in Dubrovnik again.
Ideal location right on the water. Good pizza. Came for a special lunch on a beautiful day and really enjoyed. Would def recommend!

With an excellent location, at the bottom of Brsalje Square, a few steps from Pile Gate. A wonderful view of the walls and the Adriatic Sea. The service is very good from all the waiters. The food is very good, we ordered a pizza Frutti di mare, Prosciutto, a Beef carpaccio; to drink wine from the house. All on point and very rich. Fair prices. Worth it

We came here on a whim, as we happened to be nearby. 
The food was spectacular, drinks were really good, the ambience and views are fantastic. 
We told them we were there for a couple of drinks first, our servers, Martja, perfectly respected this, told us to flag her when we were ready to eat. 
She was spot on the entire time. 
House white wine is tasty as well
We love it here- gorgeous view and charming pigeons for company! Plus delicious cocktails and a tasty meal- what more could you ask for?

Amazing experience 
It s beatifull pleace and the personal is very lovely and amablity people 
The night it s a love moment with friends

Great restaurant with great ambiance and views. Came here for date night and everything was as reviewed if not better. Service was exceptional. Food was some of the best we had on the trip. Definitely a go to spot, but book a reservation in advance if you want a table next to the water!
We are extremely grateful for our special dinner! Hot recommendation for everyone. Food & drinks are tasty and the waiter Dario is amazing!

We had very good table next to the wall for 4 people, we had amazing waiter called Dario and he made our dinner experience unforgetable. He is experienced and propose arangement to our table based on the dishes we ordered. Food and service is 5/5 star!

excellent view, very good food, friendly staff & good drinks
really enjoyed the stay here and can definifely recommend!
Fantastic food with a great view. Had the salmon and was cooked to perfection. Would recommend. Staff was also friendly and very attentive.
Spectacular meal and even better setting. Food could not have been better. Would give it 6 stars if possible. Will deodorant visit again before our holiday ends.

This is by far the best restaurant we went to in Dubrovnik, to be honest the foods been pretty poor everytime we've eaten except here. I had the beef and my wife the sea bass, both were tasty, the location was perfect, wine good and our young waiter couldn't have been any better (table 208 on Sunday 15th if your manager reads this) It's the only place I would recommend in the city.

Service was excellent- so attentive and engaging! 
Delicious food - the best we have had in Dubrovnik (& Croatia!) plus location was everything - great views of the wall -sits just outside the Old Town. Great recommendations from the wait staff re wine & food as well.

The location, food, and service at this restaurant are absolutely amazing. Željka is wonderful—super friendly and kind. This is my second time here, and I will definitely be coming back. It’s a must-visit in Dubrovnik!
Beautiful spot with a lovely view, service was very fast and friendly. We had the omelette and bacon and eggs, both very nice and comes with breads and selection of spreads.

We found this restaurant, next to the wall, perfect for a couple or family dinner, a very good atmosphere. 
We were attended by Darío, a waiter who recommended us very well when choosing and very nice made sure that our cup would always be full.
Dinner was spectacular we asked for a starter to share and two seconds, the chipirones were the best and the octopus was very good.
For dessert they recommended the apple pie, a great hit 
Overall it was a perfect dinner
Really polite service and the vibe is really great. Plus the service is really great zeljka is an awesome host. Really enjoyed our drinks

Zelda was a great waitress and helpful choosing a great meal. 
The location was great, just outside the old city wall. The view was spectacular.

We always end our holiday with a meal here on the last night. Once again the meal was excellent and service friendly. We also come here most other nights for drinks and sometimes cake. The selection of cake is really good and the smokey old fashioned is still the best i've had anywhere. The service each time was excellent and the ambience of the place is great. Here remains a Dubrovnik favourite!

I must start by saying that this review is of our feelings about our meals, and not the way the manager handled these, which was very professional and much more than we expected.

I am afraid we found the veal schnitzel very dry, the salmon fillet hardly cooked in the centre, the Swiss chard potatoes a ‘mush’ and the potato gratin not particularly fresh.

Seeing our half eaten meals the waiter asked if all was OK and when we, politely, explained he immediately fetched the manager. We explained again and the manager offered alternatives. We said ‘thank you’ but we just wanted the bill and he refused to let us pay anything. We offered to pay again, but he insisted that there would be no payment and also gave us a discount card should we return to that, or one of their partner restaurants.

Throughout this he apologised and was courteous and professional. 

The only comment I would make is that the manager said the Swiss chard potatoes should look like that. I looked up the dish online, afterwards, to see lovely cubes of potato on lightly cooked dark green Swiss chard - not the slightly luminous green ‘mush’ with indistinguishable contents we were served (which is also commented on in another review), so this dish may be worth a rethink.

There are many, many reviewers who praise this restaurant so, maybe, we were unlucky.

Definitely the best restaurant in Dubrovnik: we've been here three times.
I've been the kind of person to have a best restaurant-but Dubravka 1836 changes all of this!
Forget about the restaurants in the Old City, this one is just outside the old city-very close to the Pile Gate and the food is incredible, and the staff friendly and very well trained.
The food was of excellent quality and delicious, and very good portion size.
The location-if you're sitting outside is magical no matter where you sit.
We had a pizza the first time we came to Dubrovnik and it was delicious.
We came to dine here on our last night in Dubrovnik and the meal was memorable, it was Schnitzel with chard mash and it was delicious. 
It was close to sunset and sitting outside, we felt the magic of the city as the sun went down. But it wasn't just that, the staff made it memorable by being kind, attentive and caring.
Don't waste time and money in restaurants in the old city, it's really not worth it, come here instead.
Couldn’t fault this beautiful restaurant. Staff amazing, especially Kosta. Apple pie and ice cream to die for!! Wish we’d come at start of our trip, not the end.

I came to this restaurant after eating at Panorama Dubrovnik as its is part of the same group and offered a 10% discount to all their restaurants. 
Stunning location on the outside of the old town looking at the walls very friendly service though I had to ask my order to be taken and for my bill food came relatively quickly. I had asked to make a reservation mid morning they said they were full but come back later so I did and got a seat no problems.
The food portions were good and well priced for Dubrovnik. I had a seasonal salad which was fresh and flavoursome and seafood risotto which was incredibly tasty with a good amount of seafood. I would recommend eating here and come again if in Dubrovnik

Super accommodating and friendly staff. Food is such high quality and priced well for the area. It is part of a group of 4 restaurants within Fubrovnik, all easily accessible from the old town and we were given a voucher for 10% off dining at any of their sites when we paid. Definitely recommend for an evening meal as there is a gorgeous sea view
The staff was very very polite, kind and friendly. Nice atmosphere, good food and extra ordinary service. Highly recommend 👌
Great restuarant with a nice view towards the sea and the walls. Booked ahead via website to get a table by the edge, very nice food - would return.
Super tasty food (cheese plate as starter, grilled octopus as main course), very friendly service and great views of the city walls.

This is a fantastic restaurant in a great location with a simple menu at good prices. All 4 of us really enjoyed our meal and were surprised how good value it was. You can get a glass of wine got €4 which seems to be a bargain for Dubrovnik old town! Great service too.
Atmosphere, food, beverages, and staff are outstanding. Highly recommend dining here. If you're lucky, Dario will be your waiter. Genuinely a nice guy who made us feel welcome. Thumbs way up!

Went for dinner here in the evening and managed to get a table for 2 outside on a walk in despite it being fully booked online. Great views at night and the food even better. The hot starters are enough as a main meal so don’t go wild ordering one of those and a main, you won’t need it! Staff were attentive in the right ways.
It is a very nice nice restaurant, very good and affordable, the staff very quiet and no stress from the real holiday

A nice spot for lunch or dinner; with views out over the sea and out of the business of the old town. We ordered pizzas which were rustic in style. They were good but very large and one pizza was too much for one person. The restaurant was reasonably priced for Dubrovnik. The only downside is we saw that others with pizza’s were offered a pizza cutter to aid cutting the pizza, we didn’t know this was an option until we had almost finished. After our pizza’s we went round to the other side of the restaurant where there was an ice cream bar. We had ice cream from here every day we were in Dubrovnik, exploring a range of different flavours! All were great and the girls working in there were all lovely, we were actually served by the same girl each day who greeted us with such pleasure at seeing us again!

Varied menu. My partner and I both had pizzas. I had a seafood pizza while he went for something meatier. Both were fresh, tasty and cooked perfectly. What made our great experience is the amazing view you get. Would recommend.

We came to the restaurant without a reservation and were warmly welcomed. On the recommendation of our waitress Željka, we ordered the grilled octopus and the Dalmatian steak with Swiss chard and boiled potatoes. Everything was perfect – the best dinner we had in Dubrovnik! Željka made our evening even more special by kindly answering all our questions. We highly recommend this restaurant and will definitely be coming back!

Beautiful panoramic location, elegant, polite and friendly staff. The food, however, is average and the menu poorly articulated and lacking in terms of typical dishes of the area. The presentation of the dishes, in my opinion, is also basic. The price is mainly related to the location and, above all, if you book a table near the panoramic side.

Restaurant on a small square, overlooking the sea, just before entering the old town. Good local food, very friendly and efficient service, lower prices than restaurants in the city. A good choice at a very nice place.
Excelent , very friendly and Nice food. Beautiful tarrace and Nice atmosfere. Plave were you can fill Dubrovnik . Very recomended.

Amazing food in an amazing setting. Service was first class. Zeljka looked after us so well. She gave us great recommendations and looked after us so well. Food was fantastic. They say you eat with your eyes and the food presentation was superb. Well recommended
Lovely place with a beautiful view. Delicious food and amazing staff. We ate here on three occasions. The waitress remembered us after the first time and treated like regulars. Highly recommend
The carpaccio was very good. Juraj was very polite and super friendly. Top recommendation. Good price performance ..........
Beautiful view and excellent food! Mario was our waiter and was fabulous! We loved the Dubrovnik mule and the old-fashioned.
Good food great services. It's just across from Naautica restaurant so the view is also breathtaking. We did have to wait for a table.

Great food, good service and spectacular scenery. We had the Salmon and the Steak followed by beautiful cheesecake with cranberry sauce.
Quick efficient service and a lovely end to our holiday.

I reserved a table in advance for my partners birthday, they were very accommodating. We had a wonderful meal and the service was so lovely. We were both very impressed with the food and went back again our stay.

Service was perfect and kindly. 
We celebration our 50th Birthday and they wanted suprised us, we got Birthday cakes slides. Beefsteak was perfect.
Had a wonderful evening with a lovely waitress name Matija The food was so lovely as well as the overall vibe. Would recommend!!!!!!
Matija was a lovely waitress and attentive and funny. Food was also lovely, would recommend to anyone in Dubrovnik! Thank you so much
Food was nice, tasty and staff were very friendly. Nothing too much of a hassle for them. Ordered food and arrived promptly and efficiently

Lovely place for a drink, such a nice view of the sea and looking into the old town We didn’t eat but the food looked and smelled lovely too. All of the staff were so friendly and welcoming, especially Juraj who was lovely ☺️

Youcip the manager and waiter Dover and hostess recognized us on each visit. We ate here 4x during our visit & super consistent each time. We had Octopus, truffle tortellini, beef steak, squid dish- all perfect! Views were historic and we simply loved great attentive service. Make reservation to get best view. House wine great value and good quality - also had vodka Martini very crisp!
Fantastic location consistent service consistent wonderful food. We have gone three times and each time the meal was fantastic.
This was the best food I’ve had in a long time we are on a Europe cruise and I went to Italy and ate pizza and this was better than any place I ate in italy

We ate dinner and breakfast here. For dinner, I had the sea bass, and my husband had the pepperoni pizza - both dishes were very good. The side dish of grilled vegetables was large, with a wide variety of vegetables-awesome tasting. This restaurant is very reasonably priced given the location, view, food, and service. Our server gave us a 10% off coupon for return visits, so we came back for breakfast. We both had omlettes, and they were super tasty and came with a variety of breads. The servers were very nice. Don't miss this gem of a restaurant.

Went there excitedly to get some gelato. The servers, all three of them were so rude and had such attitude. Seeing as how Dubrovnik, and the whole of Croatia host many tourists all year round, I had expectations for better customer service. The cherry on top was when I didn’t have the correct change and they had to break my 20. Being visibly annoyed with a paying customer because they’re not carrying around coins is not the way to go. Not happy and massively disappointed by their behaviour.
This restaurant is positioned just outside the old city walls of Dubrovnik. It is very clean. A good choice of menu. The staff are very good. The food was excellent.

Very nice view 
Very good pressed orange juice 
Cocktail also and good choice of local wines 
Good squid and pizza also 
Only negative point unpleasant server

The service from Ivan tomic was first class and friendly the view and food was excellent 
We will definitely be back and recommend to others
Just wonderful we ate here one evening and one lunchtime food and drink was great and excellent service would definitely recommend a visit

Honestly the best restaurants we ever tried! Me and my friends we came to Croatia from London to spend 3 nights and all the 3 night we stayed we ate in this restaurant for 3 days in a row and we had lunch and dinner. Congratulations to this chef on this place! All the mains, deserts and drinks were absolutely fantastic!!!! I would definitely recommend this restaurant if you’re going to Dubrovnik! 🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩
We had an amazing meal, highly recommend the Mezze Minache pasta dish and we sampled several delicious cocktails. The service was wonderful.

Nice service in this nice restaurant with a great view
Very well received very good dishes has really good prices compared to what is practiced next door 
A nice surprise 
If you want the tables facing the sea better reserve
Beautiful view of the city wall and the sea, great service from the friendly staff. The food and wines are also very good.

An absolutely beautiful setting just outside the old town wall. Service is friendly and first class. Prices are not higher than the average in Dubrovnik. We had a pizza for 16 Euros and it was a perfect share for two adults 60+. We accompanied it with a well prepared Greek salad. Wine and all food items were priced reasonably and the setting was amazing.

Zeljka is fantastic! She was amazing at her job and brought us delicious drinks, I had the spicy mojito and one of the best pizzas I have ever had! It was the Quattro formaggi. I highly recommend this restaurant!

A wonderful restaurant, by the sea and the walls, with a great service (Matja was a great and pleasant host) and fantastic food, for a quite reasonable price. An experience not to be missed when in Dubrovnik!
Delicious food in a beautiful setting! Would highly recommend. I had lasagna and side salad and my husband had gratinated beef fillet which we both really enjoyed.
Amazing view, amazing food, and amazing service! Our sever, Gibi, was great! Great recommendations and gave us plenty of time to enjoy the beautiful restaurant.

Great little place for a quick bite after a nice walk around the old city.

Menu is a bit limited but quality is decent. Friendly staff. Fair prices. 

Good deserts and cappuccino. 

Pizza is OK.
Absolutely friendly service, Very good and rich food at fair prices. With beautiful views of the sea and the castle.
Wonderful views, staff and food. Couldn’t fault anything. Would definitely recommend if your in Dubrovnik for something to eat or drink.

My wife and I dined at Dubravka 1836 the first night of our trip to Dubrovnik over spring break. It is located just outside the Old City Walls on a cliff overlooking the sea. Service was very efficient and friendly. The food was very good. My wife had the lasagna and I had the schnitzel with au gratin potatoes. The portions were generous, which allowed us to have leftovers for lunch the next day. We shared a piece of chocolate cake for dessert. I wish we had gone back another night for dinner after trying other restaurants that didn’t measure up to Dubravka.
The only thing better than the food at Dunbravka is the service. It is in beautiful location also right by the Old Town of Dubrovnik with stunning backdrop.

The best spot for food, views of the ocean and wall . Really fantastic service . Breakfast omelettes gorgeous . Dinner first rate on every plate. Very good value for money and absolutely delicious food . If your luck is in get a side seat at the wall
Wonderful service all around and amazing hospitality, especially Mario who was an excellent server, The food was excellent and the atmosphere outstanding! Can’t wait to come back again!
Amazing fresh food and the waiter Kosta was so hospitable and friendly. Busy place situated in the old town right next to the sea

We went there because of the good reviews and were still pleasantly surprised. The food was very good with a fair price-to-quality ratio. The location was fantastic, and especially worth highlighting was the service, which was excellent. So, a clear recommendation for Dubrovnik.

Lovely location just outside Pile Gate, overlooking the old city walls and the sea, as well as wooded hillside - the perfect spot any time of day! Great service and excellent food. Definitely order the Gratinated Potatoes with Herbs - you won't regret it!

This was a return visit to this restaurant, having enjoyed dinner here on a previous visit. This time we stopped here for breakfast, ordering eggs, bacon and coffee. The setting is beautiful in Dubrovnik old town, overlooking the city walls and the sea. Food was delicious and was served with lovely fresh rolls. Really good value also. We came here again today and enjoyed another lovely breakfast. Returning guests enjoy a 10% discount which also applies at the Panorama restaurant on the mountain top (another must when in Dubrovnik). Highly recommended.

Our favourite restaurant in dubrovnik, we ate here every night. The staff are so friendly and the food incredible. We tried nearly everything on the menu and couldn't find fault. 
We also ate at their sister restaurant at the top of the mountain when you get off the cable car. Again fabulous. 
Highly recommend a visit here, it will our first port of call when we return next year.
We were lucky to get a table on a busy Saturday evening. Beautiful view of the Old City walls and food was delicious. Helpful and friendly service.
We are in Dubrovnik one week. This has been the best food, and the best service.Great venue with lively atmosphere. Would highly recommend.

My wife and I enjoyed a large breakfast looking over to the old city and Adriatic. The service was wonderful, efficient and quality of food top tier. We had an omelette with asparagus and prosciutto, served with fresh buns, coffee. Must stop place, highly recommended

Great food and great service, if you can get a seat near the wall the view is amazing. Slightly windy here in April but would be lovely when the weathers warmer. The restaurant is average to expensive priced with a small meal for two coming to roughly 120 euros.

The best service you could get in dubrovnik. 
The staff are very kind and friendly and the food was outstanding 👌🏼 we already had lunch this afternoon and we had to comeback for dinner just 5 stars

This restaurant is stunning , the food is absolutely delicious - so fresh , fabulous flavours and excellent service , we came for lunch today and it was so good we returned for dinner . The views from the terrace are just wonderful and the whole dining experience was a 10/10 - special mention for our waitress service from Zella who was superb , very atttentive and great recommendations - highly recommend c

By far the nicest and the best value for money in Dubrovnik old town. Prices are very reasonable. Service is exceptional. Very friendly staff and make you feel very welcome. They go above and beyond for all their customers! Food is excellent and would definitely recommend to anyone visiting!
BEAUTIFUL views of the Walled City and Adriatic! Excellent service from our waiter Mario. I recommend the seafood risotto and local wine.
We had a lovely seafood risotto and we were recommended a local Croatian white wine to compliment this. Mario was very helpful and friendly.
Delicious food, great service, wonderful view. Stipe was very helpful and accommodating. The fish and risotto were wonderful.

Came here to eat on our last evening. Very pretty restaurant overlooking the sea and city walls. 
Waiter really good at recommending the right food and drink to choose. Very helpful and friendly as were all the staff. 
Dinner was absolutely delicious. Definitely recommend.

The food was exquisite with reasonable prices.
Staff were very friendly and attentive.
I strongly recommend this restaurant.

Love this resto! I keep coming back here to eat. It has the most stunning view of the fortress and adriatic sea and the food was so deliscious as well. They gave me doscount too.. staff were great and service was excellent, especially Apsalon.. 😊

The location of the restaurant is amazing, right next to the walls of Dubrovnik and overlooking the bay. The service is excellent and food is extremely good. I would recommend the vegetable risotto. You get a lot for your money and I would thoroughly recommend it,
We came for food, and the service was amazing, very attentive and had a beautiful outdoor spot to look over the sea I couldn’t say one bad word about this place

Late lunch recommended by another couple and was not disappointed. We had a very large pizza and a feta salad between us . The salad was light and refreshing and the pizza tasty .
Service was friendly and prompt but not rushed at all .
Probably one of the busiest places we've eaten at as the season hasn't officially started but definitely the best up to now .
We paid just under €50 and had 2 coffees and a shared dessert as well as lunch and I thought this was a fair price .

We visited this restaurant twice during our four day stay. It’s a lovely place to be, with views out to the sea and heaters and blankets everywhere on a chilly day. 

The menu is varied and not too big. We returned because the lasagne was incredible! It’s supposed to be a hot starter but we had it as a main course with grilled veg and gratinated potatoes.. 

Service was fantastic - we had a young lady serving us whose English was superb! 

Reasonably priced, with a strong cocktail selection too! Highly recommend.
Beautiful restaurant perched above the shore. Service was attentive and polite. Food and wine were excellent. View cannot be beat.

Lovely food and really good service.

Really nice terrace with good heaters and blankets provided!

Had all three courses and couldn’t fault them!
A Classy Restaurant. Highly recommend this place!we had a great night here, a perfect ambiance and a delicious foods. Bravo👏
Amazing views and top tier food. The risotto was one of the best I've had in my life. Amazing spot to view the sunset as well. Davor's service was also excellent!
Great view with beautiful light right on the sea. The food was excellent and the service exceptionally attentive.

Delicious food and a beautiful location, good size portions and good value. Our waiter was fantastic, he was attentive and knowledgeable about the wines and menu. One star off due to the waitress who took the heater away from our table for her own couples table without even speaking to us
The view is good and the food is not expensive and delicious!! Friendly and nice! I've been here 3 times! 3 times to find out.
Great view, decent food (huge difference with other restaurants in town where nothing is corect), helpful staff
the service of Jasmine is perfect!! very kind and nice, an super excellent experience. 超级推荐这家餐厅 服务员都很棒，天气冷，Jasmine还给我们拿了毛毯和暖炉

Most scenic view in the vicinity. Great food and reasonable price as compared to many other restaurants
 Great services too.
Lovely! Everything was lovely. Service, the view, food, everything! And price was also good for the service and Location

We had breakfast in this picturesque location with views of the city walls, old town and Lovrjenac Fortress. There is both indoor and umbrella covered outdoor seating. The breakfast menu is limited mostly eggs, omelets, vegetables and baked items but certainly enough to get your day started. Service was good and breakfast was tasty. You do have to deal with pesky pigeons wanting to share in your meal. They serve breakfast, lunch and dinner and the views cannot be beat.

Luxury traveler review:
1. Location
Top 1 : the best view that can be in Dubrovnik
2. Service
Truly perfect
3. Food
10/10
This property and also Gradska kavana arsenal / panorama restaurant and Nautika restaurant are ruled by the same group
It is certainly noticeable that service / food and all quality stays at the top of the notch

We just spent 6 nights in Dubrovnik and spent quite a bit of time dining at this restaurant for coffees, breakfast, dinner. The customer service is excellent as is the food and the coffee. highly recommend dining here. Not to mention the stunning view and of course the crème caramel.🇭🇷 thank you all the staff at this great restaurant.

Beautiful view of the castle and ramparts. 
Cozy terrace. 
Very tender octopus and crispy well-filled pizza eaten. 
Service was very friendly as we are used to in Dubrovnik

An excellent restaurant with a very rich menu that leaves room for fish. The layout of the tables is very airy which allows to relax and chat quietly. An efficient, discreet and attentive service. Careful cuisine (admittedly Croatian fish soup is quite far from Marseille soup). A place where you feel good and want to come back. Very nice view of the wall and the cove of the door Pile. Romantic place. Taxi station opposite for those who would be a little far away. In my opinion in the middle of the season you have to book

Beautiful atmosphere, very friendly staff including Ante. Memorable apple pie that will haunt my dream for years ❤️

PS: two locals said that it is their favourite restaurant! We can see why! We came here last night for dinner and tonight for dessert!

It was our first day first meal in Dubrovnik during our honeymoon and we had great time in this restautant with great view of the ocean and very delicious food, we were with server Ante and he was very nice to us i will defenitely come again :)!!!

The plates were amazing and the view was awesome. We had Ante for the service, he never let a plat or a glas empty at your table. The risotto was too big for me and they came to see me to know if something was wrong but no everything was more than ok.
Very nice! My server Ante was very quick and helpful! Would definitely recommend eating here if you are visiting Dubvronik.

Great service by a gentleman of the name, Ante.
Beautiful views of the walls, the fort and the bay, coupled with a simple and cost effective breakfast.

We had a lovely breakfast, with a great view. We were not there for long; however, the service was fantastic - Ante was a great host who was very attentive and made sure we felt welcomed. We will definitely be returning - and staying for longer this time!
Beautiful setting for a delicious breakfast. Sea view, friendly staff and nice coffee and fresh fruit juice.

We visited this restaurant twice in a week, it was that good! The service was lovely, as were both meals we had. Great wine and menu choices. One reason we returned is that, on the first visit, we were given a discount card for all three of their restaurants in Dubrovnik (4 in the summer season). Dubrovnik is not cheap to eat and drink in so, even though it’s only 10%, it does help! We visited all their restaurants (which include the Panorama Restaurant), so the discount card was well used!!

Nice and tiny restaurant. Plus from heating lamps out side on the terrace. We had as main course gratinated beef. Meat was tender and not overcooked. Apple cake was chosen from the recommendation of our excellent waiter Duje, who really provide us nice dinner experience. This was our 5th dinner in Dubrovnik and absolutely the best food and service from visited restaurants.

I very rarely feel motivated to write a review, especially a positive one, but we dined here 4 times in a week, it was that good! The food is really good quality and the prices are very reasonable, certainly lower than most of the surrounding restaurants! The view, setting and ambience are first rate. The service was also perfect, not constantly harassing you but attentive whenever you needed it. Plus if the value wasn’t good enough anyway, you get 10% off as a returning customer. 

We tried 5 or 6 different dishes between our various visits and none disappointed!

I’ve read one of two reviews that say tourist trap! Whilst the location might make you think it would be, and we had our doubts when we first saw where it was, the food, setting, service are first rate. So don’t listen to the doubters!
Amazing food staff and setting , we returned twice on our 4 night stay as the food is so good. Their infamous apple pie is a must!

We bought ice creams at the restaurant's gelato outlet and were absolutely horrified at the lack of care for people with allergies. The staff member serving used the same scoop for peanut ice cream and then other flavours without cleaning the scoop in between. When she did put the scoop in water, it was dumped into the same water as other scoops so all would be contaminated. Anyone buying another flavour thinking they were OK to eat it because it had no nuts in it would unintentionally be eating small amounts of peanut ice cream. This is so dangerous and irresponsible.

Please educate your staff. Make sure your practices are allergy safe or you tell customers that you cannot serve people with nut allergies because you don't use safe food hygiene practices!

Nice restaurant, super well placed, romantic evening! 
Decor and organization very well. "Numerous" staff, professional, present without being invasive. Good choice of good food at identical prices to what is done on Dubrovnik, that is rather high but the price/quality ratio is ok in this beautiful establishment.
Possibility of 10% discount if you return. Ask for it and come back!

We are really satisfied with all the services. We got a table quickly, with a beautiful view on the sea and the castle (it was also around sunset). The food and the waiters/waitresses were all polite, friendly and helpful!
Food was Fabulous right down to the apple pie for dessert, excellent service, and the Festigia wine, highly recommend this restaurant
Exquisite service. Beautiful view. Truly fantastic food. Honestly a must try! And honest value for money! Truffle pasta is a must!

The views of the water and the castle are fantastic. The meals was great. I had the octopus salad, and it reminded me of the octopus in Corfu, Greece.
I really enjoyed it.
The only concern is that the service was a little slow. I attribute this to it being very busy and they need a few more waiters.
All in all the food was very good and the octopus was tender.

We visited here after reading all the reviews and have to say we were left quite underwhelmed.
It is pricey compared to other restaurants in the city and yes you have the view but the food was average and the service wasn’t great we felt like we were an inconvenience to them when ordering anything.
I’d recommend finding other restaurants in Dubrovnik to visit.

We had an excellent time at Dubravka. Many recommended it to us and we decided to have our last night dinner here. The service was top notch and the meal was all delicious We had the grilled sea bass and truffle tortellini. Both were absolutely incredible! We also had the feta salad and Dalmatian ham for an appetizer. They helped us pick the best wine for our meal as well. 

Vedran was our waiter and was incredibly attentive and informative. He had many facts to share with us about Croatia and our meals, and where the truffles came from. It was lovely having him and we are just so happy we had our last night here!
Great meal and lovely staff. Recommended some good wine and dessert. Also issued us with free tickets to the wine museum. Definitely make time to go.

This seems to be a restaurant that everyone must visit when they are in Dubrovnik, and while the prices may appear high for Croatia, you are paying for the view and surroundings, which are fantastic!

Over looking the Adriatic Sea, you get a cliff top terrace view as you enjoy your meal.

I showed up here for lunch and the staff could not have been any more helpful and welcoming.

For my meal I ordered the Rib-steak "Dalmatian style" with chips, and a beer to wash it down with.

Prepared in no time, the steak was out of this world and cooked to perfection.

All in all, while a little over my regular budget, I had to eat here once during my stay in Dubrovnik, and it was worth it!

Even in mid October, sunny weather in Dubrovnik, so a table at Dubravka 1836 was a treat.
Booked in advance, confirmation was fast and a table with the best view was requested and provided on 16/10/24.
There are many 'walk in's' from the Cruise Ships visiting, so advanced booking is advised for the most scenic tables.
From the moment we arrived in the bustling area just outside the 'Old Town', we were dealt with attentively by friendly and very polite staff.
Location / Location / Location - wonderful.
Food was delicious and well presented, grilled squid was superb and seafood risotto was probably the tastiest I have ever had.
House wine, nicely chilled and kept cold in an ice bucket was delightful.
Food and wine were very well priced for the high quality and the service was impeccable.
Absolutely recommended if in Dubrovnik.
Thank you to the staff for a lovely experience in your fine restaurant !!
James + Janette, UK.

Restaurant, although touristy, very nice and well-kept.
It also has an indoor hall but the highlight is the outdoor hall directly on the beautiful sea of Dubrovnik and overlooking the walls of the old town.
Very extensive menu and great service. We had a very good fisherman's risotto and an equally good Wiener Schnitzel.
High prices even if in line with the city now very touristy.

Visited for brunch after walking the walls. Our table had a great view overlooking the sea. Staff were warm & friendly. 
We choose 2 dishes to share-the ham & cheese platter & breads with a selection of spreads-honey, chocolate, jam & marmalade with coffees served with cream. Food was great & we passed a couple of hours relaxing and people watching. 
Recommend for a leisurely meal.
