For a restaurant that list as a vegetarian / vegan options, I had expected a bit more. In the end it would be very easy to provide a few proper vegan options. View and terrqce is nice. Very nice staff also!

We saw this restaurant just outside the City walls. The food and service were amazing. I had the vegetable risotto and my partner had the gratinated beef with gratinated potatoes. They were fantastic! We enjoyed it so much we went back for our last evening. Then we had the lasagna and feta salad. And we just had to have the gratinated potatoes again (they were that good). Highly recommend at least one visit.

We didn’t have a reservation but were able to get a table for 2. The restaurant has a nice atmosphere and good views if you can get a table at the edge. We had lasagne and a pizza which were both very tasty. I’d say it was on the expensive side but all restaurants in Dubrovnik felt expensive to us. Overall I’d recommend this restaurant!

This restaurant is just outside the old Town near the Pile gate and it has a wonderful sea view over a quiet little harbour. The tables are outside but are covered and the attentive waitstaff ensure you are warm and cosy with movable heaters and blankets as required. Excellent though the staff and location are, the real star at this restaurant has to be the truffle pasta starter - oh my word it is delicious. It's not the cheapest restaurant in Dubrovnik, equally it isn't too far adrift in price terms from others that we visited, but the food was simply sensational. Try it

Had a excellent breakfast. Good portions and taste! Highly recomend the food! Good location but very crowdy. Did not like that so many smoked in the restaurant, it destroyd the pleasure of the food.
Waiter was quite quick and profesional.
Delish food and such a great view. The cocktails were also wonderful and varied. The pizza is a definite for good option.

We ate outside with views of the city walls. Excellent service. We had the Mediterranean seasoned scalloped potatoes and chicken and pork and parsnips. The only drawback with being outside was smokers.

The restaurant was an amazing surprise! We had the mortadella pizza and it was honestly one of the best pizzas we ever had! 

Zeljka who was our waitress for the night was especially friendly and made the entire experience even more enjoyable! 

Amazing ambiance and the views are to die for ! 

5 stars!
Sat our table of 4 immediately on a Thursday evening. Extensive menu selections, great service, amazing views! They have an impressive capacity!
Great restaurant ... Always very busy but managed to grab a table for lunch. Seabass was wonderful, as was the chicken, and very good bread too !

Great, Stipe Merdzan's service is fantastic! The food was delicious and the service was great! The next time you eat, everyone can come, pizza is really good, the view from the door is great, it's nice to sit and watch the sea view

This place is on such a busy area we wouldn’t have thought of eating here, if our guide hadn’t said that the food and service were good - glad we did. Loved it so much we visited twice! Excellent pork with plum sauce and parsnip purée; great sea bass and fries. Very good value house white in a litre bottle. Apple pie sublime. Excellent efficient service. Very clean bathrooms. Great setting.
This was my husbands favourite place. We had coffees/drinks and a late lunch at three different times. It overlooks the old town and the sea and has such a nice atmosphere.
Really great place! Special shout out to Duje for being an amazing help during our time there! You’re the best! I recommend this highly!

We ate in several restaurants during our recent stay in Dubrovnik. To be honest the food was good in them all but the prices varied enormously. This place was our favourite by far. The food was excellent and the price was fair. The staff were friendly and attentive and the setting was delightful. We hadn’t reserved a table but we waited less than ten minutes to be seated. Even though this place is right in the thick of things just outside the Pile Gate, it was a great choice and I have no hesitation in recommending a visit. I had lovely fresh sea bass and my companion had the octopus special.

Gorgeous view of the Adriatic right on the water. Delicious lasagne, salad and fresh squid and olive bread. Excellent cocktails, limoncello spritz and Smokey Old Fashioned. Our waiter Stipe couldn’t have been nicer. He didn’t rush us at all. We highly recommend, you won’t be disappointed.

Modern restaurant situated just outside the city walls by the Pile gate (which it overlooks). Very popular with the tourists and the locals as the prices are reasonable (bearing in mind its location). It has a fairly quick turnover as its simple food fair and the staff are all really friendly and helpful .

Nice location just outside Pile gate. Delicious food and friendly staff. Moreover good service that, to be honest, surprised us a bit for such a touristic place and end of season, f.e. they didn’t charge us for a side dish we thought it was vegetarian but it wasn’t.
Good atmosphere and view at Pile Gate. Great place for food especially after long day post day trip. Slight wait for table but was worth it, food was delicious and staff were lovely
Amazing food brilliant service by Sifra who was very welcoming and friendly. Very good evening out will definitely come back before we leave

Breakfast with a sea-view, what more could we ask for, excellent attentive service, very nice coffee, tomato and mozzarella omelette was perfect, lovely rolls and GF bread supplemented. Would happily return. Thanks

We had finished a tour of the city and had 90 minutes to kill before meeting up with our group to go back to our boat. We were looking for a drink and a snack – and a seat with some sun. The receptionist was very accommodating and gave us a lovely table with a view. The menu had a range of very reasonable options. Our server, Davor, was exceptional. He described for us the red wine that we ordered to make sure the style would be suitable. The wine, an outstanding regional wine, was decanted. We concluded our light meal with some espresso. The area is extremely touristy yet Davor and other staff were attentive, courteous and extremely professional. It’s no wonder the restaurant is very popular.
Beautiful location and good food. Even though it was busy, the service was fast and attentive. Nice menu for food and drinks.

The friendly welcome of Paris in this decent bistro with incredible views if you are close to the edge.
We regret the rough reception that puts the premises first (why not), but without sparing visitors or apologizing.
Food was excellent, and service was fast and professional. Restaurant was fully booked but we get drinks and food very fast. Waiters and assistant Waiters where very helpful and kind. We enjoyed
This is are favorite restaurant, for breakfast, lunch and dinner, or just for drink. Everything is delicious. Waiters are always kind and smiling. Warm recommendations to visit
This is our favorite restaurant in Dubrovnik for all occasions. Drinks and food are always outstanding as much as excellent service!
Excellent service, with great waiters and beautiful food, with stunning wine and amazing views. Definitely worth a visit.

Great place to dine! Right outside the Fort and the main square. This is a very large restaurant with lots of seating. Great views of the Lovrijenac Fortress, Bokar and Minceta. I ordered peach Bellini, focaccia, pizza and cream caramel. All delicious! Service was very prompt- I highly recommend!

Excellent location just outside the old town wall at Pile Gate. Plenty of outdoor seating overlooking the old town wall and the ocean. The pizza was excellent. The service was excellent. Be sure to make a reservation as this is a popular restaurant. The prices are reasonable.

Great atmosphere, with fantastic view to Dubrovnik city walls and fort Lovrijenac. Staff was attentive, friendly and helpful. Finally the food was excellent, I went for the octopus and it was divine. It’s advisable to do a reservation upfront.

Great food and friendly service. Had a delicious prosciutto pizza and truffle pasta (from the starter menu but our server recommended it as a main, and it was quite filling. If you’re hungry you could maybe manage it and a lighter main). Great view of the old town walls and the sea. 

Tip: get a gelato from the attached place first, and you’ll get a card for 10% off Dubravka 1836 and two other venues (Panorama at the top of the cable car and Gradska Kavana Arsenal near the old port).
We had breakfast here on our last day and wished we had tried it for lunch and dinner too. Next time! Service was wonderful.

Visited beautiful Dubrovnik and ate in this beautiful restaurant in the old town of Dubrovnik after a beautiful day we chose to eat here looking over our favourite view. The food was absolutely delicious, the setting amazing, the service second to none we had a wonderful time , we would recommend to anyone 😍😍

Good but expensive, very fine but very small quantities (octopus salad can make just one starter but at the Award of a salad/dish elsewhere....)
Very attentive staff

We visited here on recommendation of our tour guide who has lived in Dubrovnik for years. He described it as fast food in that the turnover if customers is very fast due to it’s popularity you may have to wait to be seated as a list of names is held at reception . We waited 20 mins to be seated. Once seated you didn’t feel rushed in service or to leave . We ordered rib steak and two sides of med veg and creamed potatoes. Food was lovely . Staff were attentive. As a first time visitor they give you a discount card for any repeat visits to here and two other of their popular restaurants. Tables are close together but restaurant is always busy giving a lively atmosphere and is also in a beautiful setting looking into the fort and walls of the city. Well worth a visit

Anita is amazing!! i am a restaurant area manager myself and if i could take this woman to london to work for me i would! She is absolutely incredible at serving and attending to our every need. We came for 3 meals total due to the amazing food and the even more impressive service. Anita is a superstar and deserves a pay rise! Thank you so much

A great spot just outside of Pile Gate and right on the water. We had a late dinner here and enjoyed it immensely. The staff were very attentive and helpful. 

We had the salmon and the seafood risotto. 

I would go here again in a heartbeat.
Our waiter Davor was delightful and attentive. The food and ambiance were perfect. Thank you for such a great evening, we will be back
This has the most amazing views overlooking the old town and the food is absolutely incredible! We were served by Davor and he was incredible helpful and attentive!
The scenery and atmosphere are both brilliant. Food is good, but quite expensive for what it is. They accept walk-ins, making it more practical.

Ante our server was great, very attentive and in a positive vibrant mode. The food was okay, a similar experience of other restaurants we’ve been during our holiday. Actually the menu was pretty much the same dishes than in the competitions close by places, it is not very cheap we got two omelets and coffee for 35€ including tip. The location is amazing, with stunning views to the city walls and the open sea. Please remember not to feed the pigeons or you will be told off!

Solid night out! Food was quite good- had the salmon and my wife had the sea bass. Would recommend both. Also, extensive wine list (admittedly I had the Heineken, which always tastes better in Europe). Kosta (our server) attentive but also gave us our space). Banger views too if you’re into GoT or history.
Great spot - delicious food and lovely atmosphere. Our waiter Labadahisa provided great service! Would recommend to anyone visiting!

Had the best waiter Gibermu with the best food and most beautiful view!
Would reccomend the pizza and the cocktails are great too!
Great views, fast service, delicious food — recommend. Outside of walls so breeze made it more comfortable in early Sept. Tuta (our waiter) was friendly and helpful!

Really nice view and best coffee we had. In general, we didn’t have the best experience with the service in Dubrovnik, however,zeljka and a young male server with glasses were fantastic. You also get a 10% discount with thecity card.

Dubravka has Delicious food 🐠 an active location 🕺 (adjacent to the walled city) and great staff! Kosta J. and Lukash (who was our sommelier 🍷) were excellent and on point! We highly recommend! Cheers! 🍸

Great location. Perfect service and very nice sea food. I do recomend for a taste of Dubrovnik spirit.
Octopus was perfectly grilled.

Food was delicious with generous portions. Wish we had found this place earlier in our stay. Service and atmosphere were fantastic, our waiter was very helpful and attentive. I recommend you go early or make a booking.

Exceptional food. The truffle tortellini was exquisite and the grilled octopus was the best I have ever had. Brilliant service and lovely music. A lovely evening meal by the castle was the best dinner experience we have had whilst visiting Croatia. Gorgeous wine and a lovely array of cocktails. Very glad the Whiskey Sour was on the menu. Our waiter Gibi was so attentive and made the experience so magical. If you’re in Dubrovnik - Don’t miss out!

We were drawn to this place as soon as we arrived at Dubrovnik square, being just outside the walls of Old Town... prices were definitely the most affordable around. We had to wait about 30min. As it was super crowded, but once seated at the table they were very quick both with Reservation and with the arrival of food. Very friendly staff. Good and hearty dishes. A good solution in a city that has very little money.
The Award is not proportional to what is on the plate, too bad, it was good but without madness. The view is nice, the service remains correct.

Really lovely restaurant 
Lovely staff very attentive
Nice vibe 
Food was lovely and fresh 
Great cocktails, fabulous view of sea 
Highly recommend

The mara cove of the servant, the flavorless ice cream and the delay! all make for an experience in this expensive restaurant. Simply because it is in good location it is not very interested in the deal.
What a waste of time
Our server Davor looked after me and my missus well and had a lovely time would recommend. Food and drinks was amazing and lovely atmosphere!

A fabulous night with sensational food and views. To highlight the night our waiter Mario looked after us without being to over attentive but still gave us the attention we needed. The octopus salad was fabulous and the risotto and assorted fish plate unbelievable. To top it all off Mario also gave us a complimentary drink t the end of the night to celebrate our anniversary. All in all 10/10 and we will definitely recommend it to all our friends. Thank you for a wonderful night it was faultless.

Excellent experience, very good meal, good service and an absolutely stunning setting 
Would definitely recommend eating here
Dinner was fantastic and the view was spectacular! Siksi was our waiter and he was above and beyond, great service and great recommendations, would highly recommend!

We were seated at the front so overlooking the water, city walls and fortress. Stunning position. The food was good, not amazing. Unfortunately I had the wrong main dish served to me, I'd ordered squid with potatoes and green beans, but was served octopus on sweet potato mash. I wasn't sure what to expect. I asked where the green beans were, and they asked if I had ordered them. I said that it was on the description on the menu. They brought me some. It wasn't till the bill came when I saw that my main dish was more expensive than the one I'd ordered, and I also got charged for the beans, that I realised what had happened. It didn't matter, all was good anyway, but I probably should have pointed it out to the waiter at the time. The staff were attentive and also gave us discount on the end bill as we had bought a City Pass. So, all in all, a pleasant experience.
We were offered a shaded table on the terrace. Service prompt and friendly. I had the Feta Salad which was just perfect with some focaccia on the side. Lovely experience.

We have been coming to Dubrovnik for 5 years now, and every time we eat here.
Wonderful food, great views, and super service from our ever so attentive waiter, | Serga. If you are visiting Dubrovnik, you won't be disappointed if you eat here :)

We just had lunch here. We ordered pasta with truffle sauce and muscles in a tomato and wine sauce. It was truly delicious. Our waiter Davor was really pleasant and helpful. While we were enjoying our lunch a big summer storm came and the staff solved the situation both effectively and with a humor. We had a great experience and I highly recommend to visit this restaurant.

Nice spot of the City. We brought some friends from the Netherlands to spoil them a bit. We took squid on the grill, sea food risotto, one boy had a delicious pizza..Nice wine Rukatac from Croatia well served and introduced by a smart sommelier. So everything was fine and fair.Price and quality are ok.
Thanks

This restaurant was amazing. It has an incredible view over the sea with swallows in the evening. The staff are lovely and the food is incredible. I can recommend the fish carpaccio and rib eye Dalmatia style!
Our second visit here after 2 years. Kule was fantastic and gave us the best customer service and was great with our kids. The food was amazing and came very quickly.

Lovely location 
Friendly service and Kule was attentive and efficient 
Good sized portions 
Would definitely recommend
Lovely service from Anton. We are from the uk. He was very attentive to us we loved the food and drinks! We will be back soon again!
Very tasty food and great service! Thank you Kosta! :) Our family had a great time and the location is great with a wonderful view of the sea!
Delisciouse food, supet sevice and special thanks to Roys. He is doing his job in a very friendly and qualitative manner. Big recommendation.
We had a lovely meal here, which was made even better by our fantastic waiter Rojs. Would definitely recommend. They also have an ice cream shop attached to the restaurant which is worth a visit.
What a fabulous evening. The view, the food and the service. Exceptional. Rojs our waiter was excellent. Very attentive and kind. Would definitely return.
Amazing food with a great view and fantastic service. On your first visit you receive a 10% off 2 other restaurants in the city walls. This really is a must try!

Definitely a spot you need to check out when you visit Dubrovnik! Beautiful sea views with amazing food. Our wonderful server, Davor, was so kind and helpful with navigating the menu. We will absolutely be back!
Amazing food and service! I love this place. Beautiful setting, our waiter Gibi was brilliant and lovely with our daughter (8 years old)
Beautiful Location . Excellent food. Brilliant service from Nale. We will definitely return before we leave Dubrovnik.
The waiters are really friendly! Davor helped us greatly! The view is beautyfull and the food was delicious. If you like cocktails, they have a lot of great options.
The location of the restaurant is exceptional. Go to see the sunset. Was suspicious because of the location but food and wine great and was good value for money.

The drinks, food and service was amazing!! Stipe was so sweet and accommodating. It was well priced and we got separate bills as we were paying separately. Such a divine experience; would highly recommend!

I had the seafood risotto that was delicious. I enjoyed the meal with the nice view.
The staff was also very kind and friendly
The food is great and the view is excellent. Our waiter, Luka, was very friendly, and we were happy with how he took care of us. 👍👍
Very nice restaurant, ramparts or sea view. Perfect service, nice waiter. We ate very well, to do on Dubrovnik.

We were seated inside the restaurant and the greeter kindly moved us to a front row table as it became available. We had cappuccino and omelette and it was excellent. Our server was Luca he was great and another waiter kindly thought to bring us water with our coffee we must have looked hot lol great view not pricey well worth it and can walk in x

We were slightly late to our booking on a Saturday night. Whilst the restaurant was very full we only had to wait 5 minutes before we were given what felt like the best table on the terrace at the restaurant. The food was great and reasonably priced for Dubrovnik. The setting is spectacular especially at sunset. Mario, our waiter, was great to deal with. He had a good sense of humour and was attentive but never pushy. We would definitely go back.

We got a great table on a Saturday walk up in about 10 minutes. Mario was our server and he was great! Went above and beyond to help. My Wiener schnitzel was one of the best I’ve had outside of Austria and the gratin potatoes were possibly the best I’ve had. My gf got the tagliatelle and that was phenomenal as well. Great night!
Was our first night in dubrovnik and we found this lovely little spot with amazing views. Food was very nice and staff were incredible. Would definitely recommend
The view from the restaurant and the seafood dishes, especially seafood tomato rissot were fantastic! Tomater served for us and he was so kind!
Dinner was exquisite and the waiters were very nice and attentive. Good views, highly recommended. Very affordable prices

We were very well received. The service is very friendly and professional. The dishes are delicious. Great attention for Tomake who is very responsive and competent. We recommend this restaurant which is very well located in front of the ramparts. ✅
Very good food, fantastic servies. The waiters was so nice and we left wirth a big smile on our faces. The beefsteak was the best meatdinner, very tastfull and juicy.
Beautiful spot for food and drinks. Waiter Anle was excellent too. Will definitely be coming back for food and drinks again soon with friends and family.

Excelent restsaurant on Pile gate, nice service, tasty food, good atmosfhere , you should order delicious apple pite with ice cream .
High reccommended 👍

Stunning views, great attentive staff. Great value for money. We got seafood risotto, lasagne, chicken tagatellie and truffle pasta. All dishes were delicious, beautiful rose to match. Located just outside the walls of the old town. Perfect sunset meal

Food 3/5. Prices 2/5.
Tipping was a must which is ridiculous…
Tried to pay by card. The waitress explained that regarding tipping I have four options on the terminal: 5, 10, 15, 20%. I told her I do not want to tip and pressed the 5th option with 0%. And it was not working. The waitress restarted the payment process and explained again that I have four options on the terminal as the tip is not included in the bill and asked if I understand english at all. She totally ignored that I do not want to tip. At the 4th payment attempt I chose 5% in order we could leave. They did not deserve it at all…
This place is a well located tourist SCAM where they try to rip you off as much as possible.

This review is in regards to the ice cream/snack bar. 

We had the worst experience at this establishment. My friend and I went to get ice cream there and well it was moderately busy. The staff were incredibly rude to us. We were smiling and trying to explain what we were after and they were very sharp and abrupt with us. My friend asked to try two ice cream flavours and she gave her a nasty look and abruptly said “only one!”. The ice cream scoops were really small for the price. We were waiting to pay for a few minutes and we had to get multiple staff members attention before we were able to pay. That was the worst experience in this country. Too much attitude and I will not be returning and would not recommend to a single soul.
0/10

Just for its location, with elegant terrace overlooking the walls of Dubrovnik is worth dining on. This time we tried pizzas, good. The service and friendliness are excellent. Prices according to the area.
The place was nice and we had decent service and good quality food. Was really nice view just outside the old town castle.
This place is gorgeous. The food was lovely, the staff were lovely and the view was lovely. This was mine and my partner’s favourite meal when we were in Dubrovnik

Great restaurant, beautiful location. Highly recommend going at sunset. Our waiter Duje was fantastic; Great service, very professional and funny. Highly recommend this restaurant if you are visiting Dubrovnik.
Amazing food and very nice servers. Romantic place for couples. We had the rib-eye and the gratinated beef filet. They were perfectly cooked and tasted amazing. Our server Duie was very fun and nice.

The food was amazing the view amazing and our waiter was very attentive and knowledgeable always happy to help we came to the place twice and if we had more time we would visit again. Many thanks Ivan

Great food in a great location. More relaxed than its sister restaurants, but still lovely. 
Would go again.portions are large.

Ate here last year and it was excellent.
Returned this week but was disappointed 
Service and ambiance good but unfortunately let down by the food 
Increased prices and smaller portions 
The soup was lukewarm and the potato gratin very dry , French fries cold and chewy 
My ribeye was very small not worth the expensive price tag
Queued for a table but won’t bother again.
It seems as though they just want customers in and out asap

We visited the restaurant for dinner on our day 1 in Dibrovnik. The location stood out among others with great views and the crowd. Wifey decided to give it a try and am glad we did. Our server ANITA.. A big shout out to her.. was so welcoming and keeping our dietery restrictions in mind suggested rhe best options. She proactively brought us spicy oil & peppers knowing my wife loved spicy food. The food was amazing too but Anita's charming service made it even better. Based on the experience we decided to go back for dinner again. Sadly Anita was off work😥😥. The food was great but without Anita the spiciness was missing 🙂🙂.. 5 stars for location, views and food. Add 5 more stars for ANITA

Restaurant "mirror" of the Gravka Arsenal overlooking the port.
This one is located just the entrance to the old town.
Nice card. Excellent fish.
Reservation required.

What a great place my kids (7 and 10) dragged me here because of the Ice cream… I was a bit weary being right next to the old town… but the food was amazing and good value for the quality… they want me to try and make the seafood risotto… any chance of the recipe?
What can you say, had a late lunch on the terrace, food and wine was excellent and so was the server. Views were superb. Highly recommended.

Chicken Tagliatelle was amazing, think it was the best tomato sauce i had ever eatten! However there seems to be white wine in it, so avoid if you dont like alcohol! 

Thanks Stipe for the good service!
Extremely tasty food, lovely friendly staff and incredible views!! Breakfasts and lunch we had and I would come back again for sure!
The ambience and views were great but food wasn’t that good. Tried pizza and pasta. Pasta was still ok but had to force myself to finish the pizza.
Unbelievable location, indoor and outdoor seating. Great ambiance. Outstanding food, would highly recommend a visit.

Excellent service, Super attentive and fast and prices it’s fine.

The prices are in line with the quality of the restaurant.

We didn't make a reservation but we asked for a table for three and it was super fast.

We had a fantastic dinner at Dubravka 1836 tonight. The location is great as is the view. We sat under an Olive tree. The food is amazing. The young gentleman who served us, Kosta was outstanding. Very kind and gentle with a winning smile. The service and attention to detail were top notch. I am glad we had reservations.
After a disastrous first attempt at dinner in the old city lanes we came out and found this place. Great staff, lovely food and beautiful setting! A great choice!

Very delicious cocktails and prices republican, relative to other restaurants on the territory of the old town.
A quiet and beautiful place.

Yes this is a tourist hot spot and for that reason you must book in advance (ask for a view) the view was stunning. We had a wonderful meal and our waiter Ivan Gibi was fantastic. He gave us a great recommendation to try the lovely Apple Pie but he was also very accommodating with our meals and requests as well as chatty and friendly with our teenagers. We really enjoyed our food, the view and the service and we had a lovely walk around the old town after dinner.
This is a wonderful restaurant! Beautiful view, friendly staff, and great drinks! I highly recommend this place to anyone visiting here :)
Amazing food and views! Our table looked at the sea and walls of Dubrovnik. They also have gluten free bread option and it was good! All wait staff was very friendly and efficient.
Lovely spot, amazing food, great friendly staff. The views are amazing. The complementary discount is amazing and a great way to get you back for more amazing food
Excellent food in a great location. Food was fantastic and the general ambience made for a great experience. Would definitely recommend!
Our first experience in Dubrovnik didn't disappoint. The staff was very nice and the spaghetti was amazing. Plus wow that view!

Food: delicious, big portions, and fair prices, mussels were clean and fresh
Environment: nice and pleasant place for having lunch and dinner, 
Service: good, professional, helpful and friendly
Duja took such good care of us and provided exceptional service. The food, the service and the views were wonderful. We will be back for sure.
Beautiful view, amazing food and great service. Special mention to Duje for his exceptionally friendly and professional service. A special place for lunch after visiting Old Town.

Magnificent view on the ancient walls AND on the sea! Very good breakfast, and very good prices. Plus, service was perfect and the waitress was super kind and professional. Definitely recommended, will come back soon!

The food us very delicious and the view is great. It was my second time here and there was 6 years difference from the first time I went. I have to say, the experience and the food the first time and this time were both the same. The service was great (thanks to Stipe) and the food was incredibly delicious. I just would like to raise my concerns regarding the uniforms of the staff. It was more than 33 degrees and my sister and I were both wearing comfortable and airy clothes and we were still too warm from the heat. But the staff were wearing long sleeves. They do not show any signs of being uncomfortable but you can definitely feel how sweaty they feel from the uniform. If the management can possibly give them uniforms for the summer where they can feel comfortable and much more relaxed. Otherwise, the experience I had was phenomenal. Thanks Dubravka. Will definitely come again the next time I visit Dubrovnik.

Spot is really great. Service is amazing. However, around this time of the month, it's really hot and I feel like the staff should be wearing more of a summer clothes as they looked very uncomfortable with their current dress code with this kind of heat. If the management could provide a more comfortable dress code for the staff would be amazing
Food and service was 10/10. 
Would come back again and highly recommended.
Plus the view is amazing.
Popped into here, before going into the old town early one day. It was already busy, but staff were good, quality of food & drinks good Vs value. Probably a lot cheaper than within the old town.

What a place!! I have been here 2 times in a row and only thing I can say is - AMAZING.
The guy from Rama lake Joseph mustache was our waiter. Amazing guy. See you soon dubravka see you soon amici.

Loved dinner here! Waiting staff were lovely, we had a great view of the ocean and the food was good. There was a half an hour wait though so definitely book in advance. More affordable than other restaurants in this chain (and we were then given a 10% off which we could use at the Panorama Bar!)
10/10 food and service , Duja is an excellent waiter and made our experience amazing, couldn’t be more pleased - the breakfast was great, need to go for dinner next.
Duje served all the dishes to us and was very helpful and pleasant. In general I would recommend this restaurant to get delicious food with a great view.
Great food with a wonderful view. Friendly, fast and efficient service from Duje. Would highly recommend coming here, can’t wait to come back.

Wonderful view and fantastic food. This was our last night in Dubrovnik and Dubravka made it magical. The food was divine, recommend tortellinin with truffles and prosciutto as well as veal schnitzel. Wow what a good food!

Very nice service from our waiter Kosta. 
Thank you for a great evening!
Fantastic food. Lots of food and incredibly good. We had Wienerschnitzel and Tortellini, delicious. Service level top class, most of all Costa, very nice.

Impersonal place 
The waitress was really unkind 
Salmon dill sauce was bathed in a frozen sauce that tasted like nothing 
The fries are cardboard 
Not great.

Food was great. Highly recommend the seafood risotto! 

We managed to get a table without reservation on a Monday night even though it was fully booked online.

Friendly service from Davor, great experience overall!
Wonderful place with breathtaking views! Food was fresh and delicious! We feasted on multiple seafood dishes and all were equally amazing.

Food was overpriced as is ALL Dubrovnik. Go to KOTOR. Prices 30% less and better experience.
Nice views from this restaurant.

Nice meal at acceptable prices.
Issue customer friendliness enormously good , friendly, helpful, funny.
Here one really knows something of hospitality
We had a party of nine and they worked to accommodate us after our Tuk Tuk tour. Kosta was our waiter and he was fantastic. We had pizza, seafood risotto, mussels, and all of it was delicious!

Excellent food, wonderful service, attentive and knowledgeable staff who treated us on a very special occasion. We had the rib eye steak dalmatian style and the gratinated beef fillet, both delicious and copious. The burrata cheese was a good starter to share and we were treated with their wonderful apple pie. I hope we will have a chance to go back to taste their fish menu.

A beautiful setting providing a combination of scenic views and bustling atmosphere. Located just outside the Pile Gate, with an outdoor seating area that has the city walls and the picturesque view of the Adriatic Sea as your backdrop. Service was quick and food portions plentiful. A great pit stop before or after exploring the old town. Advanced booking recommended for larger groups.

Superb view, food was amazing and the service was fantastic.

I also thought that, given the location in a very touristy part of town (where all of the coaches drop off visitors) the value was fair. 

We shared the pasta pomodoro and focaccia selection to start (plenty for two people!) and both had a pizza for mains. 

Great wine, food very fresh and we left feeling very satisfied! 

We booked our table in advance so did have a fantastic spot, overlooking Fort Lovrijenac and the sea. 

Would thoroughly recommend.
Great location, central but also great views, lovely atmosphere and good service, reasonable price considering its peak season and on a central sea front location
A friend recommended 1836 and it was beyond expectations. Great views, great food, and great service - thank you to our waiter, Kosta, and team!

This is a very popular restaurant so it's wise to make a reservation. We lucked out the first evening by coming early and loved the food and atmosphere so much we returned the following night. Dubravka Restaurant is located just outside the Pile Gate in a spot where one can view not only the walls of the old city but the sea that borders it. The menu offers a range of diverse, interesting selections. The prices were surprisingly reasonable and the waiters were efficient and downright funny at times. If we had been in Dubrovnik a little longer, we would have returned again.

It's the worst ice cream I've ever tasted.
Artificial flavor.
It's not worth the price.
Recommendation: do not go for ice cream.

This is a typical very well organised holiday resort restaurant. The service was excellent and the food was pretty good without being great. We started with a lasagna to share which was excellent, and then we both had Steak for the main course which was okay. Most of the people around us were enjoying Pizza for their main course, which looked good and apparently satisfied the customers, but if you are looking for something special only the location and setting is special.

In super location located at the entrance of a gate at Dubrovnik. 
View of castle and sea.
Delicious food
Friendly and helpful staff. 
Is in a top location so the price is also towards that.
At the back an ice cream shop with delicious ice cream.
Get all kinds of stuff.
Pasta, pizza, fish meat, salads

One of my favourite restaurants in Dubrovnik where you will see locals/tourists alike. I visited twice and had the mussels, as well as a pizza! The food is good quality, the staff are friendly and the views are beautiful! Reasonably priced for the location and quality!

Amazing location
Ordered many dishes from the menu. Everything was tasty, specialty of the day fresh fish, seafood risotto, appetizers. Good choice of wine. Many thanks to our waiter Ivan!

I decided to propose to my girlfriend at this restaurant and I could not have chosen a better location 
I had been in contact with the restaurant months in advance to organise my proposal and the restaurant where fantastic and very accommodating
On the day I visited the restaurant and the managers and staff where so helpful and did everything I asked 
We got the best table in the restaurant and the food service and view were absolutely amazing I could not fault anything at all the ribeye steak was one of the best I have ever had 
The waiter we had was extremely polite and attentive 
Thank you to all involved in making our evening one to remember
Food and service was exceptional. Especially from our server Duje who was a delight. Would highly recommend this restaurant.
Excellent service from Duje today at lunch. Beautiful food and very friendly, lovely for families. Would really recommend
Duje was a very sweet and funny server! The food and views were lovely. Make a reservation for closer to the walls/water seating.
Duje was amazing! The view was beautiful and everything we tried was delicious. Highly recommend if you’re in the Old City area!

Superb place. Don’t hesitate to book a table with a view in advance if you request it! DUJÉ, our server was extremely pleasant and helpful, well done!
The Burrata pizza was delicious.
This spot is fantastic for friends, family and couples! Enjoyed the beautiful views and food - Duje was the best waiter!!

Stopped for coffee and apple pie very nice. Location is wonderful with a great view. Just next to the pile gate entrance ( near the bus station) was given a 10% discount card which could be used there or at the Restuarant by the top of the cable car or in the old town by the port.

Beautiful setting. However, we had one coeliac in the group and the waiter disregarded that, despite numerous mentions. Potato gratin was extremely poor, made with potatoes past their best. After asking for a cocktail menu we waited 30 minutes until we eventually gave up and asked for the bill. The waiter suggested we give a 20% tip, regardless of us having already said how much we’d like to tip due to our disappointment.

Wanted to have breakfast before our tour. Found this spot at the entrance to the old city in the square where most tours meet. The breakfast was delicious and the rolls that come with the meal were delicious. The jams and spread were a total plus. Verdan warmed up to us. He was actually funny when we thought he was serious at the beginning. Ask for Vedran to be your server when you get there. He is very attentive 
Totally recommend for breakfast. Have not tried lunch yet 😎🥃
Ciao for now

It's become a tradition in recent years that we dine here on our last night in Dubrovnik. Once again the meal that we had was delicious. I had the beefsteak with chips and green beans and it was all cooked perfectly. Prior to dining here on the last night we make several visits for drinks. We always make a reservation for our meal on the last night but on the other nights we don't and we are always seated within 5 minutes of arriving. As a whiskey drinker the smoked old fashioned is still the best i have had anywhere and the lavender spritz is also a delight. Overall this is a top place with top service. Thankyou again and will see you next year!

We made reservations in advance for 5:30, but by 4 pm were ready for an early dinner. Able to walk in and be seated after a long day in the Old City.
Excellent service by server who had great recommendations for pizza and risotto dish. Added wine and our dinner was complete.
The view and breeze was amazing during our meal. Food was served hot, tasty and reasonably priced.
Highly recommend the location and food.

After taking a recommendation from our Taxi driver we managed to get a walk in table at lunchtime.
The staff were friendly and very attentive making a fuss of our 3 year old grandson and generally superb.
The food was very good and reasonably priced and the views fantastic. 
We will be returning

Amazing!! We loved this restaurant so much we came back to back nights! The atmosphere, food, views and service were just so amazing! Our server Vadran was a pleasure to have, he was attentive, educated on the menu, gave great tips around the city, and we never had to ask or wave him down. Great place! Must go!

The sea bass was divine and was something I would order again. The sea bass was seasoned perfectly. The chicken tagliatelle was basic I wish I would have ordered a different meal. 

Dessert was very enjoyable and filling. The orange cake was delicious and the almond and white chocolate cake was decent. 

Staff were very kind and assuring.
Price was typical Dubrovnik prices.
Such a nice restaurant with amazing food and views! The staff were also very nice and helpful to make my girlfriend’s birthday special!
Delicious food. Great atmosphere, very pleasant waiters and a beautiful view of the sea. Overall a great place to eat with family or friends
Beautiful spot overlooking the water. Great food and cocktails. Book early to get the best tables with a view. We had a great night and would highly recommend!
A great meal in a very impressive location. Food was brilliant with lots of choice within the menu. Would highly recommend!

Fantastic food and fantastic wait staff. Nothing but good things to say about Dubrovka. Waiters were some of the kindest and funniest people weve met in Croatia. Special shoutout to Duje, Vedran, and Zema (for the amazing food!) for making our nights and keeping us laughing all night long!

We were amazed that a restaurant is large as this and which was nearly full could provide such good and personable service. We didn't book early enough to get one of the front tables however set overlooking the garden and it was still beautiful. The food was top-notch, my ribeye steak was cooked medium rare to perfection and my wife's chickenwas delicious. The breads and side dishes were equally as good.

Perfect lunch with Duje as our waiter. 
Lunch was fantastic, view was good, and food was delicious. Would highly recommend

The staff at the restaurant were excellent. We book a table ahead of time for a 10 person sit down dinner and we got the most beautiful table with the perfect sunset view. The food was fantastic and the beverages are excellent aswell. Highly reccomend the gin Rose drink!
Excellent food , great service and amazing ambience . Stipe service was impeccable and served us with a smile . Great evening.

We were lucky enough to get a table here before sunset, and were treated to a lovely meal with an incredible view of the old town and water. 
A special thanks to Ivan who made sure that our entire experience was perfect, and had incredible knowledge of the food, drinks and location! 
Would highly recommend!

After having the panorama bus tour we stopped for a drink at this restaurant. We had almost finished our drinks and was watching the staff serve meals to other tables. Pizza looked lovey so we ordered one to share. Waitress cut our pizza and was very friendly . We thoroughly enjoyed our Pizza Bianca. Staff were friendly and efficient. Looked very smart in work wear.
Staff were so nice, view was amazing, went two nights and had the steak both nights and it was great, would definetly recommend

Basic Restaurant. The staff very nice but given the number of tables we are not in the romantic restaurant of Dubrovnik. It is an establishment at city prices with two courses, an aperitif and two coffees. 75 euros. It's almost the same price everywhere, the terrace is nice, it's good for lunch.

Brilliant location. Really good food.... especially the pizza. Staff were really helpful and attentive. We loved the place so much that we decided to have our lunch there on consecutive days.
One thing that stood out for me besides the food was that the staff were in no rush to clear the tables. This allowed us to enjoy lunch at a leisurely pace taking in the.amazing view to it's fullest.

Highly recommend.

Cannot say enough about how good this restaurant is - the staff are all amazing- even spoke Irish to wish us “slainte”. The food was really tasty and the cocktails were epic. I would recommend the house white it’s so much tastier than we expected.

This lovely seaside restaurant is a wonderful place to relax and enjoy a delicious meal. We dined on the terrace overlooking the shoreline, with beautiful views of the city as well. The food was amazing, and our waiter, Boban, was excellent . No one rushing us to finish. Best meal we’ve had on this trip!
We had a pleasant time on this beautiful terrace with a view of Dubrovnik. The servers are very nice and the service very good. THANKS
The food was fantastic, jure attend us like medieval kings!! Extraordinary!! The octopus plate fantastic. Pasta very well done!
Wonderful restaurant. Fabulous food. Delightful service and fabulous location. Reasonably priced too with a great vibe.
Such a great spot! Beautiful and great service. Duje was our server, and he was fantastic! So friendly and made our experience even better!

Very good address at the entrance to the city.
Beautiful view of both the water and the fortress.
Quite extensive menu, simple but quality dishes.
Canvases protect both from the sun and the rain.

Location was excellent and food was beautiful we booked a table at the edge overlooking the old fort. Wide selection of food and drinks on offer. Only reason for a 4 and not a 5 was our waiter was not over friendly and attentive. Value for money.

The best restaurant by far in Dubrovnik. Fish dish for 2 was exceptional. Duje the waiter was extremely attentive and went above and beyond to make our meal so special. Can't recommend this restaurant highly enough!

We eat here twice in a row as the setting was fantastic & the staff were so friendly & welcoming. 
The house white wine is very good. 
We had tuna salad, chicken, beef gratin with the gratin potatoes & fries. 
Prices were reasonable.

Jasmine was a fabulous waiter!! The food, and views are amazing. I had the octopus starter, then Sea-bass with an aray of deserts to sample. The pistachio was my favorite, then dark chocolate followed by almond cake. I also tasted the cream caramel and apple pie
Also the feta in the salad was amazing!!!

This restaurant has been a highlight of our trip to Croatia. View of the wall of the Old City was amazing enough. But the food and service with Jasmine were amazing.. Ordered the Feta Salad and Sea Bass and 5 of us ordered 5 desserts to share. This is not a tourist trap. Make a reservation and go!

Absolutely Amazing! 
The view was incredible, the food was delicious and the staff was superb! 
Jasmine was fabulous! I cannot wait to come back!
They deserve a Michelin Award. Service is fantastic. Everything about this place is wonderful. The view is incredible, seems like the coolest place in the world to have a meal.

Beautiful establishment on the side of the fortification, all on a terrace. If you want to be well placed, you must book. The dishes are good, the prices are in line for the area, which means quite expensive. From the first visit you are entitled to a voucher for 10% on the next one. Some servers ask for a tip, others don't, between 5 and 15%.
The chocolate cake is great for 6.80 e, the service is professional and efficient.
Great restaurant the food so good and great value for money in Dubrovnik. Would recommend the rib eye and the chicken tagliatelle with chilli olive oil.

One of my favourite places to eat in Dubrovnik. Either you come for breakfast,lunch or dinner you will not regret. Mussels, beefsteak, salmon and octopus are my favourite dishes. Try and you will not regret!
Definitely one of the best restaurant in Dubrovnik! One of the reasons to visit Dubrovnik again, Everything is so perfect, specially the stuff, great atmosphere, perfect location… food excellent

He was so lovely and accommodating 
Stipe was so sweet and helpful thank you so much (: 
Everyone please go here the food is amazing!

We had an amazing night, where every dish was a masterpiece and every bite was an experience to savor! seafood risotto, mortadella pizza, grilled octopus and lasagne were perfectly cooked !
The waiter of our table was exceptional, full of warmth and professionalism!
Prices are reasonable !

We went here tonight as we went to sister hotel last night and wanted to try a different meal 
We asked for a spot in the sun which was accommodated 
I had decided what I was having before I went 
The waiter Alexa listened , told us they were all very good but advised the baked sea bass to share 
He was so enthusiastic and knowledgeable about this dish we decided to try it and out of all the meals out I have had this was the best 
His serving of the meal was so entertaining and the food was just equisite 
I cannot recommend this venue or the staff enough

Great Restaurant with fantastic food which is also really good value for money. This was our third visit to the restaurant on this week holiday because we loved it so much. On this occasion Duje was our server. In each visit the servers have been very attentive. Great atmosphere and located with a sea view just outside of the city wall close to Pile gate. So would highly recommend eating here

Little and cold food for a lot of money. We passed by here from the old town and it was busy. Ordered a chicken fillet and a schnitzel here, especially the chicken fillet was very small and the schnitzel was not tasty.
Incredible restaurant, I could not fault it. Fantastic food, brilliant cocktails and great views! Definitely go!!!!

Popped in earlier for coffee then decided to have lunch. Absolutely fabulous. Duje looked after us, lovely smile and polite. Food was great, lovely fresh bread, pizza and a chicken salad, followed by a coffee. Lovely views, cool and airy on hot day. We will definitely be back
Great food, very friendly staff and incredible views. The sea bass was fantastically presented and absolutely delicious.

Sometimes you head into a restaurant on a whim, or because a nearby restaurant doesn't quite meet your budget (Nautika), and then experience one of the best meals (factoring in amazing service from our lovely waitress that I wish I could remember her name) that you've ever had. The special grilled octopus was the singular best meal I've ever had, and the rest was pretty special as well. We also took a gamble on the house red (1 litre!) which was lovely as we sat overlooking the old town and fort with blankets in hand. I love Croatia, and I loved this restaurant. Our biggest mistake was not coming the next night as we didn't want to impact the memory of the night we had!
Excellent food, served by the best waiter Duje excellent service. Will definitely visit again. A must in Dubrovnik. …………
The food,wine and view was amazing. The best meal I had in the old town and the prices were reasonable considering the service and location well worth a visit
Great ecperience with great food. Duje was very kind and we felt at home. Environment was great, must see. That was our first visit and definetely come back again

First I would like to say breakfast was delicious, we wanted to eat some warm eggs and their sunny side up was cooked to perfection. They gave us 3 baskets of fresh breads, jam, honey, marmalade. And the coffee was really good as well. Let’s not forget service was very good with the great view of the walls.
They were busy at the time we went but they did not rushed us at all.
And icing on top this place was very reasonable. Definitely I will recommend 👍👍👍

Stipe was service was awesome! Food was great. Best pizza we’ve had in Dubrovnik. And the terrace is unreal, right next to the old town walls.
My only recommendation is please get more local beer variety like amber ales, ipas, pale ales, etc.

location: Charlotte Harbor & the Gulf Islands, Florida
review: It was my first day in the Old Town. Before we entered the town, we had breakfast here. Duje is great server and good service. We liked the omelette there. We sat right next to the water and the view was perfect.

The staff were very friendly and the food was perfect for Japanese tastes. The location is also great, you can eat while looking at the ocean! I went there twice, once in the evening and once in the morning!

We ate here today and it rained heavily near the end of our meal and the staff were great trying to help everyone and make them all comfortable so fair play top them. We ate here 8 years ago and today was very good again, great food, good value for this area and great views.

Service was friendly and food was excellent - was located outside “the wall” and recommended by our hotel “inside the wall” - great options for view, heaters and blankets provided for sitting outside and BEAUTIFUL VIEW!!!

Only gave this restaurant a 4 star as they did mess up our booking and one member of staff was unhelpful.
I filled up the online form while in the UK but never got an email reply. Once we arrived we went to the restaurant and said we had tried to book and would there we a table available that evening. The waitress/ greeter was very unfriendly and just said they were fully booked and we could come back later for a drop in table. We did this and another girl was greeting. She said there was a table free and then my husband happened to notice that my name was down on the list of bookings for that evening! …. The moral of this story is never just assume that if you don’t receive an email that the booking has not been done lol! 
The restaurant was lovely, nice blankets to keep us warm. They gave us a nice table on the waters edge and we had to enormous good pizzas. Service was good and we got a discount with our city pass.

I think this service is a bit rubbish! After we asked to change tables because of the rain, the man's face fell apart! But what a request we made! The unfriendly service for customers is impressive! Never coming back!
great service, nice view, great bread. right along the water, they have blankets and heaters for outside. good pizza!!
Our server Duje was very friendly n responsive. The food was perfect with the view of the city wall. And the chef has made some unique beef fillet
Visited twice for ice cream that was amazing. Not had this level of quality for some time. Very good value for money and very very good choice of flavours.
Very beautiful view around old town and the sea, friendly and welcoming staff. Pizza was really good and so tasty! Would recommend this for everyone!
Pleasant terrace provided you are in the 1st row on the pier side! Helpful staff who could also smile and chat with tourists!

Food is not good at all specially for prices like that. 
Have cocktail here go somewhere else to eat.
Sea food plate for 35 euro was disappointing small cold and very unpleasant taste ate just because was hungry.

We thoroughly enjoyed our lunch here.
Great welcome, very well trained and professional staff, great food and service.fantastic atmosphere and location.
Food delicious !
This is an extremely well managed establishment

Really fresh food, especially good for seafood. I had octopus salad, which was not only delicious but also surprisingly filling. Friendly staff and excellent eating environment near Fort Imperial. Prices are reasonable, especially given the prime location.

Best dinner we had in 5 days traveling through Croatia. My wife was celebrating her birthday and they reserved us one of the best tables on the terrace.
We were served by Mário who was very friendly, always helpful and with a great sense of humor!!!
When they brought dessert, my wife's had a candle and said happy birthday.
It was a fantastic experience and the food was great!
Congratulations to everyone and especially to the employee SUPER MÁRIO!👏👏👏👏
the team takes great care, the dishes are top notch. We highly recommend! pizzas are really good, the Burata one is killing. desserts are amazing.

Dubravka is a charming restaurant with a beautiful view of the sea and fort, very atmospheric. We went to celebrate my wife’s birthday and our honeymoon and we were treated really well, our waiter Stipe was very courteous and friendly. The food was delightful and reasonably priced. We had a lovely time!
Absolutely brilliant service from lovely knowledgeable staff. We felt like we had personalised service all night with extensive information about each dish. Excellent food . Excellent service

It was a wonderful restaurant with a panoramic view of the Adriatic Sea from the terrace seats! 
We had carpaccio, seafood pizza, Dalmatian steak, and baked potatoes, and everything was delicious and we were very satisfied (the pizza in particular was packed with the flavor of seafood and was amazing!). 
Hvala!
Fantastic and fast service, friendly staff, delicious food and amazing views while here for dinner during a short holiday.

Alexa was the BEST host for our evening, he recommended us the fish that was just delicious - fresh, juicy and flavourful. The atmosphere and service of this place is exceptional. Would definitely recommend this lovely seaside delight!

Fantastic views of the city walls, delicious food (try the seabass!), but most of all - incredible service. Alexa was such an attentive and charming waiter who really did his all to give us such an enjoyable experience.

excellent meals and
hospitality 
especially truffe pasta and seafoods
also, grate location
we have enjoyed so much
Thank you Stipe !

Incredibly good location of the restaurant, but unfortunately the food was not as high quality. Ordered sea bass but two out of three fillets were full of bones and otherwise quite tasteless. The potato gratin that was ordered together contained meat, which was not mentioned. Also arrogant waiters. Very disappointed with the overall.

Stopped here for dinner whilst visiting the old town. It is perfectly located just outside the walls of the old town with picturesque views of the sea.

The only negative of the restaurant was that there was quite a few pigeons which can be off putting when having dinner especially as they come very close to you by the wall.

The focaccia bread to start with was delightful. I opted for a pizza whilst my wife opted for “Spaghetti with tomate sauce” which was listed as a hot starter but the portion size was certainly a main which was great. Both dishes tasted really nice and the prices for a restaurant of that quality of food and views were really good and reasonable.

Would certainly recommend although if they could find a way of keeping the pigeons away that would make it outstanding.

Located just outside the walled Old Town, this would seem to be a "tourist trap," and there's little doubt it's full of tourists. But it's also a glorious setting between the wall and a huge outcropping in the Adriatic with a really lovely view. The service was excellent, and the food was very good as well. Relaxing, charming, tasty!
Fantastic place with a great view and very friendly service. I would strongly recommend this place on your visit to Dubrovnik.
The food was amazing, risotto was great and flavourful. The service was excellent, staff was friendly and helpful. Wine was great
Very nice ambience and views, seafood risotto was very good. Comaga and tomake were very friendly and attentive. Reccomended

We didn’t have a reservation but decided on this restaurant bc of its prime location and menu. We were seated quickly without a wait. I had the sea bass and my husband had the chicken, both were cooked perfectly and fresh. The presentation justified the price point and Alexei, our server, he was expedient and attentive. No complaints and the romantic ambiance helped us have a great night overall.
Gorgeous location just next to Dubrovnik walls with beautiful view over the sea. Chicken tagliatelle was delicious- lots of chicken and nice fresh pasta.

We were in this place for drinks in the evening and breakfast in the morning. Especially the breakfast was great, Alex who was the one looked after us is a very welcoming and professional person. Highly recommend this place, good prices for good quality food and drinks. Especially try the italian coffee!

Wow - beautiful location, staff amazing, food the best we’ve had so far in Dubrovnik. My wife had Sea Bass and my Som and I had the Gratinated Fillet Beef with potatoes / fries and Veg shared. Honestly amazing food and service - we’re only here for a few days but we’ll be back here for sure… brilliant service thank you…

Picturesque spot outside the walls of the city and next to the sea. Cozy and elegant vibe. Friendly staff, specially Stipe. He has been really attentive and polite all night.
Food was delicious!
Highly recommended, specially at night with the cozy lights.
The food was great, best pasta with truffle ever! Great wine, view and vibe. The waiter Duje was really nice in treating and caring for us.
Beautiful spot with an amazing waiter. Stipe made sure we were well taken care of! Highly recommend if you ever visit Dubrovnik.

Amazing! The service I received was impeccable - I literally strolled up without a reservation and the hostess gave me the best corner table with the most unbelievable view! The food is stunning, the seafood risotto is a must! The servers were so attentive and friendly. Will definitely come back here again!

Very tasty pizza with very good service.
The drinks are a bit expensive, but the price for the main courses is fair.
There are 10% discount coupons for this, which you can get at the ice cream parlor next door, for example... so the prices are completely reasonable again.
Wonderful view of the sea and the bay!
Beautiful location and reasonable prices. Lovely to eat next to the sea view. Our waiter Stipe was fantastic. Would recommend to anyone in Old Town

Close to our hotel - with fabulous views. Not too expensive - very helpful friendly attentive staff. While many restaurants were closed or empty (March) - this one had quite a few customers - we ate there 2 nights.
Food was delicious and generous portions. The Assorted Fish plate was fresh and delicious. The service was impeccable even on a rainy, windy night in March.

The food was delicious (we had a pork dish with a parsnip purée) and we felt welcome! Our waiter was fun and knowledgeable, and he was happy to share his recommendations, including the applecake! We sat outside, and any chill went away quickly with the blankets that were supplied. Really great experience.

During my recent visit to Dubrovnik, I had the pleasure of dining at Dubravka restaurant, and it was an experience to remember. For breakfast, I indulged in a delicious ham and cheese omelette, which was cooked to perfection. Later, for dinner, I opted for the assorted fish platter accompanied by a Long Island Iced Tea, and every bite was a symphony of flavors. The ambiance was charming, complemented by breathtaking views. I thoroughly enjoyed my meals and would highly recommend Dubravka for anyone visiting Dubrovnik.

Dubravka 1836 offers the best service, food, ambiance, and iconic views of Dubrovnik if you enjoy dining alfresco on a sunny afternoon. We were lucky with the March weather. Three days in a row of sun and sixty degree temperatures on the patio.

But what made dining here so memorable was the kind, attentive service of the wait staff. All had a sense of humor and all were attentive. We dined here 3 of the 4 day we had in Dubrovnik.

The quality of the food was excellent. I had the seafood rissotto on two days and a pizza on the third. I'd rate my entrees a 5 (on a 5-point scale). My wife had the tuna and chicken caesar salad. She'd rate the tuna salad a 5 and the chicken salad a 4. 

But what made this special was how you were treated-- greeted warmly and politely and made to feel as part of a family.

Mario was our waiter on our third and last visit on the sunny afternoon of March 23. We enjoyed a repartee that not only enhanced our dining experience but made me feel especially fond of this city. I think, perhaps, the wait staff in a city's restaurants are the most influential good will ambassadors the city has.

We have ordered mezze pasta and seafood risotto , both looks amazing, then the taste was delicious.
Nice atmosphere, professional service and beautiful view from the terrace. Highly recommend!

Beautiful terrace with a great view, friendly and courteous staff. 
When the sun disappeared for a moment, blankets were handed out straight away. The ashtray we used was always changed immediately.
The prices are a bit high, though. We had a mixed fish platter. It was quite expensive for not much fish, but really delicious. 
The pizzas at the next table were very large and not only looked good, but also smelled great. 
The cocktails were also very tasty.
You can stay here for quite a while.
Excellent food, outstanding service, great atmosphere! The regional cuisine offers first-class quality, fish fresh from the water, and perfectly prepared side dishes!
The food was excellentn Ivan recommended the apple pie and it was delicious. He was a wonderful server and we hope to come back and dine again.
Had a great time at dinner with Ivan as our server. Appreciated the great and friendly service. Highly recommend them! Great atmosphere to have any meal.
We had outstanding service,great food and drink, and a beautiful location. The blankets and heaters are a nice amenity!

The location of this restaurant couldn’t be better just outside the city walls and right on the edge of the sea. Went for a coffee initially but liked it so much went back several times and even returned for my partners birthday meal. Food was delicious and beautifully presented. However what makes the place special is the waiting staff. All extremely professional but friendly pleasant and nothing is too much trouble.
Went with my girlfriend and some friends and had a great meal, I’d recommend the tortellini. Nom nun nom num, mmmmmmmmmm

Food is okay. Didnt like being asked for a review. Not all waiters speak English. Fine for a more casual dinner. More choice than other places. We're only given option to sit outside when it's quite cold.

Great setting, a view to die for, service was brilliant, food and drink was the best, highly recommended, we started our trip with lunch here and ended with lunch here, the best , staff really nice, thank you

Amazing food, great view and really friendly people. Great atmosphere to have lunch. We had simple spaghetti and Greek salad. Everything tasted fresh and tasty. The waves crashing on the Fort just added to the ambience.
Attractive location at main gates (pile), very tasty pasta and sea food, very kind personal. Afordable prices, recommend!

Absolutely amazing restaurant with really good views. The food and drink was very well priced and tastes delicious too. Josip, one of the waiters, was very attentive and was more than happy to help. Will definitely be coming again!
Great food! Lovely view! Definitely worth coming back, especially outside on a sunny day. The view to the bay is magnificent.

You can't beat the location, right on the wall overlooking Fort Lovrijenac and the city walls. Beautiful location at night if you can get a table on the edge. After a long day on the water, this was a refreshing place for a meal. We got seafood and a very good bottle of white to go with it. Everything was well seasoned and prepared. The staff was attentive and the price point was good for the quality.
Excellent menu, delightful staff, fabulous view, this is our ‘go to ‘ place each time we have been in Croatia
Definitely my favourite place in Dubrovnik. And for breakfast, for lunch and for dinner. I recommend to everyone. I love Dubrovnik and this place too
I went twice. Once for dinner, and once for breakfast. Both times the food was excellent. But I love a great breakfast. I can’t get sick of that view either

Stopped here with our tour guide Maria. Had drinks only because our tour included lunch. Excellent view of the harbor area and unique location next to the Pile Gate. Very busy at lunch time. Waitress was very patient with us from the USA.

We visited this restaurant as a couple for drinks and an evening meal in March 2022: The location is breathtaking and when we booked again to bring our kids to Dubrovnik later the same year: we knew they would be happy! The third time we decided to use this place for it's strengths: a beautiful Pizzeria and Italian inspired restaurant. We had a beautiful experience and gorgeous pizzas: a pianist and a murmuration of swallows flying across the sunset sky! We all loved it, the bill was fab: top tip: get a carafe of wine! Also look at this photo!

This was the first restaurant we stopped at on our weeks stay nearby.
Straight off the No.6 bus & it’s at the side of the cliff overlooking “Kings Landing” and “The Red Keep”. 
It was always busy, which says a lot. 
Staff were always friendly and helpful and the prices reasonable (for Dubrovnik). Most of the staff appeared to be Chelsea fans - a bonus!
Pizza & chips (1 pizza will do for 2 people) - great.
Beer & drinks cold.
Great view.
There’s also an Ice Cream parlour and gift shop in the same building (great Gelato in many flavours and €1 euro cheaper than in the old town).
Can highly recommend the seafood risotto and the spaghetti bolenese.
Great place to stop & people watch.

The ice-cream parlour is great ! Good value for money and the staff are very friendly. We loved the black chocolate ice cream so we came back later in the day to get it however it was no longer on display 😫 However the staff recognised us from before and offered 2 large ice-creams for free! It was a lovely surprise ☺️

We went there on our first night and were so impressed with the food and service that we ate there for the next 5 nights. The service and atmosphere were very good, the staff always had a smile and were friendly. HOWEVER on the last night it was like going to a different restaurant. The service was slow and one member of staff was curt with their replies from our questions. The food arrived eventually but the fries were cold - they very quickly brought new hot fries but the rest of the food was cooling whilst this happened. The atmosphere was completely different to our previous visits.
We voted with our feet on the last night as we did not want to leave Dubrovnik with negative thoughts.

Called in for breakfast, had eggs and bacon with gf bread.
Nice to find some where that has gf options. The waiter gave us a 10% off voucher for our next visit, sadly, due to the horrendous weather and the end of the stay it wasn't used.
Great place for brunch. Came at around 11 and was quickly seated. Service was great and the views were too.

Really wonderful food and kind, efficient service. We really enjoyed the sound of the sea in the background. Our cute waiter was very knowledgeable, and he even gifted me his lighter since I needed one and the stores are closed on Sundays :) Would come again anytime!
As is so often the case with eateries in fabulous locations, the food was very ordinary. So many better choice-enjoy a drink but eat elsewhere.

The best restaurant we’ve been to in Dubrovnik. The restaurant is a beautiful setting overlooking the old town fort, right by the sea. Decor was stunning and the food was 10/10 couldn’t recommend this place enough. We had the rib eye steak (Dalmatia style) and it was perfection. Wonderful service also and great prices as most places in Dubrovnik are extortionate. Will definitely be coming back.
It was a nice restaurant with a view of the sea. I ordered seafood risotto and burrata cheese pizza. Both were delicious and it was a great lunch. Thank you to the waiter Blaz for the great service.

Spotted the terrace here when we were walking the walls and came for drinks afterwards. Lovely waterfront views and enjoyed our wine and beer. We were given a voucher and came back for drinks later in the week. Very welcoming indeed

We loved this place. The breakfasts were wonderful, the omlettes enormous, with breads (including gluten free), jams, honey, a sort of Nutella spread; great coffee and green tea. We went back for dinner one night; my seafood risotto was cooked to perfection and, for a change, the rice was not crunchy. My wife's pizza Buratta was a good size and she thoroughly enjoyed it.

Perfect place to have peaceful breakfast with gorgeous view. 
It has menu with vas variety of dishes. We ordered omlette and got plenty of bread, jams and honeys. We made friend with pidgeon that was hopping on the fence. 
Beautiful experience, fast service, delicious food.

We had lunch here. Nice pleasant shady shady seat with view of the fort

I had the king prawns and my husband had the seafood tagliatelle. To be honest, my prawns were not as sweet as I hoped, but they were large and fresh. The tagliatelle was delicious even though the seafood was tiny!

Service was impeccable. The waiter Davor was very friendly and helpful. He made good recommendations and gave us a nice container to take home some leftovers.

The food and service is great. We had 4 meals: pizza prsut, mijesana salata, ravioli tartufima and spaghetti bolognese. Good price point. We were able to get a discount since we have dubrovnik pass. Devor was nice and accommodating. If you need to splurge on a nice dinner, go here at Restaurant Noci Bar.
Food is good and reasonably priced. Try their prosciutto pizza! Very generous toppings. Excellent service from Davor too!

I'm from japan.
Lunch was very delicious!!!
Jasmin is very friendly and accommodating!!!
I'll come back later :)

More than happy with this place. We sat by the harbour wall, service was friendly and the food good, if not stunning.

Seemed half decent value compared to restaurants within the city too.

Ate here 6 out of 7 nights but service on last evening was poor. Ordered veal snitzel and starter veal not available. Fries were cold but were changed immediately. Had been much better on the nights before.

The food and service was great.
The atmosphere and the view was excellent. We were able to enjoy the sunset. The waiter took great care of us.

This restaurant is situated just out side the town walls by the bus stops. Has a great location , nice music and really lovely food. We visited twice and you get a discount on the second visit. All the waiting staff were very good . We are a group of 4 friends celebrating birthdays and would definitely recommend a visit to this restaurant. If we visit again we will !
Order bread is very testy with the oil. Nice pizza and house winęe, grilled squid and vegetables. Enjoy
I liked the waiter Antun . Very pleasant. He was Also very patient . The scenery was beautiful. Breathtaking

I have no clue how this place has such good ratings. Maybe for lunch or dinner but breakfast was a terrible experience. There were so many flies and tons of ants if you sit near the wall. The service was painfully slow, could never get a waiter to come near our section. Others seated around us were having the same issue. The food wasn’t anything special. Not worth the waiting and atmosphere.
Beautiful location, delicious food and friendly service. Prices were not too bad compared to other restaurants, you also get a 10% discount with the Dubrovnik pass.

I walked past here an hour ago, just after breakfast, but I was immediately fascinated by this restaurant. The simple and open dining area faces the beautiful harbor, with sails and blue water. It was early and not crowded, so we found a table with the best view and sat down. Since we were quite full, we only ordered a grilled fish (the fish skin was crispy and the fish meat was very tender), a bottle of wine, and a free basket of bread (the taste was great). The bread was eaten up, and the restaurant actually sent another basket of bread (it can be seen that they are very proud of the popularity of the bread), which made us a little embarrassed. The service was very friendly. Highly recommended.
Could not fault our experience. Food, location and service were outstanding and we had the most amazing time at Dubravka whilst visiting Dubrovnik.

Jasmine and his colleagues served us. Their attention detail is unmatched. Beautiful setting and very personal. 

Drinks continuously replenished. Food was stunning. Throughly reccomend.
Food, service, and location are all great. We got a spot near the water and the sun was setting over the water! Amazing!

Excellent food, great views, solid service!
Special thanks to Jasmin for giving us the best service! We came here twice in 4 days, don’t miss this spot, the food and experience is so well worth it!

Beautiful location, nice food, excellent service! (Also the rice is reasonable) Thers’s no reason not to visit here. 
Meal was served with bread which is good. 
같이 주신 빵도 고소하고 맛있었어요!!쨈을 종류별로 넉넉하게 주셔서 더 좋았다는😍
Excellent place, good atmosphere. Perfect service for (given the site).reasonable prices. Recommended!

Superb location with covered outdoor seating, good food and great service, so we visited twice. The first visit my wife had a house wine 4.30 euros and I had a large beer 0.5L Karlova 7.80 euros. My wife had sea bass, 27.60 and I had a pepperoni pizza, nice kick to it, 16.00 and a side order of bread at 2.00 euros. 
On the second visit my wife had the seafood platter, 33.00 Euros and I was predictably and had the same as the first visit. Now after our first visit we were presented with a 10% off card, that came in handy for our second visit. 
I do feel there is an element of mark-up because of the location, but as stated in the opening line, I did feel you were getting value. Recommended.

Our waiter was Jasmine and he was awesome. He recommended pizza because I wanted pizza, he recommended dessert, which is fabulous. The entire staff at this restaurant was awesome.
