We come all the way from Las Vegas Nevada and we know how important service is. It was a great restaurant to eat at which was recommended by our taxi driver, and our taxi driver’s brother is a chef here. Thank you very much.
Lovely venue for a meal out at the Castle Walls. Service fast and food delicious. Highly recommend.

Food are excellent. Very polite & attentive staff. Can't fault any.
Will ddfinitely recomrnd. Must place to eat if you're in Dubrovnik

Dubravka served us the best quality and delicious food in Dubrovnik - we had lunch and dinner here - seafood risotto, seafood tagliatelle, and the assorted fish plate. 
We used the 10% discount, and that made it not so expensive (when compared to the other places in the city). Anita, our server, was very friendly and chatted with us despite being busy.
It was really nice for lunch, and I love the view of Adriatic sea. Food was really nice also. I recommend this restaurant.

Nice place and really friendly service staff! Prices of food here are slightly cheaper from the restaurants in the old town, and you get further discount if you have Dubrovnik Pass. Food are also pretty good.. the restaurant is bery spacious, lots of seats with nice view of Fort Lovrijenac. Recommended 👍
This is a great place to eat! Food is good! Great location! The staff is very friendly and kind! Love Dubrovnik !

A very special spot for lunch with an incredible view! Everything was lovely from top to bottom. Great food and exceptional service. Our waiter Jasmine was professional and attentive and most personable. Highly recommend this GEM of a place by the sea. It will not disappoint <3

nice place with food being good the service was ok but nothing of a wow factor.
seriously croatians have a hard time smiling..

Went for lunch on our anniversary; our waiter Jazmin, heard about and brought us a special dessert for the ocassion. Service was excellent. Restaurant was recommend by the hotel and they were not wrong. Loved it!
Great place with a spectacular view over the city walls. Delicious food and friendly service. Definitely worth to visit!
Amazing experience. Jasmin was an amazing server. Food was delicious. We really enjoyed the meal and the view. I love it here

We ate here twice on our short break as the food was excellent, service was quick and friendly and while it was full, the outdoor seating overlooking the city walls was a lot less noisy than inside the Old Town.

I happened to stop by during my travels and visited twice. The Neapolitan pizza recommended by the staff is very delicious, and you can get a 10% discount if you show your Dubrovnik card!! The price is good and the atmosphere is great.. Be sure to check it out.
The food was really good and the waiters were super nice! I would recommend this to everyone, the view is also really pretty!

We had a night in Dubrovnik and decided to come here for tea - we had made a reservation and was pleased as it was very busy! We had a wonderful view of the city walls! Even though it was busy the Service was good and the food was lovely! Lovely location and food - recommend booking!

Mediocre food prepared in bland ways and served by an indifferent staff.
There are more than 400 restaurants in Dubrovnik, so avoid this place if possible.
Amazing food with even better cocktails (sweet and green). May have to wait a little bit for a table but I would say it’s worth it. Great portion sizes and friendly staff!

This place was recommended by our host as a good place for breakfast.
We managed to get a table for two without a reservation, and we were seated by the wall overlooking the sea and City Walls.
Our breakfast consisted of scrambled egg, fruit juice, coffee, warm bread, and warm croissants - absolutely delicious.
Only downside was the persistent flies and pigeons walking around - but the restaurant had no control over these Maybe use some insect repellent before visiting 
Overall, this was a great way to start the day, and would recommend.

Fantastic place to slow down and just absorb the beautiful ambience. Seafood is excellent, the feta cheese so creamy unlike what I’ve tried previously. Jasmine our fantastic waiter gave great recommendations including a fabulous apple dessert which turned out to be an unexpected delight. Worth coming here to enjoy the vibe and the views, it’s not cheap but money well spent.
Service was amazing. My elderly parents felt cold so blankets were provided asap. Squid, feta salad, pizza and apple cake were all delicious. We all ate far too much.
amazing food and atmosphere. service was also really great, especially our waiter gibi who accommodated us perfectly throughout the night. definitely recommend
Amazing food, atmosphere and service. Would 100% recommend. We had the salmon pasta and lasagne it was unreal !!!

We tried to book a table. But their bookings were full for 10 days. So we turned up at 9pm and were seated within 2 minutes. Amazing setting. Our waiter was superb. Knowledgeable. Great recommendations. Super friendly. The wine and the food were all wonderful. And all for 100€ a couple including wine and 3 courses. This was a spectacular evening. Thank you
This spot is great for a dinner with a view over the sea! Prices as well are great, our server was absolutely lovely !!
The service was amazing, waiter was amazing and provided us with great service and vouchers. Above that the food great!
The food was amazing, the view was incredible and the service was absolutely impeccable. Thankyou so much

We had dinner here on the final night of our stay in Dubrovnik. It’s just outside the city walls and we had a great view as day turned to night. Great service, we had a relaxed cocktail with the cheese plate, then mains when we were ready, together with an excellent wine recommendation from the waiter. Food was good - huge range of fish and meaty options as well as pizza.

We stumbled upon this restaurant and very quickly realised it was something special. So good in fact that we came back a second night. Shout outs to Dora, Ange, Mario, and the chef who broke all the rules and did a well done eye fillet for one of our party. This restaurant made our visit to Dubrovnik very special. The view from the deck is stunning!
Fabulous meal for our last night in Dubrovnik. Beautiful setting with front row view of the walls. Staff were very attentive and made our experience very enjoyable. Would highly recommend!

I had booked the restaurant as a recommendation from a friend and it did not disappoint!! 
Jasmine served us and was brilliant! Quick service and very polite and helpful! 
Food was amazing!! 
Would defiantly recommend!! A*
Really enjoyed our lunch here and drinks, Jasmin was a very good waiter!! He was friendly and helpful, got our food and drinks quickly. He even recommended the sister restaurants nearby.

Had two dinners and one lunch at Restaurant 1836.The food in all visits was very good.The feta and pepper salad starter stood out.Service and staff were excellent.Would recommend this restaurant without hesitation.

The restaurant was amazing the service exceptional, perfect location especially for our anniversary dinner. 
Also they made us a special dessert with congratulations note. 
The waiters it was kind , and very friendly. 
Also the price was average, the food was amazing.
Highly recommended

I wasn’t sure if this would be too touristy a spot for lunch but I was so pleasantly surprised. The terrace has a beautiful view and the service here wa so lovely - huge thank you to Jasmine!! I never felt rushed and felt well looked after here, which is always a treat as solo traveler. I enjoyed a Mediterranean G&T with some of the local cheese and a fish carpaccio to start. All delicious!! Seafood is really the way to go here as it’s lo super fresh. I had the sea bass for my main and it was beautifully cooked. Some local pinot grigio made it a perfect meal. I’m only sorry I didn’t have room for dessert as the cakes looked incredible! This is truly a lovely spot to sit and enjoy a leisurely meal and feel the breeze off the water. Highly recommend!!
Fast and very friendly service. Ideal location. Tasty meal and good value for money for Dubrovsnik.

Very disappointed...the waiter was very unfriendly...the food was completely overpriced...the taste was average...we ordered 2 cocktails which were very watered down!!!!f. We won't be eating there again...a complete rip-off of holidaymakers...
Very nice service, great food, and of course perfect location! The staff here are absolutely friendly! Nice place for a break however enjoying the nice view.

Very pleasant spot, with a very nice view and a cozy light at dinner. Great food (I highly recommend the sea food risotto), very nice staff (promptly accepted our medium size puppy giving him water), very nice ambiance. Highly recommend !!!

Great food, view, and service
Would recommend this for family and friends, and anyone who likes seafood. tagliatelle was spectacular.
Amazing food with amazing views. Lovely staff, very friendly and polite. Deserves a big 5 star. Next to the wall and sea.

AMAZING EXPERIENCE!!!
Everything was great from beginning to the end! 
We came without reservations and the hostess sat us in a table with the best view in less than 5 minutes.

The server, Ivan Raguž was spectacular!
The gave us great recommendations for starters and main dishes.
The prosciutto pizza is the best we ever had !!! And Tagliatelle pasta also outstanding. Also the prices for the cocktails are on average price range compare to other places in old town without the beautiful setting that this restaurant offers!

5 stars!!!
great service and very friendly staff. 10/10 experience with amazing views and lovely atmosphere.

Loved it! Had lunch here twice during our visit to Dubrovnik. Great location, beautiful view, diverse menu with something for everyone, great cocktails and EXECELLENT service! Make sure you get one of their discount cards for all three of their restaurants, which gives you 10% off!

Great view, especially in the evening.
The prices are a bit higher due to the service and the view, but they are absolutely justified and acceptable!
Very attentive waiters :)
Worth it
Perfect location , food was delicious and friendly staff ,reasonably priced , our 2nd visit this week
Thank you to Jasmin for his kind service. Beautiful views for a meal around the old town! Great spot for food if you're visiting the town walls.

Lovely location. Service ok. I had a seafood taster which was cold apart from one bit of fish and it all tasted odd. The salmon was undercooked. There was a paste on the plate also which tasted not pleasant. Side salad ok. Wouldn’t go back, sure there’s much better and better for value places to go in Dubrovnik….
Excellent food, the steak was outstanding. Staff are very friendly and attentive. Would definitely recommend and will return if I am in the area in the future.
Good food, with fresh ingredients. Efficient staff. Medium-high prices. Pretty expensive wines.

Very beautiful setting with a nice view between the entrance to the Dubrovnik fortress and the sea.
Very kind and smiling staff.
Varied and very good choice of meals.
A bit expensive for some dishes.
One of the best views I’ve ever seen. My lunch was great and Jasmine, my waiter was incredible. The next time I’m in Dubrovnik, I’ll try their breakfast. Thank you for such a good time.
Great place for family lunch. They wasn’t no waiting for a table for 6. Great food and reasonably priced for Dubrovnik!
Very fast service and everything very good, we found the water expensive, 50 ml for 5.30....but hey, the beautiful views.
Very friendly staff, great views, close to the old town. We only ate a small breakfast. So can’t really comment on the quality of the food.
One of a kind view, excellent beautifully prepared meal, AMAZING waiter who was very friendly and did not rush us!! Will be returning!!
Beautiful ambience and very high-quality service. The food was uneven and somewhat cold. In general, it didn't spoil my enjoyment and lunch. This restaurant is worth visiting
Great food, great service and great location. We went for breakfast and it was brilliant, waiter was very helpful and gave us some tips for the rest of our trip!
Very good cuisine with prices in the average price in Dubrovnik which are already very high pleasant setting perfect service
I would highly recommend this lovely place, with excellent cuisine and impeccable, professionnel service with abundance of charm!

We went for afternoon cocktails and starters. The food and venue is perfect. Brilliant views of the water. The staff especially Lucca were very professional and friendly. Really good cocktails. The staff shouldn't have to wear long trousers, long sleeved shirts and ties in this crazy heat. Surely a health hazard for them! Time to rethink their uniform. You can still look professional in shorts and short sleeve shirts.

Amazing location, food and cocktails. An all round 10/10. We didn’t try and book until the day-of and when we tried it was fully booked for a while. However, we tried at about 5pm and got a fantastic table outside.
The Chef’s beefsteak that the staff recommend was good. And staffs were kind. The price is reasonable.
Quality ingredients very nice spot good shaded area helpful staff. On the ramparts of Dubrovnik.. View of the water.

NICE VIEW AND FRIENDLY SERVERS!
and the food was great I think most Korean might enjoy the food of here.

Very nice view and music, friendly server
The food was very delicious
I want to recomand this place
Excellent food service and location. Nothing was too much trouble for the waiters and they were super attentive. Quality of food and drinks was excellent.
This spot has a wonderful selection for any palate. The feta salad was incredible, and I will definitely be back for the homemade ice cream

Excellent service and a good welcome. The view is incredible and the weather is good. All palates will be catered for with meat, fish, pizza, salad and pasta dishes. The prices are also affordable but more expensive for meat and fish. The cocktails are very good, especially the Basilico.m (very cold). There is often a wait for this restaurant but just give your name and wait to be called.
A very nice place for dinner. Not too expensive considering location, we got two mains for a total of €33. The staff is also extremely polite and helpful. The view is also great
Great food with a great view! And nice service! Plenty of shade to help cool you off in the summer!!
Try the quatro formicci pizza, it is beyond superb, the view is truly magnificent with the sea right in front of the super castle.
Amazing food and service in a beautiful location. The apple pie is out of this world goodness. Highly recommended for a leisurely lunch.
Very nice View, good food And friendly service from Stipe. I will definitely come back, thank you For everything.
Nice location at the gateway to the old town. very nice setting and good, simple and affordable cuisine.
Very nice place to have lunch. The food was very delicious and the waiters were very friendly. We already went twice and we will surely return.
food was delicious and the service was fantastic! I highly recommend this restaurant with a stunning view! 😍😍😍

lots of people and very large terrace
fast service
the menu is very varied
ideal for family
the dishes were good but the quantity was a little light
be careful, the bill adds up very quickly

Nale was an incredible waiter, spot on with everything, everything we asked for was served impeccably. The food was incredible. Compliments to the chef. We came for my Dad's 60th birthday and were very well looked after. Couldn't have asked for a better venue, atmosphere or food. The cocktails were lovely too. Highly recommended a visit. You won't be disappointed.

Great food, amazing view and lovely service. Our waitress was kind and polite and all in all, we had a wonderful experience. I advise everyone to make a reservation well in advance though, because the restaurant is always booked up and you wouldn’t want to miss this.

Great breakfast with a really nice view. Located right next to the old town and therefore a little away from the hustle and bustle. Mr. Brkovic anticipated our every wish and made breakfast a relaxing experience.

The food is not bad, but a beer €7.80??? It is clear that you pay for the views, which are very pleasant. For two pizzas, an octopus salad, two bottles of water and three beers they cost us €90. I see it excessive.

Amazing restaurant in a great setting. No problem getting a table at 6pm and had a perfect table with a lovely view. We all had pizzas and they were perfect. Service was exemplary. Prices were extremely reasonable and highly recommended

LOVE that Luca the waiter brought us a small bucket of ice which was much appreciated! I had the salmon with capers which was delicious and my friend had the chicken salad which was quite large compared to anything else we've had. Prices were reasonable and the view was excellent. Highly recommend

Very enjoyable and, above all, a very tasty meal with 5 people.
The fish platter was richly filled, the steak was perfect and the salmon delicious.
For dessert we had ice cream and cheesecake. The portions are quite large and made with taste.
We had to wait quite a while before a table became available, but it was definitely worth it.
Nice place, it looks very cozy and the service is great!

Excellent location by the sea in the old town of Dubrovnik so many senses are already satisfied even before you start having the meal. The food and service is outstanding and top class and an experience not to be missed

Of the 4 days we spent in Dubrovnik, 3 days we had lunch at the Dibravka restaurant. Very tasty, beautifully presented food, excellent service, and most importantly: being in a fairly crowded place, next to an important landmark, the restaurant maintains a feeling of calm and comfort. The waiters are great! Male waiters are tall and handsome 😂
loved the experience here by Jasmin. funny and cheerful and made the lunch here all the more worth it!
Good service, the best lasagne! I really recommend this place! 🤩 the restaurant has a great view! A little long waiting time, so perhaps reserve a table beforehand! 🤷🏼‍♀️

Surprise!
In the old town center, very good space, elegance, very good food and very good service!!
Is it touristic? Maybe but amazing tourist restaurant
Fantastic service for our anniversary meal. The food was amazing, and the view was to die for. We were looked after from start to finish by Anita! Thanks so much ❤️❤️
Food was excellent and the service was amazing. We were so well looked after on our first night in Dubrovnik that we returned to this restaurant on our last night.

Although the location is great and the service is decent, the food is average at best. They clearly attract their crowds purely by their history and location. I ordered the fish tasting platter (a little piece of a variety of fish) and it was so over cooked and dry (the calamari was rubbery and charred). The side of Swiss chard (which I am normally a fan of) was so mushy and bland. Prices are not cheap either. The octopus salad starter was good. Recommend you find something else.

Wow - this place is unreal. The food was excellent. The service was just as good. Lovely atmosphere and a great view - 100% recommend this place. You might want to book in advance though as it’s one of Dubrovniks favorites
Charming place for dinner. Very friendly weiter. Is a great place to eat if you are into fish. The atmosphere is top especially in the evening.
the waiter was very friendly ans the risotto was very good and plentiful. Thank you for this moment with my bf
The waiter was very friendly and welcoming. The food was very good. Moreover we had a beautiful view on the sea.
I came solo and they put me in a perfect spot with a beautiful view of the ocean! Service was great, food was delicious.

We were here in early August 2023 as a family of four.

It’s a great location next to the Pile gate. Staff were very attentive. My daughters both had pizza, which were excellent. My wife had Lasagne which was fine and I had the Dalmatian Style Steak which was also very good. Reasonably priced considering its location. Would definitely recommend and return
We went for ice cream which was amazing. Scoops are huge and prices are affordable. We were home guests so we got ice cream discount just because they want it to. Additional respect for home guests.

So friendly, so good and fine, great table under shadow ! Wonderful
We came at 6 adults with 2 young children : super
Excellent service, food. An impressive sight. Super recommended. Very good quality-price
Good service and nice food. The environment is very stunning and you can enjoy the breeze while eating!
Loved the food and the service, super nice waiter Alexa made sure we enjoyed everything!!!! coming backkk
Excellent host, good food, beautiful view, nice atmosphere, excellent house wine and a good price for the location and the food.

The cheese plate appetizer was hilariously small and uncreative! (4 oz of cheese, 6 olives, and 2 baby tomatoes! 🤣) The salmon was good quality but had very little flavor. Zucchini was average. The turkey steak was good and so were the fries.

Back to this restaurant after last year's very good experience only to confirm that in the very expensive Dubrovnik this is one of the best value for money one can get, especially for domestic tourists. Delicious seabass grill for two was well worth money spent as were steaks and octopuss salad. Ciabata bread with olives is a must. Good selection of wine by glass and most friendly and obliging staff I met on all Dalmatian coast. The view is of course spectacular. Be sure to make reservations because it is always very busy.
Fantastic location, very nice staff and delicious food. Price-quality ratio very good! We had breakfast and dinner here, both very good

We ended up coming here every single night of our 7 day holiday: the staff were always so friendly, the food was amazing - hot and tasty every time, the drinks were fantastic (i discovered my new favourite cocktail!), the location was superb (right outside of the old town walls) and the price given the expense of dubrovnik was reasonable in my opinion.
Everything really great!! Excellent service, food, cocktails and views- we came back multiple times!!

This was a spectacular restaurant for a very special evening. The view over the bay, the city walls and to the setting sun were wonderful. The wait staff were incredibly knowledgeable and polite, perfectly judging the occasion and the food… chefs kiss!

Very nice restaurant in a great location. Sit right by the wall and look down between two beautiful old structures of old town Dubrovnik. Also if you are a game of thrones fan you will be overlooking one of the places used in the series. 
Good service and great food and drinks

Amazing views but expensive. Very polite staff.
We didn't have a reservation, but as we arrived early, we were able to get a table.

Came here for lunch as we saw the great reviews. The pizza was as tasty as the amazing view! Stunning location and service was top quality. We didn’t need to book a table for lunch but was quite busy and clearly very popular.

The restaurant is in a fantastic location on the bay between Fort Bokar and Fort Lovrijenac, just outside the Pile Gate.
It is spotlessly clean, has prompt, polite servers (thank you Ivan) and delicious drinks, cocktails and meals. The prices are very reasonable.
They also operate a 10% discount card for returning customers and for their two sister restaurants. One restaurant is on Mount Srd, offering panoramic views, the other is overlooking the Old Harbour.
Shades are deployed according to the weather and wind conditions. 
We would definitely recommend this and the sister restaurants.
We Love this Place and These Restaurant and our waiter Jasmin Brkovic was so kind and friendly. We come once more again to Jasmin! Thank you
Lovely place with a beatufull view.Watching the sea along with the great food and drinks menu.Friendly staff and not too expensive for the location.
the food is very good. the waiter is very nice. Enjoying the beautiful view near by. The best restaurant in Duvrovnic. 非常好的食物，鱿鱼和披萨都很好吃。很贴心的服务，给了我们免费的柠檬冰水和热水。不愧为杜布罗夫尼克最好的餐厅。
Beautiful view and excellent service. Our server, Jasmin, was fun and friendly. He made our experience very enjoyable!

Beautiful setting, great service, lovely food!
We had a lovely table with a great view, the staff were really friendly and attentive. Food was good value, decent portions and the house wine was great
Lovely location. House wine lovely. Food got but not exceptional. We would return but more for location
Busy wee restaurant right at Pile Gate. Friendly fast service not to pricey easy lunch stop. Next to bus stops too and tour gathering point.

Very nice evening. 
We pre-booked and asked for a table along the wall near the sea. So glad we did this as it made for a nicer evening. The seats along the wall are more spacious.
The pasta “starter” portions were big enough for a main so this is worth remembering. Very nice overall and reasonable price in a good location.
Next to the old town with a great view. Food is very tasty and they know how to make their cocktails right

Lovely place with excellent food and service. We went there on a Saturday and reserved a table beforehand so as not to have to wait as it can be busy and have some waiting time. If you reserve a table you will be sure to get to sit outside. The ambiance is just great in the sunset and the service too notch. The food delicious and not over priced. 

We had a great evening and will come back the next time we are in Dubrovnik.
Really nice breakfast, the view is amazing. Good variety on the menu and well priced considering it’s location. The staff are also very friendly and make you feel welcome.
Dubravka is a culinary gem! The ambiance is cozy, the staff attentive, and the food is a delightful blend of flavors. Highly recommend their seafood dishes.
Very good food. Excellent wine and very good service. Amazing view in the old town. Anton gave us excellent service ☺️ recomended 👍🏻
Everyone liked their choices, the waiter was considerate and fast, and the view was really, really great!

We stumbled on this restaurant on our first day in Dubrovnik having various cocktails which were beautiful. We then returned again for dinner a few nights later and the food was INCREDIBLE. We started with a Marinara and then a pasta each, plus cocktails (their mango mojitos really are the best!). The service was absolutely exquisite and so friendly - thank you Aleksa for looking after us! The view is incredible and very couple and family friendly. This was easily our favourite meal all holiday. You must visit whilst in Dubrovnik!

The first restaurant I tried in Dubrovnik, and it did not disappoint. Had a nice chat with a few of the servers related to football (really funny and made our experience so much better). Personally, I loved the pizza I chose and the bread they served.

Fabulous restuarant with amazing delicous food, drinks, cocktails, wine etc at reasonable prices. Beautiful views of Dubrovnik Walls and seafront surrounds the restaurant. Waiters very friendly,helpful and humourous. Very comfortable and enjoyable time. Had dinner, desert and coffee all amazing. Would highly recommend for all…couples, singles, families etc.
Beautiful view, great service, high quality food. We had a great experience! Nice location right outside the old town.

What a fabulous restaurant - our favourite in the Old Town.
Great location, food, service and ambience.
But I would recommend that you pre-book as it gets very busy.
Beautiful view on the old town and sea. good food for a good price. Nice staff and we are deff going back

We had lunch @ Dubravka Restaurant after recommendation from our guide. The setting is excellent with the Dubrovnik walls & harbour in the background & the main square in the foreground. We shared a Sea bass suggested by our waiter. It was very good. He also helped separate the bones & serve us. The restaurant itself is not cheap at all. Pretty expensive...I guess you're paying for the location, ambience etc. Good experience!

The food are spectacular, the staffs are welcoming, especially the most friendly one Aleksa, and the view is amazing! My parents really love here so we visited twice :) We will definitely comeback next time. Pizza, steak, pasta, and the breads are all delicious! Highly recommend!
The asparagus and prosciutto omelette was delish! Anita was lovely and kind. Service was exemplary. The view of the wall and the ships coming in topped off the perfect brunch.

We had a lovely time! Exceptional views and food - fireworks in the background too 
Can’t wait to come again !!

We ate here during our recent trip to Dubrovnik and had high expectations given all the positive reviews.
The restaurant itself has lovely views and it is a beautiful setting. Our waiter was excellent and extremely attentive.
My husband ordered the beef and I ordered turkey. The turkey was extremely dry and overcooked and the sauce was tasteless. My husband's meal was a thin frying steak loaded with garlic. We enjoyed our desserts of cheese cake and chocolate sundae. We also had a bottle of wine. The meal came to over 100 euros which considering the quality of the food it was very overpriced.
Its a shame as it is a lovely restaurant with great staff but the food did not meet expectations unfortunately.

Great pizza in a lovely shady spot. Perfect spot if a cold drink where you can take in the walls of the old town without some if the heat and crowds inside. Our waiter could have been a bit friendlier. Prices fair for the location.
Great place with great service. Food was brilliant and I highly recommend the breakfast. Omelettes were fantastic. Perfect situation at the harbour also!
Good seafood tagliatelle, and wonderful ambience and scenery and wind! Servers are very enthusiastic and helpful too!

Having had a bad experience eating at a very overpriced and mediocre restaurant in the Old Town earlier in our trip, we were very selective about choosing where to eat given the prices in Dubrovnik. We'd walked past this place several times assuming it would be another tourist trap given its proximity to the Old Town, but decided to give it a go after reading positive reviews and loving the look of the outdoor terrace. So glad we did as the food was really delicious, service very friendly and prices better than most places we'd seen in the Old Town. We had to wait around 15 minutes for a table but it was worth it.
Beautiful view and nice ambiance. I really like the wind in this area. Food is great. Especially the fish dishes. The service is excellent.
Wonderful location - great food and fantastic service - would recommend and will go back - booking is essential if you want an evening table on the terrace
We loved our lunch time meal here. We were lucky to get a table without a reservation, so I would recommended making a booking. Lovely views. Great food. Nice staff.
Very good food and service. I had a burrata salad and grilled squid with grilled vegetables. Just phenomenal. Loved it.

We arrived in Dubrovnik on an Adriatic cruise aboard the Royal Clipper and decided to come into Dubrovnik for dinner. Had no specific plans though we did look up top 19 restaurants in Dubrovnik snd decided to look at Nautika. On inspecting the menu and ambience felt it was a bit too formal gif what we wer after. Opposite was this restaurant which turned out to be awesome in terms of cocktails, food and wine. We just had two starters mine was truffle ravioli and my wife had a seafood risotto. Hey we’re both fab washed down with a bottle of local rosé. Can’t recommend this place highly enough. The darters were more than enough as a main course. Don’t miss it

Popped in for lunch at Dubrvaka I was pleasantly surprised. Superb service from Aleksa, followed by delicious food. I would highly recommend for families and couples - get a way from the busy streets of Dubrovnik for a few hours and relax and enjoy your holiday.

Having been unable to book we walked up and were seated
Staff were lovely and service great
Food was good but not as memorable as others in the area
It’s a large restaurant so not intimate although location is great

The service was great but the food was terrible. The ‘lignje’ squid were full of sand.. the ‘blitva ’ swiss chard full of potatoes.. the seafood risotto not tasty at all. Very disappointed with the food but the setting outside was exceptional.
Excellent food view service and price well worth a visit. House a litre really good price and taste lovely

I visited this restaurant a few years ago with friends and made a reservation to come back with my family for lunch. We had a wonderful lunch. Starters and mains were perfect - my fish plate was one of the best I’ve had. Fabulous views. Food is lovely and our waiter was excellent. We enjoyed it so much that we came back to breakfast today.

The restaurant gets very busy and we were told the wait would be approximately 30 minutes. It actually was only about 10 minutes. 
The staff were very friendly and our waiter Ivan was very attentive. 
The food was good - lovely fresh ciabatta bread with oil & balsamic, two pizza and a tuna salad. Very reasonably price. Would recommend and return if we stayed for longer.

Nice setting. Friendly service other than girl at door.
Seated us according to res. Our main waiter Antonio was very friendly and informative.
There were a lot of waiters but strangely there was too much time between drinks and had to wave someone down for service.
Food was pretty good. Seafood salads, octopus salad, pastas seem good.
Rib eye steak was extremely average, a couple of us had them and they are far too thin for a restaurant so doesn’t matter how you want it cooked, it’ll turn up cooked and chewy. This type of place should be offering a thick cut rib eye, or filet. Owners research every steak in the USA.
Potato gratin side probably the best thing there.
Overall considering, price wasn’t bad at all for a very big group.
Could be better but good spot:
We had a fabulous supper as the sun went down. Excellent service and the seabream was fresh that day/
Exceptional service and food. Perfect location and well priced. We were seated immediately and well attended to. Food was tasty, fresh and well presented. Everything we could ask for in a restaurant.

Food was exellent and local wine is so good (much better than in Finland). We tried to book table in advance and they were Le booked for couple of weeks ahead. Gladly we were advised to just walk in as they keep tables for those cases. It was best dinner we had in Dubrovnik.

Magnificent. Seafood here was really nice. Had seafood platter, seafood risotto, octopus salad and sea bass grill.
All the food was tasty and delicious.

This place is very well located just outside the Pile Gate and next to the Old town bus station. We visited for one of our evening meals and had a great experience. Food is a little pricey but you're paying for the location and the stunning views over the Adriatic Sea and City Walls. The place was always busy due to it's location and you can make reservations but we managed to walk in one evening and get a table overlooking Pile Gate.

Amazing food and cocktails! Lovely view and atmosphere, good service. Similar prices to all of Dubrovnik but with the best food! (Dubrovnik pass gets you 10% off and if you dine in their sister restaurants which I also recommend you get 10% off). Best ravioli in Dubrovnik!

We decided to try this lovely outdoor restaurant, right outside the Old Town entrance in Dubrovnik Croatia.. overlooking the Adriatic Sea.. After being seated by a very cordial young hostess, our waiter came to take our drink order. All was good and well and the scenery was terrific. I thought I might try the salmon, but our winter, Alexsa, highly recommended the whole fish for 2..baked with vegetables and plated at the table. He told us we would not be dissatisfied and boy was he correct. It came beautifully roasted to our side table where Alexsa proceeded to debone the fish (incredible sea bass) and plate the entire meal for us. The flavors were amazing and Alexsa was very attentive and confident in his job. This man knew what he was talking about! Highly recommend the whole scene!
This restaurant was just by our hotel outside Pile Gate. The menu and service were wonderful. Try to get there early and get a table with a view of the harbor below.

Service was very friendly and we didn't need a reservation. The food was very delicious although the pork was just a little bit dry but the gratinated potatoes compensated it all! They also have one of the best views in Dubrovnik on the city wall and the ocean.

Beautiful view of the city walls. Very nice and fast service by the staff. We had breakfast and the portions were very generous, including bread and spreads for each plate. The croissants were delicious. The only thing is if you do not like your omelette to be well done you should ask beforehand. Overall great experience.

Went as a walk in and got a lovely table near the water .
The food,service and ambiance was amazing.
Very reasonably priced.
Both soups lovely 
My veal and my partner’s Lasagna excellent.
Can’t wait to eat here again!
They give you a voucher to be used at any of the restaurants chain 4 I think and it can be used every time you visit
Every plate was delicious, super recommended (we had the seafood tagliatelle, picana, and burrata pizza! The service was also very good. The view is nice also.

We had three visits to this restaurant while in Dubrovnik and were well looked after each time. Breakfast, brunch, and cocktails were all great and staff always friendly and attentive. A special shout out to Dario for being super helpful and kind, thank you!
Excellent food and wine, friendly and efficient service, great location. The atmosphere was upbeat. What’s not to like?

Excellent meal….the seafood was fresh and amazingly presented. The service was friendly, professional and ensured all of our group had a very memorable meal. The location also happens to be fantastic.
Good menu selection with decent service despite being very busy. Food was good and well worth the money. The only restaurant in the old town that we came back to.
Really great time and really great food! The tables were right be the waterfront, it was lovely! The waiters were great

Perfect dinner. Food was excellent, ribsteak was perfectly cooked as well as trout. Sides, a seasonal salad and potato gratin, were also great. Service and hospitality was also overwhelming. Thank you so much.
Amazing restaurant. We got the bolognese and the buratta pizza. The cocktails were great too. Short wait and great views.
Our server, Branko, was superb. The feta salad and burrata pizza was amazing! The view of the ocean and the walls of the old city can’t be beat. Nice breeze off the ocean.
Gorgeous view! Amazing setting. Great selection of food and brilliant cocktails. The service was one of the best I’ve seen with the staff being friendly and attentive.

Really good gelato!

I got the melon and my wife got the mandarin.
They both had a great creamy texture and lovely strong flavour.

Good portion size for the price (we only got one scoop but that's plenty with all the other food ice been eating!)
Much cheaper than expected, considering the location and amount given.

Definitely recommend the gelato here!

Assorted fish plate was nice with gratinated potatoes(these are amazing!). Sea bass with boiled potatoes was too plane, need something else to mix with.
Ice cream was nice, not the best in town. 

Service was very good and helpful (it was raining dogs and cats).
We ate lunch here yesterday. Very friendly waiter who was knowledgeable of the menu. We had pizza and seafood salad. Both were extremely tasty. The view added to the experience. Will be back.

Fabulous restaurant with beautiful views in a great location just outside the old town walls and with really friendly staff. We ate here 4 times 2 lunch 2 dinners and all were great. 
When in Dubrovnik this restaurant is a must. Just go. Always busy so I would recommend booking for dinner.

I came with low expectations, but left on a high. Friendly staff, speedy service, lovely omelette (asparagus and prosciutto) plus a (warm) croissant. View off the terrace is exceptional. Definitely a great start to the morning.
I am once again in this place - this time for dinner. Great dishes, great service. Prices for Dubrovnik - very attractive. Next time I visit Dubrovnik, I will definitely try other dishes.

We came here for breakfast. There are surprisingly few breakfast options in the old town. However, this restaurant definitely delivered. The view over the walls of the old town and the fort is very nice. The food was also great and fairly priced, especially given the location. We had omelets which all came with bread and spreads. Everything was quite good.
Had an excellent meal as part of a celebratory birthday holiday with my partner and 2 sons. Food fabulous, service perfect! Definitely a place to visit for a special meal!

I visited this place as recommended by my Airbnb host. Absolutely worth it! Had dinner and ordered grilled squids with vegetable. Beautifully presented and delicious! I actually went back for another meal during my stay in Dubrovnik.
Gibi was amazing! Very attentive waiter with Greta service. Highly recommend this place. 100% beautiful views, food and atmosphere.
Terrific, friendly service! The food was excellent as was the wine. I would highly recommend Dubravka Resturant for the food, service, friendly staff and the beautiful view!

The food was delicious and despite being busy, we were given a table and the food was served on time and well presented. The waiters were a highlight and Alex and Mario went out of their way to provide exceptional and fun service. Would definitely return!

Came here for a long breakfast before heading off to catch the bus. Service was attentive and polite. Phillip was accommodating to changing my table due to the hot sun and only checked in during the rest of my time at the table. I can tell he knows how to read the guest.
Portion and price of my breakfast is reasonable compared to some especially since this place comes with a view. if it isn't my last day, I would come back for dinner.

This restaurant is amazing. My friends and I have been here three separate times now and we keep going back because of the amazing hospitality and service from the staff, the food is always phenomenal and the drinks are to die for. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone wanting to have a meal with a view or even just a drink.

The scenery is incredible! On the edge of cliff with a view of the Walls of Dubravka and the sea. 
The food was fantastic but was overshadowed by a one of a kind server- Alex! If you go you must ask for him! Food and wine knowledge plus a super personality! He made the meal as much as the above. Don’t miss this combo of Alex and this great restaurant!
Best coffee in Dubrovnik and delicious free range eggs with a lovely yellow yoke. The venue is like out of a movie like Game of Thrones 😂

I can’t recommend this place enough. It is positioned in a really busy area (just outside the entrance to the old town and a viewpoint). This didn’t negatively effect this great place. Incredible cocktails. We visited a few times and each time we were made to feel welcome. The food was wonderful. We were given a 10% discount loyalty card to use there and their sister restaurants which was nice. Great Old Fashioned cocktail. Everything was perfect!
What a view! Wow , we wanted to sit and have a drink and some food, such a beautiful place , food was really tasty and the staff were lovely, Luka looked after us very well. Would recommend!

1 Very poor service. My partner booked this place for my 40th 
We had the first course food was good, service was shocking was left with empty plates for far too long and empty glasses 
Just avoid its temping due to its location that’s it it offers

The cocktails were outstanding, the atmosphere of the restaurant was very relaxing, and the food was all delicious. Service was great. Highly recommend making a reservation because it was busy all night.
Great meal and great service. The truffle ravioli was amazing. Drinks were delicious! Beautiful views.

Great location by Pile gate. Very efficient service even though the restaurant was very busy. Their ravioli with truffle and prosciutto starter was amazing! Their menu is large and with decent value drinks as well.

I have been coming to Dubravka for 8 years now when visiting Dubrovnik and whether i have a reservation or not i am always treated very well by staff and accomodated straight away.
Most evenings i visit here for an evening drink and the smokey old fashioned is probably the best i've ever had.
On our last night we make dinner reservations and the food is simply delicious. I had the beefsteak, which was cooked perfectly. All side dishes and desserts were also excellent. This is a top establishment with a great view and excellent staff. See you next year!

An outstanding dining experience. Excellent food, terrific service and an unforgettable view. 
Nautika has great seafood dishes (the seafood risotto was delicious). 
Thanks to Super Mario for outstanding service.
The restaurant is very well located, overlooking the walls of the old city, thus offering you great views. The food was great as well, all our options tasted awesome.
Great! The service was wonderful and highly recommend eating here. You will not be disappointed, go there!

Food was amazing, the service was the best we have experienced in Croatia having been here many times, (thank you Luka). A table by the view spot became available and we asked if we could move and it was no problem. 5 stars.

The restaurant's outdoor seating was great, the views/location are special, and the cocktails and drinks were perfect, but our experience was made exceptional by our waitress Anita! I would 15/10 recommend you make a reservation when you're visiting!

It is the most beautiful place to eat in Dubrovnik with a wonderful view. Great ambiance. chilled music. Unfortunately the food wasn't up to par. The fish soup bland with overcooked scraps of fish. Uniform, slouchy grilled vegetables with fish fillet carelessly placed on the plate. But you have to have sat there.

Really enjoyed our dinner at Dubrovka. Drink options were vast, food was fresh and delicious! We had the sea bass and Salmon fillet with gratinated potatoes (potatoes were incredible). Sides were huge would recommend getting a potato side and vegetable side to share if possible. Waiter was attentive and great!

Only downside was the pudding options were limited- would have been nice to see a few more dishes to choose from.
Amazing food! Amazing service! Amazing view!! Alex, our server, made great recommendations and was very kind!! Would definitely dine here again!

Close to one of the entrances to the city walls and the black stop, with excellent views.

The items are slightly more expensive than you would expect, but this is a tourist area, convenient, and top quality.

Beers start at 6.20 Euro for .3l, coffee 4 to 5 Euro.
Great good, great view, great staff!! We will be back! Highly recommend the mussels, they were incredible.
Excellent friendly service, knowledgeable waiter, delicious food and wine. Would come again. Highly recommended.

10/10. Thanks to Josip and Ivan Raguz. It is a privilege to eat there
Location, good food, service, experience, staff=10/10

We visited for breakfast twice during our stay in Dubrovnik. This is a gorgeous restaurant with a stunning outlook across the City Walls, ocean, and the Fort. 

The coffee is excellent and the breakfasts are good, and come with fresh bread, spreads etc. Good value. Slightly slow service but otherwise great. 

Visit here before you visit Panorama - they'll give you a 10% off coupon to use as it's the same restaurant chain.

We had a lovely meal at this restaurant. Good service from Luca, just the right amount of attention. Food arrived promptly and was very tasty. Local house wine was good value and decent quality. Enjoyed our meal here

Beautiful restaurant. Food portions were very small. We had to order additionally even though we have never did this previously in any restaurant. Over priced. Paid 100€ for the dinner, one drink and desert that did not deliver.
Amazing dinner and staff! Great atmosphere with even better food and drinks. Our waiter was so nice and really cared about our dining experience!
Outstanding , lovely staff my wife’s birthday and the staff could not have been more accommodating, recommend the beefsteak and the stamper Croatian white was lovely.. five stars ..
Perfect setting, nice ambience with scenic view of the water and the wall. Wide menu too, friendly and courteous staff.

We had a lovely time here. We came on a Friday night without a reservation and they were able to seat us almost immediately even though it was extremely busy. 

 We ordered wine and a cocktail which were very nice. We both had a pepperoni pizza which was the best I have ever tasted- as good as genuine Roman pizza! 

The staff were extremely courteous and friendly. I would highly recommend this place as not only was the food and staff wonderful but the value for money was amazing.
Highly recommend the fish soup, the octopus salad and the fish cappacio. Amazing view next to the city wall, friendly hosts, good price. 10% Discount with Dubrovnik pass.
Great views. Kept cozy outside with blankets and heaters provided. Very nice selection of red wines.
Great place for a meal outside (weather permitting). Food of high quality, service excellent and a nice view as darkness falls. Good selection in both food and drinkl.
Really romantic restaurant. Excellent food, and brilliant service (our waiter was so lovely and helpful). Highly recommend.
Beautiful location overlooking the sea and the city walls. The food was top-notch and the service excellent!
Beautiful spot for dinner. Prices for mains are on the expensive side but similar to within the old town. Food nice, view nice, service good

Great food, eaten at the other 2 restaurants but this one is the best of all 3, the panoramic wins by view only and is better to go there by car. The Arsenal is second in food but I will go there as the third one, even so that was the first I went.
They have great personal and the location is nice and cozy.
Absolutely stunning views of the sea. But the food is even better. Must try the mortadella pizza and Hugo spritz … the service was so great, the staff are really kind and helpful.

Lovely Restaurant, gorgeous view our waiter Duje was great, well mannered, professional and always had a great presence. Wine was lovely as well very smooth. They also provide blankets if cold. Highly recommend, if you come here hope you are lucky enough to be served by Duje 😊
Lovely food, great service. Had a waiter called Duje who was super friendly and attentive. Overall a great experience
Amazing location opposite the Fort! Food was fantastic and the service was even better! 5 star service from Luka and Greta. We loved it so much we booked the next night for dinner!

Anthony was very kind 
We had an excelent dinner, with a great service and an amazing views
We enjoyed so much the evening
Very good food, excellent ambiance, great wind, professional waiter, specially Luca was beyond amazing. Highly recommend.
The food and view were really nice. The service was also amazing. Highly recommended and you can enjoy a beautiful sunset in the Terrence

Great location just outside city walls with view out to sea. We ate an early dinner but still a busy place. Service good and prices reasonable for area. I had very well cooked squid. Good choice of alcoholic and non alcoholic cocktails. Overall nice spot for dinner.

The food and service were both excellent, matching the majestic views of the harbour and the Dubrovnik City Walls. 

Will be coming back during my week in Dubrovnik.

Called in for coffee in the morning and was so impressed with the service and view that we reserved for the next night and they kept their promise of a table by the wall with a view to die for. Good food, great service, much better than being up an alley inside the walls. Oh, also reduction if you have the Dubrovnik pass.
Excellent food, speechless view, perfect and polite staff. For every recommendation. We will definitely comeback
So amazing the food and the ambiance its really great.. I always been here with my girlfriend but now she off the ship that's why im alone for now.. But overall super great.. 🤩🤩👌👌👍
good food and nice sea view. seafood dish very fresh. cocktail very beautiful and nice service. strong recommendation

Great location and nice restaurant layout. Friendly staff, food and drinks nice and have heaters/blankets for chillier evenings. Came here for drinks then came back next day for food as found was a bit cheaper than inside the main old town, even though just outside of entrance and restaurant offered 10% discount which was even better. Would definitely come back here again

In a wonderfully scenic location by the side of the Pile Gate and overlooking the Mediterranean Sea this restaurant provided us with a dining experience we will remember a long time.
A comprehensive menu was complimented by the efficiency, knowledge and friendliness of our server.
My steak meal and my wife’s turkey meal , together with excellent wine were so good we will return for an end of holiday celebration on our final night in Dubrovnik.
Beautiful restaurant with attentive and lovely service. Feta salad was best I’ve had, so good! Beef carpaccio, pork medallions and mussels were all top tier! 20/10.
Great food, fantastic service and affordable prices! The view is something else! Highly recommend!

Found this place due to this amazing sea view and cosy spot. 

Greeted by Jasmine and he is the sweetest guy ever, given my friend a lemon for the vitamin boost as he heard her coughing and his service is just excellent. 

I ordered trout with almond and with the house white and it is so lovely and I devoured it and left only with the skeleton. 

And I ended it with Americano to go with the orange chocolate cake and it is real heaven. 

It is just my first day here and I already fell in love with this restaurant and will definitely visit for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Basically I plan all my meal here in Dubrovnik. 

Will try the sea bass for 2 person next and maybe a glass of 2 of the sparkling rose. 😁

We found this amazing spot as we were relishing a quick bite after getting into Dubrovnik. Lo and behold, it started to rain and we found refuge in this amazing restaurant. So from a light lunch, we went from a hearty soup to dessert in a heart beat. The house wines were great too! 😍
The burrata pizza is insanely good :)) came back two nights in a row!! Would defo recommend asking for the garlic sauce! Staff were very friendly and recognised us.

What an amazing location, at the Pile Gate overlooking the ocean. My best meal in Dubrovnik. Our server was friendly, knowledgeable and efficient. The rib-eye steak- Dalmatian style - was truly delicious and the wine excellent. There is no doubting that we will return.

My fiancé booked an early evening dinner here for my birthday. The staff were super attentive, food was delicious, and atmosphere was relaxed and romantic with stunning view! They even surprised me with a birthday cake and sparkler and complimentary Croatian celebratory drink. Amazing! Thank you so much :)

Great staff, very friendly and happy to explain the menu to you. Our waiter was extremely polite and helpful, we went with his recommendation of the fresh seabass and it did not disappoint. It was cooked to perfection! Also, leave room for dessert - we had the apple pie to finish and it was phenomenal! Will definitely be back.
View is nice, atmosphere nice, tables quite well spaced out. Quite pricey but good value, they cook a good pasta !!

Everything we ordered was perfect. Fantastic fresh and delicious seafood. The seafood risotto, mussels and baked sea bass were amazing. And the staff were fantastic. Friendly, professional and welcoming. All on top of one of the most incredible views on earth. Cannot recommend enough. A highlight of our trip.

Beautiful food, beautiful venue and scenery. Staff are excellent, very attentive and friendly. Will be returning for breakfast tomorrow!! Great choice of dishes, blankets to keep you warm and outside heaters too! Delicious food and stunning location, what else could you ask for! And reasonable prices too! 10/10
The staff was incredibly polite and professional. Location was perfect, right on the water looking at the old city walls! Lu our waiter was phenomenal. Food was delicious.
Excellent service with an amazing scenery, relaxing atmosphere with fantastic food…. Would recommend.

Delicious place! We visited all locations whilst in Dubrovnik and would definitely recommend visiting for breakfast and dinner. Haven’t eaten a bad thing. Highly recommend the eggs Benedict and the veal. Staff are friendly and the price is very reasonable for the great service

A beautiful experience with excellent food and service
A must visit for any traveller
Probably the best restaurant in Dubrovnik

We came here for a late dinner and cocktail the restaurant and location was amazing with a great vibe which was relaxed. 
The service was amazing, Ivan our sever was exceptional very friendly, attentive and great service. 
Our food was amazing the seafood was fresh and tasty with great cocktails, local bread and olive oil. 
Amazing visit and will defiantly came again and highly recommend. :)

Shortly after arriving in Dubrovnik we wanted a lunch and found this pleasant place just outside the city walls.

We had the novel pistachio pizza and seafood salad - with the octopus really fresh.

We came for breakfast and had an amazing time. The food came with a bread basket and lots of spreads, jams, and honey which made the meal so filling we didn’t bother with lunch! 

We came twice during our visit, once out of season and again on the first day of their tourist season. Even though the second time the tour groups had descended, the restaurant managed to block out their noise and gave us a peaceful little oasis away from the crowds. Nobody rushed us to eat or pay so we could sit in the sun for as long as we liked and the service was the best we had during our trip. Definitely recommend
nice spot in old town dubrovnik croatia. staff are nice and accommodating and friendly. close to all amenities.
Great spot outside. Server and food was excellent and the first place to give us enough ice for our drinks.
Amazing view and even better service! We were able to reserve a table for around sunset which afforded a lovely view. Get the G&T!!
Excellent food and very friendly staff. Everyone should come here and try the food and enjoy the view, with the family and friends
Super nice view, very professional services. Very nice and fresh food. We enjoy our lunch very much and will come back

Excellent!!!!
we are from JPN!!!!
so good food , wine and hospitarity！
thank you for preparing the good seats..
Very beautiful place, excellent see view and especially excellent stuff, kind, pleasant and made our visit more comfortable. Food is excellent also. Highly recommend this place.
Great place, with tasty food and desserts, lovely views and amazing service. Really enjoyed my evening there. Would recommend house wine.

The view from this restaurant is amazing. 
We had the seafood risotto, and the grilled squid. Excellent service, and very tasty food. Our only complaint was that some of the seafood was slightly gritty, bot otherwise good.

The location couldn't be better with a gorgeous view of the city walls and Fort Lovrejenac. The atmosphere was spot on and the food is delicious. I had a Dubrovnik must-try - mortadella pizza with pistachios! Sounds a little different, but different was delicious. The servicecwas excellent! My waiter Duja was great - checked in on me regularly and very nice! My last dinner in Dubrovnik and couldn't have asked for a better one!

This must be our 3 Rd visit and look forward to it everytime . Still the best place to eat out .and great value for money .all cooked to profection. 
Great service .Well done to all staff and management..

I was here with my friends, honestly one of the best restaurants in Dalmatia. Their food is absolutely amazing, service is exellent, prices are fine. And, of course, the view is besautiful. Thank you for making my trip even better, see you again

We came to Dubrovnik in preseason, and so not everywhere was open. After a long day travelling, we wandered down to Old Town and headed to Dubravka as one of the few places open that evening. This turned out to be a blessing, as the food was lovely and the restaurant beautifully situated. Over the course of our time in Dubrovnik we returned to Debrovka on a number of occasions - making use of the beautifully situated outside seating and enjoying a drink in the sunshine, with probably best view possible. I would thoroughly recommend the food, but would insist that no trip to Dubrovnik would be complete without at least a drink, sat outside Dubravka.

Very good food with amazing location.
Totally with to visit, good price ấn value for money. Recommended for everyone who comes

We enjoyed very much sitting on the outdoor patio facing the ocean the Dubrovnik fort - with the blankets provided by restaurant keeping us warm and cozy on a cool/cold spring night. Recommend this restaurant which had vegetarian options as well !
Highly recommend this restaurant, the food and drinks were fantastic and staff were friendly and efficient. It also has an amazing view
Great spot for delicious food, great views, and reasonable prices. Caters to English-speaking travelers well.
Absolutely amazing food with a gorgeous view. Either sunset or nighttime of the walls. Stunning. Friendly staff and a really enjoyable evening.

This place will blow your mine ! Upon entering the restaurant we was greeted by a very welcoming host. Once we was seated we was welcomed once again by a waiter and then a man named jasmin who was nothing short of amazing. He explained every dish and was very patient and funny ! We was seated outside and the staff gave us blankets to wrap ourselves with aswell as an outdoor heater. Me and my wife was blown away by the warmth and politeness of the staff. Now to the food. I had the salmon which was exceptional and my wife had the the sea bass which was just as sublime. We hope to return again when we come back to dubrovnik. A must visit to all visitors of dubrovnik. A proper gem of a place !!!!
What a delicious meal!! The servers were more than friendly, both starters and mains were fantastic! So full we couldn’t fit more! Would recommend to anyone!! Also fantastic views!!! Even at night.

I walked the walls of the old town so I was ready for lunch. Having previously stopped here for a cocktail, I decided this was the time to try the food.
I ordered the rib steak, Dalmatian style Swiss chard and potatoes. I didn’t know what to expect really but the steak was tender, juicy and I suspect quite garlicky. It was delicious, washed it down with some house white, I am liking the Croatian wine, and a scoop of vanilla ice cream to wind up.
Sat on a beautiful sunny terrace with the sun glinting off the sea and very attentive and pleasant staff. I recommend.
A wonderful dinning experience in a beautiful location! Whether you just get drinks or a meal, the restaurant provides a beautiful experience and view.
We have visited twice during our stay in Old Town, and it is excellent. Best views and terrific food. Great value. Perfect photo spot.

Had a lovely meal here on our last evening in Dubrovnik. Out of season so restaurant not busy but were made very welcome immediately. All staff, especially Luka were lovely, he is a credit to this restaurant. We had lovely food and wine - while sat looking at the city walls - a memory we will always remember. Thank yo
Great service and food. Outstanding view on city walls and pile gate. Best pizza that i ever had....
They went out of their way to make us happy. My wife really enjoyed the eggplant. The house wine is fantastic. Great steak as well.
Great food, service and view. Enjoyed a birthday dinner for my father. They gave us apple pie on the house! We will he coming here again for holiday. 100/10

Had a lunch here. Very tasty dishes, good service, fantastic veiw.
Super.
Absolutely recommend this place.

Nice view, average food
Food is not fresh for seafood pasta but rather frozen.
Pizza dough is average
Would come here for a drink and the view not for the food….

We have just returned to the UK from a five day break in Dubrovnik. On day one we were lucky to stop for a coffee at Dubravka 1836 Restaurant. We returned every day! The views were stunning; the staff were friendly, welcoming and engaging. One evening we enjoyed a delicious meal from a wide ranging menu. The food and wine were excellent and, again, the service was first rate. We recommend Dubravka 1836 Restaurant without reservation.

We arrived without a booking and the host was very helpful and offered us a seat overlooking the water. They provided blankets and a heater as well so we were comfortable even though it was chilly out. 

The waiter gave good recommendations on the food and swayed us towards an option which I’m grateful for. We had the lamb fillets and assorted fish platter - both of which were delicious and well presented. 

For the location and atmosphere, the food was also reasonably priced. A 10% discount for future visits was also provided
Stunning location, great food, lovely staff. My partner and I loved having our dinner here while the sun was setting. Absolutely gorgeous.

This place was amazing and had the most lovely staff. Following the waiter's recommendation we both had the ravioli with truffle and it did not disappoint! The food was delicious. If you visit dubrovnik then this is a must place to eat. The cocktails were always brilliant. If I return, I'll definitely be eating there!

Amazing food, great professional service and most importantly unimaginable view over the old town of Dubrovnik and the sea. If you are in Dubrovnik you should definitely pay a visit. Once, twice or maybe even every day of your stay.
Food just as amazing as the staff. Reasonably priced for the high quality of food. Highly recommend.
Spent lunch here, scenery and views were second to none. Food was brilliant and service was fast and polite. Would 100% recommend.
The view was breathtaking and the food and service were excellent. A place not to be missed! Oooh yes!
We enjoyed pizza and a couple cappuccinos in the sun! Wonderful ambience and service, would highly recommend :)

I'm pleasantly surprised by the atmosphere and the service. The waiter Luka kindly entertained us and recommended the steak that was great, too, and the wine he recommended was perfection. We had a bottle of Dubrovacka malvazija and the others for the end we ate the apple pie. All in all of a nice evening and I recommend everyone to come in because you won't regret it.
A friend gave me a suggestion to go to the restaurant Dubravka 1836 for dinner. The waiters were very friendly, the atmosphere was pleasant and the food was very tasty.

Had the Chefs beefsteak which was cooked to a perfect medium rare, with gratinated potatoes: both very delicious and a good size portion. Me and my companion shared a feta salad: the feta cheese? 10/10 would recommend chef's kisss. Drank a nice dry martini with an incredible view of the fortress and the sunset. Best of all was the staff: super attentive and if you're a foreigner no worries becauspeak great english! Over all a very nice and comfortable time at this place. AND very close to the old city AND it was open when most places were already closed.

The food is exceptional! We ordered seafood pasta, pizza, steak and seafood plate, very unforgettable experience! Very tasty and freshly cooked! Location is great, just beside the fort with a great view! Our waiters are amazing, beautiful friendly smile! He is the best! It’s a great memory to look back to. Great friends with great food. Thank you! 😘

Food ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️, it was amazing although serving is quite small for me.
Service ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Price ⭐️⭐️⭐️
Ambiance ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

We stumbled upon this gem for a rush breakfast… and we were just wowed and decided to come for dinner. 
Ivan took care of us and he was nothing short of excellent. 
The food was delicious and cooked with love.
Everything was perfect. We will definitely return.
The view from the patio is a bonus.
Thanks a lot guys.
Great food, great service. Highly recommended. We didn't book on a midweek night in October and it was busy, so I'd recommend booking, or popping in earlier in the day if you're passing by.

We had a wonderful dinner after spending the afternoon in the old city. We were seated at a lovely table right next to the stone fence. We had appetizers and drinks first. Our waiter was very attentive and at his recommendation we tried the Rib-steak Dalmatian style for the main course. For dessert we shared apple cake which i am still dreaming about. Every course was fresh,delucious and promptly served. Food,setting,service: sublime. Can't wait to go back.

We visited this place twice  during our stay in Dubrovnik  and were not disappointed. Try the seafood risotto for starters...amazing. The steaks are cooked to perfection, the wine is good but the staff are the stars. Wonderfully friendly and helpful.

 

Good food and friendly service

 

We visited this place twice  during our stay in Dubrovnik  and were not disappointed. Try the seafood risotto for starters...amazing. The steaks are cooked to perfection, the wine is good but the staff are the stars. Wonderfully friendly and helpful.

 5/5

Decided to try this place for a quick coffee one afternoon as the venue seems to pop up on a lot of recommended eating places on Google for Dubrovnik.

There are some nice views to be had here of the walls and the sea and quite nice on a sunny day. The same views can be had directly outside the restraunt at a public wall that overlooks the same area.

The coffee was a little overpriced for what it was and the service was pretty average also. It took ages to order and ages to pay the bill here.

We were contemplating coming back for a proper lunch or breakfast another time but after the pricing and average service we decided not to.

Obvsiouly only a short visit for just coffee and a cola but wasn't anything great
Great breakfast - at a low price for Dubrovnik. Great service, delicious dishes. Delicious coffee. Rich breakfast menu.

Excellent experience

It was our first visit there and we loved it. 

It is difficult to find a place where the drinks and food are great. Look no further. This is a very good option. This place have beautiful view and the waiters are really nice. The sea bass and Ravioli with truffles and prosciutto were delicious. You can't miss the desserts

My husband, nephew and I saw this restaurant on Google and decided to try it out. The previous night we went to a restaurant inside the city walls and was not impressed. This place was fantastic. The service and ambiance were thrilling.

I took my wife and her parents to this restaurant for a family lunch, and it was a very pleasant experience. The tables have a very nice view of two fortresses. The food and service were adequate. We were left quite satisfied with the treatment(and food) we received from the wait staff as we had one infant daughter with us. Would definitely come again.

Nice experience in Dubravka

Good vibes and great live music.

The service was first class, they have so much patience and knowledge for a friend with allergies and anything you wanted was given before you realized it yourself.

Hope to be back in beautiful Dubrovnik and this restaurant

We were able to make a reservation on the day for a Saturday evening (out of season) and got a table with a fantastic view. The service was brilliant, we were struggling to decide between 2 wines so our waiter brought them both out for us to try. We loved the bottle of Merlot. We were very impressed with the way the wine was served with the carafe and pouring into the glass. The food was great, not the best meal I had in Dubrovnik but very close. As we had been to the panorama restaurant for lunch that day (also recommend- owned by the same chain) we were given a 10% off voucher to use at this restaurant which they redeemed for us. You will struggle to find a setting as beautiful as the one at Dubravka 1836.

We came with friends, 2 couples, and we were all of the same opinion about Dubrovka, great food, excellent service and reasonable prices. The menu covers breakfast, lunch and diner, so whatever time you arrive, there is good food waiting....or just drinks...with a view to die for. Over 4 days we ate and drank here 7 times. You can't miss it, just on the right before the city gates.
Beautiful setting, wonderful service, staff very knowledgeable and food was delicious. Highly recommend
Great food, wine and service. Recommended. Octopus salad was amazing! Sat outside with a view of the wall and fort.
Nice place with amazing kirchen. The breakfast and the dinner are also delicious with service perfect.

I had breakfast here twice during my stay. Friendly attentive staff, good variety of options, and very reasonably priced. Would recommend any of the omelettes. Wonderful view of both the Old Town walls and the fortress.

We ate breakfast here before we walked the walls of Dubrovnik. We loved sitting outside having a view of the the water. The service was friendly and my omelet was delicious. The blueberry jam with bread was fabulous. Would definitely recommend this restaurant.

Fabulous setting, excellent service and lovely food. We arrived at sunset without a reservation but were seated promptly. Great views of the wall and fort. Attentive waiter explained the menu. Food arrived in good time and was fresh and flavoursome. Good value house wine and draft beer. Part of the Nautika chain. Thoroughly recommended
Another beautiful evening in Dubrovnik. Food, drink and ambiance to begin the evening of romance. Tomorrow, off to Montenegro. Back on Thursday to Dubravka for their world reknown pizza.
An absolutely beautiful location, friendly staff and an amazing view. Wonderful food and wine, would definitely recommend.
Great harbour side restaurant with lovely food and super service.. professional, clean and great atmosphere. Good value, and feta salad amazing!!

Beautiful meal , seafood risotto was delicious. Set in a beautiful area over looking the harbour . 
Highly recommend

We had dinner here and the service and ambiance were fantastic, but the main dishes we ordered were ordinary and just OK. This place is good for a romantic dinner specially if you seat outside. Our server was friendly, helpful, and attentive. We ordered a pasta dish and a pizza, and both were flavorless. If only the food matched the service and place, this would be a 5 star restaurant for sure.

Fantastic meal for 2 on our last night in Dubrovnik. Sea bass fillet was divine. I'm a fan of seafood and was really impressed with it. Cooked to perfection. Very friendly staff & relaxed, comfortable setting. Will return to this restaurant on our next trip to this stunning part of Croatia.

We went today as we have been 3 times before,but this time there was a very aggressive waiter who would not let us in because we asked to use toilet before we sat down he said we had to go across road to public toilets first we told him that we have been here 3 times in last week but he became very aggressive , I would not recommend this restaurant as there are better ones and more friendly inside castle
Fabulous restaurant, Great spot with excellent staff and top food!! They also do some nice cocktails and all priced very well. Love Dubrovnik!!

We had breakfast here. The food was expensive and nothing special. But the view of the city wall and the Lovrijenac fortress was stunning! Definitely worth coming here for a relaxing breakfast.

If you have Dubrovnik Pass, remember to use it for a 10% discount.

I was very pleasantly surprised by this restaurant.

I had felt, due to its location that it would be a tourist trap that relied on its views over the food. 

However it was all delicious and we had a very pleasant lunch here that was also reasonably priced. 

My mocktail was pretty terrible but I’ll let that go because the food was so nice!

We went to this restaurant twice and we had a great experience in both times. The food was amazing, I had the best gin and tonic and for us the most important thing was the customer service, they were incredible kind,always smiling, I’ll recommend this place to everybody who is planning to go to Dubrovnik.

Everything was fantastic! The food, our server Dario, the ambiance; everthing was just great! We are traveling with two small children and everyone was accommodating. We asked to be seated inside vs out so we weren't overwhelmed with cigarette smoke and they immediately seated inside (unlikely for Dubrovnik in our experience). 
We ordered cocktails, appetizers, main dishes and dessert and all of it was just delicious!
We would highly recommend dining at Dubravka 1836 Restaurant & Cafe!
Great atmosphere & view next to the Pile gate. The truffle ravioli was phenomenal!! The lamb with chanterelle sauce was good but not stellar. Very limited dessert menu unless you want ice cream.
The veal medallions with chanterelle mushrooms was amazing!! Had it with the potato gratin and it was so tasty. Brilliant meal, very lovely staff, thank you!

This place is a must when in Dubrovnik. We had a GREAT server named Rade who gave incredible service.

I had the prosciutto pizza and my beautiful wife had the sea bass. For dessert the chocolate walnut cake and the Dubrovnik caramel. Unforgettable experience can’t wait to come back tomorrow

Thank you Rade for making our meal unforgettable!

We ate here on our first day in Dubrovnik it’s location is amazing and has such a pretty view of the sea and the fort.

We were looked to have a front facing sea view for our meal which was lovely.

The food was nice however a little on the expensive side with the cheapest pizza being £12.50, larger is around €6/7 also so about £6 a pint and bottle of Fanta 200ml about £4.

We would visit again due to the location, good food and service 🍕

We booked a table the day before and were treated to a table overlooking the walls. The service here is faultless, we booked an early table to watch the sunset so asked if we could have a drink first and order after, no problem. The waiter was so friendly and knowledgable of the menu.

With such good food, ambiance with a man playing the guitar and view this restaurant should be on anyones must visit list!

We didn’t book walked in and managed to get a table outside with a beautiful view of the city walls. The service was amazing felt relaxed and well looked after. The food was delicious, “
Lovely live music
