Beautiful welcoming atmosphere, lovely accommodating service and the food is fantastic especially for the reasonable price. Dante the waiter was brilliant, we've been here every time we've visited Dubrovnik and you can't go wrong. Highly recommended.

We had to go back within a day. The ambience is great. The service is greater with live music. They make conversation and give you guidance on food. If you are a vegetarian fussy eater travelling with a non-veg partner. Pizza, Risotto, sea food, deserts and wine we can recommend.

You can’t beat the location and view. Sitting having dinner at night with a view of the walls all lit up. The food was good and priced fairly. Service was good with no issues. It was our first night in town and it was great to have a reservation. Great way to start off our trip.

We had our last dinner at Dubrovnik at this restaurant. The restaurant has a very relaxing atmosphere, the live guitar instrumental music was very calming . The food is delicious! We ordered the grilled squid and mussels. The service is exceedingly good. Dario was very patient and offered great suggestions. We were very glad to have spent our dinner here.
We had a lovely evening and good food. Excellent service and perfect location. We can recommend this place for a lovely evening/ Hotel manager from Sweden

Great service, delicious food, spectacular views 
Would definitely recommend and will be visiting again

Dante is amazing!! He is totally knowledgeable of the menu and wines!!!! He has a great personality!!
He was very friendly, and dedicated to customer service, and should be commended for his work ethic!

You come here for the fantastic view of the city walls and the fortress, but the food was just ok. The mussels were swimming in a deep bowl of too salty tomato broth, and her grilled chicken was bland and over cooked.

Busy, buzzy restaurant with uber efficient, good humoured staff who maintained their professionalism under difficult circumstances presented by hugely demanding and rude customers.
Food and drink reasonably priced for Dubrovnik. Great views, good food, good vibes.

The restaurant was busy when we showed up without a reservation but they found us a table for 2 with a lovely view. I had the sea bass which was delicious - fairly expensive but it a good portion size. My partner had the pizza which was good. The house white wine was nice and reasonably priced. This restaurant is worth visiting for great views and atmosphere, as well as nice food

Can't fault the food at all, it was excellent. Presented well and very tasty. We sat outside, gutted because it was chucking it down with rain. However glad we could still sit outside (under cover of course). Service was good, staff were friendly. I would really recommend the apple pie it was amazing. Only thing I would say is we waited awhile before anyone came over to us to give us a table, I guess this isn't something I am used to at home. However still 5/5 for me. If you want a tasty meal with a nice view go here.

We'd been recommended here from a friend who'd visited several years ago. It's the place we'd usually avoid in the main European cities - too close to a main tourist hub so expensive and poor quality - you'd think. But - Very good happy, friendly service, good food. Location is right next to Pile Gate entrance to old city walls. Prices here still the same for all of Dubrovnik but good food - it's not a cheap city to visit in any sense.
Had a great time. Staff and food were wonderful!! Views of the castle were also spectacular. Such a lovely atmosphere
Wonderful dinner and servers. Great prices especially for wine. Would recommend to anyone visiting Dubrovnik :)
Amazing food. Really good value. Seafood was super fresh and great quality. House wine was amazing. 10/10 would recommend to a friend

The service here is spectacular and made our night. The servers were so sweet and thoughtful. They provided all amenities to make us comfortable and took great overall care. Our server Evan was so nice and everyone else. We loved the king prawns and the spaghetti bolognese. Right next to the city walls for a lovely view

Highly recommended restaurant in a great location just outside the old city wall gate. Beautiful outside terrace with benefit of heaters and warm blankets. A bistro style menu with lots of variety, all our food was very tasty. Pricey, but good value for money for the setting and service. Luca was our waiter for the night, he was both charming and efficient (and happy to take a photo!). You need to make a reservation well in advance during high season.

The food is really good but the stand out feature here is the staff. They were so attentive, cheerful and engaging, not at all pushy, the whole experience was wonderful. Can't think of a single thing that could improve upon it.
Excellent coffee. Tasty omelettes and great fresh juice. Our waiter was amazing…like the stunning view. Doesn’t get much better.
Waiter very helpful we had a lovely pizza and salad, nice cocktails. Thank you. Will visit again when we come to Dubrovnik
Food was tasty, lots of views staff nice and friendly. Good Times had by all! We all had a lovely time and they accommodated a large group. The food was delicious!

We had lunch here on the recommendation of our host in Dubrovnik. It was busy, seemingly with locals more than tourists, and although we hadn't booked, we were given a table within a short time. We were lucky to be seated next to the wall with a lovely view of the little bay and the city walls and fortress. The food was great and the service friendly and attentive. We would certainly make a point of going back there if in the area again.

Cozy restaurant in the evening, with a good view of the sunset for dinner. Had chef's special steak with chips/fries which were great and a good cocktail, staff are attentive and you can have heated lamps and blankets for chilly evenings.

From the beginning of my stop at this restaurant, the people made the evening. The Hostess was personable, easy to relate to, and worked to provide me with a table that met my expectations, even without a reservation. Mario was my server and he was hsppy to help me learn a few words in Croatian. He made a very good recommendation for a starter that was delicious. The food was tasty and Dubravka is not trying to be something it is not. They serve good food at reasonable prices!
Enjoy 
Howard

We were drawn to the restaurant by its views and lucky enough to have a table in the front row with brilliant views over the castle walls and water. 

As a restaurant in a prime tourist spot, we were a little concerned that the restaurant might rely too heavily on its location – but the food was good, and we enjoyed both the seafood salad. 

The food alone is probably deserving of a rating somewhere between 3 and 4, but the views definitely push this to a solid score of 4.

Beautiful location. Definitely make reservations to get a patio sea view table. The views are beautiful especially at sunset. Right outside the Pile gate. Prices were reasonable. The staff were friendly and had great recommendations. The mussels were good, but the star was the apple pie.
Super tasty food, welcoming and friendly staff, cocktails were amazing and the ambience was lovely with a live guitar player
Amazing view, lovely music. The food was delicious and the staff were all lovely. There was live music and a good atmosphere. Would recommend this restaurant!

…. Not really, but I jokingly asked if the table lamps changed colour and our weightier set me a challenge. 

The location, the view, the service, the menu, the food, the experience - they all worked perfectly for us. We loved our dinner dining experience. I would almost travel back to Croatia just to experience it again (but I did make the light blue ….. so I won ha ha)
Very nice staff and lovely food with an awesome vieuw, especially in the evening. Recommended when you visit the old town Dubrovnik.
OUTSTANDING SERVICE and food. Steven provided outstanding service. We both had beef steak dinners that were excellent
Food and service was amazing would recommend to anyone couples or families. Beautiful setting any time of day. :) amazing
Amazing stater with Octopus! And Pizza Burrata was Perfect! And very kind and helpful waitress👍👍👍

So we got a table with a good view, which was cool. The prices are good for Dubrovnik, not too expensive. I ordered bacon with eggs and the baked was not good at all. The bread with different spreads was delicious though!

4th time in Dubrovnik and we’ve done Restaurant 360 before so tried 1836 on this visit. Great location in a memorable setting. Menu suggests hot starters which are main course pasta dishes, good not great followed by a pizza with too much red onion. Wine recommendation was OK but nothing special. Overall a 6/10 won’t rush back
The food is amazing, also the view from the restaurant - near the walls with the sea below. The staff is incredible too. Prices are ok, even low for the place and the quality. 5 stars

Enjoyable experience on my second visit to this restaurant. Booked in advance this time and had a great table reserved looking across to the city walls and out to sea. Staff were very friendly and service was good. The feta cheese starter was really nice in particular. Highly recommend.

Restaurant Dubravka 1836 has a very awesome location .
Quite busy therefore.
The food is good but a wee bit expensive in reflection to the quality .
Food and drinks are served very fast .
Service is fine

We popped in for a late afternoon drink, planning to pop back to our hotel to get ready for dinner. We didn’t leave!!! 

It's a lovely restaurant set in a great location with a view of the castle and fort.

Having had drinks, and enjoyed the relaxed atmosphere and aware of tables filling up around us with people dressed for dinner, we experienced professional friendly service with no pressure to leave or order food.

A guitarist, Zamit, set up next to our table & played acoustic numbers. We sat and listened and enjoyed his whole set. He was fantastic and definitely a reason we stayed and went on to order food. We ended u getting chatting to him as we were guessing the songs, he even did a request. This led to us chatting to a waiter about songs as he served us our last round of drinks & Zamit packed up. 

We had 1 evening in Dubrovnik and we were so happy to have found this place! Shame we weren't staying longer as I think we'd have been back multiple times. I will definitely go back if I go back to Dubrovnik.

Great evening! Would 100% recommend!

Ate here as we were starting a walking tour from just outside after dinner. Food was good and staff were excellent. They also have 2 other restaurants in the chain and all offer 10% off with their voucher.

Our dinner at Dubravka was fantastic. The ambience is beautiful, the service is exceptional and the food is delicious!! Definitely try the apple pie for dessert and make reservations ahead of time. Such a perfect evening!! We can’t wait to come back!
Very delicious food and wine with a tremendous view on the city walls 👌 very friendly hosts also. Very nice experience
Great restaurant, food is fresh and delicious, good prices, super friendly staff and amazing views! We would definitely visit again!

Firstly, to Gibi (Ivan) thank you so much for making my mums birthday so amazing! The wait staff, guitarist and food were all top notch - a flawless evening in Dubrovnik! You won’t be disappointed. As recommended by Gibi we had the seafood risotto and Beef fillet - both amazing, and the cocktails, wine and coffee all to die for! A beautiful cake presented in the end with a huge sparkler!! Absolutely above and beyond service! We will definitely be back
Had a amazing time! Customer service was fantastic and the live guitar really added to atmosphere making it a very special night to remember.

The background setting is amazing. The sun set & the walls are lit up.
The staff were attentive & friendly.
The food was good as was the wine & I didn’t think the prices were bad for saying it’s right next to the walls.
We enjoyed our evening, there was a guy playing guitar in the background.

Best quality to price ratio so far here in Dubrovnik!
Go jsiabsufksbaudiwnagayqldbvxusmavatakqbducnwbdj
Our waiter was super nice..Nebo! Food favours and portions are good for the price. Amazing view. Great service!
We had here lunch and it was amazing..superb sevice and nice view.. highly recommend Dubravka if you are in Dubrovnik

We had a great time, me and my three friends. 
The portions and flavours were great. Location was beautiful but particularly the highlight of the night was Damir on guitar playing the whole evening. Super talented dude, will definitely come back again.

Excellent food, yummy cocktails, perfect service, amazing view of the sea at sunset…couldn’t ask for more!
Sea food was cooked to perfection!
Stunning location overlooking the city walls. Yes maybe a little more expensive that other restaurants nearby but well worth it in my view. Food we had was all super fresh and beautifully presented.

My friends and I came here for brekkie and it was so delicious!! Even more so with such a beautiful view and setting. We were served by a very funny and helpful Mr Jasmine who suggested I have the tomato and mozzarella omelette. I was very pleasantly surprised, the omelette was delicious. The coffee wasn’t my favourite however I haven’t had a good coffee since I arrived overseas as living in Australia has naturally made me a coffee snob. Alas the coffee was still alright and Jasmine made us giggle a lot. Great spot for brekkie !
Lovely vegetarian breakfast (grilled veggies + fruit + bread with spreads) and soy milk available. Beautiful view of the water
A lovely meal in a lovely setting. Restaurant was great with my young family and also allergies. Food was excellent, would highly recommend.

Really beautiful venue overlooking the water with lots of seating. Food and drinks were okay, nothing particularly special but there were lots of options which was nice. The service was very good despite how busy the restaurant was.

I booked this restaurant as a treat for my family and we all loved it. Had a great table outside and views were gorgeous. Staff were friendly and helpful and food was delicious, we are all vegetarian and there was so much choice. Would totally reccomend and am sure we will be back.
Good restaurant, good place and good wine. Peuple are very kind and it was a real pleasure to have dinner here

Simply the best breakfast I’ve ever had, such an amazing view and friendly staff with great service, will visit again, I was warned by locals to avoid old town area restaurants for the high cost, this restaurant had very reasonable prices for being next door to old town.
Beautiful place, delicious food, amazing service, we went here twice and both times we loved it, really recommend it!! ❤️ Sofya
lovely environment, fantastic views, live music, and friendly staff, no need to pre book, should always come, super good location and easy to find 🧡😁🇭🇷

We hadn’t reserved but were placed on a waiting list and seated well within the predicted 20 minutes. Very pleasant waiter, excellent negronis, great sunset over the old walls, very good food, talented live guitarist, reasonable prices
Great service being professional and courteous. Didn’t rush us as we spent sometime relaxing. Food was beautiful and setting just as nice
Very friendly staff, delicious meals, beautiful view on the sea, old town. Portion size is suprisingly big, prices are reasonable…
Excellent staff, great food and drinks! Strongly recommend this restaurant with a lovable view of Dubrovnik walls and sea!
We had a very good time with my friends, food is really good (would recommend the lasagna as entree and all the sea food for main course). Waiters are very nice. 100% recommend.
We had a very good time in this restaurant. The vue is beautiful and the food very good. Good service and not too much expensive. We recommend!
Partner loved his food. So did my parents. I didnt enjoy mine but not because there was anything wrong, it just wasnt for me.
Excellent service food delicious. Waiter native a. so friendly and helpful. Top class. View amazing.
Superb location great service and nice food. In a town full of touristy places this one hit the spot on all counts. Might repeat

This restaurant came recommended by a TUI representative, and I wish we hadn't bothered, I would have come away with a far more positive view of Dubrovnik. The location is just outside the walled city and I was excited to be having breakfast here. We were shown to a table, given menus by one waiter and the next waiter promptly removed them and was only allowing us to order coffee, I had to ask for them back. We received in the end half a breakfast and he pretty much ignored us, I would go as far as saying he was hostile. It spoiled the rest of the day and my advice to anyone visiting the walled city, is to wander before anything opens which will take about an hour, then go back to your resort and enjoy your holiday.

For a few steps from the old town gates, a wall side table offered us a moment of bliss as the sun set on Dubrovnik.
The food was spectacular and the wine equally so.
Rade took care of us as we truly enjoyed our final night in this splendid little corner of the world.
Wholeheartedly recommend this as a meal that takes you away from the hustle and bustle but still let's you enjoy the beauty, all the whilst being waited on perfectly.
Great location. Excellent food. First class service. We tried the prawns, tuna steaks, salmon, chicken/ bacon - all delicious

A fabulous lunch from start to finish. Fresh, tasteful food - I recommend the grilled beefsteak! 
Recommendations given and helpful pointers about portion sizes (pizza was fairly large and my partner ordered for a starter, however it was delectable.

An extremely friendly, helpful and attentive waiter unfortunately I forgot to get his name. 
We would definitely return - 5 stars!

It was the most Pleasant restaurant we have experienced in Dubrovnik!
5 Stars food and service!

Hope to come Back on day!
Best wishes from Porto!

BEST RESTAURANT in Dubrovinik, gorgeous views. Great atmosphere. Went every day whilst we were there. 

It’s busy so best to book. The lamb was so tasty. Fresh seafood platter. The service was attentive and greet. Highly recommend this restaurant

A wonderful meal , every meal was so enjoyable, the truffle ravioli was out of this world and our waiter Blaz was so informative on the whole menu and guided us on the best dishes , second visit was amazing

Great food and excellent hospitality!
Mussels Buzara style and seafood risotto are amazing.
Despite we didn’t reserve the table, we can enter with good terrace seat in lunch time.
We had an amazing and delicious breakfast with the best view! Everyone working there is very friendly. Would definitely recommend.

This venue is surprisingly great value,considering its location! The old Town b
and general surroundings in general will offer you mediocre food at expensive prices! This restaurant will provide you with excellent fare,service and a beautiful view of your surroundings . It is no more expensive than other restaurants but you WILL be served EXCELLENT FOOD at GOOD PRICES!! Worth a visit
Can’t ask for more. Great view, delicious food and nice service ! Will come back tmr again ! Will strongly recommend! Pls come

This is exactly the type of restaurant we were looking for! The food and atmosphere were both great. Make a reservation and ask for a table water-side. We watched the sun go down and it was a beautiful sunset. Also, the cocktails are masterpieces of art! Each one is delicious and beautiful with a great presentation. We both got pizzas and loved our meals.

We had lunch here - ordered a pizza and a salad. The pizza was nice but the chicken salad was really really disappointing, to the point it was almost inedible. We were expecting a Caesar salad but it was just chicken lettuce tomato cucumber and grated carrot with a watery sauce in the bottom. Perhaps we made a bad menu choice given the other positive reviews but this was the worst meal we had in Dubrovnik.
The food was above average but the service was amazing. The location was great - the view was great and the place was easy to find

Highly recommend visiting restaurant Nocni bar, we have been a few times for breakfast and dinner, food is amazing and staff are great.
Restaurant is right at the entrance to the old Town at bus turning point.
Perfect lunch in old town. We came at 2 pm ni problem finding a table even tho the restaurant was busy. Pizza was very good!

Having unable to get the booking at the desired time, we got the reservation for 9 pm. The views would have been better when there was still some daylight but none the less night views are pretty beautiful if you are lucky to get a terrace sitting. The food is decent and the services are good. There is only couple seating at the end of the wall so families can't get the best of the tables. Since we also visited Panorama which belongs to the same Nautica group, we got 10% discount on the entire bill. If you happen to visit any of the 3 restaurants then don't forget to ask for a discount voucher if you plan to visit another one later. The prices are a little higher than the other restaurants but the views and food is worth it.
Good food , best steak had in a while , amazing service fantastic x partner had salmon and salad all fresh and tasty x dessert to die for
Atmosphere and views were great. Menu, food and service were good. We were sitting in the outside area which was lovely.
Great food, great atmosphere, great service. Would highly recommend. All in a lovely setting with a great view of the sea and castle walls.

In our week in Dubrovnik this was by far the best dining experience we had! The pizza I ordered was sublime (quattro formaggi), the staff was friendly and professional and it was fairly priced as well. Unfortunately we didn't get a view right by the edge overseeing the ocean, but got a good spot nonetheless. And fair enough, we didn't book in advance, so that was our fault (this was during high season).

All in all, would definetly recommend!
Nice atmosphere with guitar music, good waiters, good food, good view. Well just a perfect Time. We will come back for sure

What a fantastic restaurant! The staff were not only friendly and accommodating, but incredibly professional. The food was excellent as well, we tried a few dishes and came back for a second visit to try some more. Added to that we had a really great experience with some relaxed live music and enjoyed the backdrop featuring in game of thrones. Great place!!!!
Lovely restaurant with a great view of the bay. The food was fantastic, and the service too. Would recommend.

Great service and food! 
Unfortunate that when we visited the mussels were particularly small. However all the other 11 dishes or so were great. Front of house were also great! Top service, best received in Croatia.

"Dubravka 1836" is one of 4 Dubrovnik restaurants under common ownership (see also my review of "Arsenal") and is perfectly located close to the famous Pile Gate, overlooking a rocky cove and fortifications including Fort Bokar. The restaurant is very popular and it's certainly worth reserving in advance in high season, given the number of people we saw waiting hopefully at the entrances for tables to become fee. Fortunately, we reserved in advance and managed to secure a table directly overlooking the cove for both dinner and lunch, which I can recommend. 

There is an extensive menu (available online) as the restaurant is open, for breakfast, lunch and dinner. At dinner, we shared a starter of a cold fish platter followed by mains of King Prawns in a tomato and caper sauce and a hot fish/seafood platter. The food was perfectly cooked and I particularly enjoyed the prawns, but beware, as they are head and shell on and it's a little challenging to avoid getting coated with sauce, although the staff kindly provided a bib. Desserts were excellent and we enjoyed a bottle of the Maraslina Miljas white wine, priced at HRK230 (c.£29). We enjoyed the meal so much that we celebrated with Grand Marnier and the final price for 2 persons for dinner was HRK 1,184 (c.£148), ex. tip. I should add that the service was friendly, attentive and professional throughout. 

A few days later, we returned for lunch and had the same shared starter and a mains of the mixed fish/seafood platter, which was good but less enjoyable and flavoursome than the King Prawns in sauce. This time the final bill for 2 was HRK 1,049 (c.£130). Obviously, the restaurant is quite expensive, but typical for Dubrovnik and we found the food, drink and service to be reliably good and with the added advantage of a great location.

This restaurant is sited just outside Pile Gate, one of the two main entrances to Dubrovnik Old Town. It sells ice cream which was just heavenly. The portion size was generous and the cost was fantastic: one scope 18 Kuna (£2), Two scopes 26 kuna (£3). 

Good flavors: orange / green apple / pineapple. 

I will most defiantly be going back.
We visited during our honeymoon and the restaurant went over and above to look after us and give us the most fantastic experience. Would definitely recommend.

Me and a friend ate a 3 course meal as our last stop on vacation.
Starter out with a pasta with a slowcooked and perfectly spiced bolognese.
The Beef steak with mustard/gin sauce was amazing and easily a 10/10 with a perfekt sear and a perfect medium rare.
The dessert were so good i had to order 2 of them.

The entire visit was topclass with staff and greaters of the highest quality.

Easily the best place in Dubrovnik.

Visited twice, just outside city walls. Had breakfast and a lunch, food lovely and view is fabulous! Service excellent, what I love is they don't rush you, was here for nearly three hours for lunch. Happy for you to sit and go at your own pace. No need to book. I'd cone again definitely.
Great location,with beautiful view, nice Service and great chillout tunes. Food and beverage are simply great. Will be great to come back again.
On our first girls trip to Dubrovnik last year we came in to this restaurant by coincidence. This time we booked in advance because we just love the spot and the food is really delicious!
Excellent service, food, view and atmosphere!! Amazing🇭🇷 portions are solid and the food is really tasty, definitely coming back🙌🏽🙌🏽
Great service! Best place in Dubrovnik! Very good food and ambient. Very good location. Beautiful view. Food is very delicious

Popped into this restaurant to have a drink. We were shown to our table, which was by the wall overlooking the sea and lovely view. It was very busy, but the service was good. Ordered a couple of rounds of drinks, which came up quickly. We didn't have food, as we had already booked a table at their sister restaurant Gradska Kavana Arsenal. Other tables were enjoying food, which looked delicious, so when we go back to Dubrovnik we'll definitely eat there. If you happen to see this restaurant, pop in there and ask for their card. This will give you 10% discount in any of their restaurants.

Very attentive service, knowledgeable waiter who we asked a lot of questions. Great food brilliant location. Waiter recommended the Apple pie which was awesome. Great atmosphere. I will definitely be coming back
Great food, excellent service, amazing location and views. Definitely the best place in Dubrovnik, you won’t go wrong for sure!
Fantastic restaurant. Great food and fabulous service. This is in an ideal spot and very popular. Staff really friendly and helpful. Steaks were amazing.
Stumbled across this restaurant on our first day looking for lunch, had excellent food and drinks, all enjoyed everything. Service was wonderful from the whole team :)
The octopus salad and seafood pizza is very delicious and we want to come again. The view from terrace is also good.

Food was so tasty and service was excellent. We had a cold and hot appetizer to start the evening. Sun was setting during our dinner for a 7:30pm searing. Super delighted with how generous their portions are. 

We thought we’d be here only for the view but the food was great and an added bonus was some live instrumental music playing in the background. Recommend their cocktails - again, very generous with the amount of alcohol and ingredients into every drink! 

Our server Stipe was very friendly and tended meticulously to our needs. Overall a great experience and we will defo be back!
Absoultely fantastic food, service and scenery! Burrata, fish plate and cheesecake were out of this world. Would recommend 10/10!
Food, ambient and service were out of this world! Outstanding! We enjoyed every second here! Come and enjoy best view!!!

All in all effective and good service & delicious food. We ate fish plates, I took mushrooms as side dish and my wife a salad. 

Food was very well prepared. Not too much salt and not over / undercooked, just perfect.

Very good, trustworthy fine dining! Nice!

We visited 2 times during our stay in Dubrovnik and both times we had an a amazing experience. The view from the balcony is amazing and the service 10/10. We ordered the truffle ravioli and it’s one of the best food we got during our stay. Recommend!

Beautiful dining experience beneath the walls of Dubrovnik. Polite and organized stuff. Dinner was excellent and desert even better. We ate fried calamari and octopus salad. From deserts I would definitely recommend apple pie with ice cream.
The wait staff was warm and welcoming, and very helpful in choosing our wine and food! The prices are also very reasonable comparatively. We would definitely come back here again!

We had an excellent time at Dubravka 1836! The food is delicious (we had feta salad, burrata salad, napolitano pizza, apple pie ala mode) and the staff is very friendly. Our server was Antun and he did an exceptional job taking care of us. The ambiance is serene and views are one of a kind. I highly recommend a visit.
The waiter, Anton, slightly shy, but so warm and welcoming. The seafood platter was an excellent choice.

Amazing food, fabulous staff and lovely ambiance.
Watching people jumping off the rocks adds to the experience
This restaurant has an amazing view of the town, the service was exceptional and the food was delicious! Highly recommend!
We were recommended this restaurant. Wonderful food, watched the sunset, great service and very affordable. The house white was exceptional if you enjoy dry white wine:

Had lunch here the last day om Dubrovnik. Perfect location with a view of the city wall and sea. Excellent food, service and staff. Came to check in on us several times. Very very good service who paid attention to the customers☺️

5 of us went for dinner here one evening while on holidays. Firstly the view of Dubrovnik Walls was stunning, the food was so delicious (seafood pasta was especially yummy) and the service was exceptional. We were so well looked after, would definitely return.

On our 2nd to last night in dubrovnik we visited this restaurant. Wow!! We tried to visit a few days before but they were all booked up. We made a reservation two days later and the meal was excellent. The service was fantastic. What a great place to visit, surrounded by the old town. Will definitely come again.....

Decided last minute to find a sit-down place with a great view and the host didn't disappoint! Things only got better from there. Ivan was very engaging and did not hesitate to answer all of our questions since it was my first time dining there. The gin and tonic was good and the presentation was gorgeous. The mussels are to die for! Had to order more bread to soak up the sauce. Then the Gratinated Beef came along with grilled veggies... I though I was getting full from all the bread right before but the first bite changed my mind. I have to go back to taste other things and have more of that gin and tonic! Did I say Ivan was an awesome server? Well, he is!

Delicious veal Wiener Schnitzel and Rib steak Dalmatian style accompanied by grilled vegetables and swiss-chard-potatoes for a light lunch at the beautiful terrace overlooking the fortres Lovrijenac. Simple but delicious. Beer and a glass of wine...what more can we ask for. And the price was moderate. Service was excellent but I woud suggest to make reservations in advance because there is always a queue at the entrance. On-line reservations worked perfectly.
Food was incredible. Got the salmon with grilled vegetables and the burratta to start. Great service, fun staff and beautiful views! What an awesome start to our vacation!

This restaurant along with their sister restaurant (Panorama) is a must visit when in Dubrovnik. Wide range of choice on the menu, beautiful cocktails and impeccable service. The waiters are all friendly and extremely attentive, we especially enjoyed the service from Anita on our second visit. The terrace is a lovely setting to enjoy a meal and also take in the views of Dubrovnik. Definitely add this place to your itinerary
I love this place so much ! Five stars ! Great food and lovely staff ! I love the pizza and cocktails
Excellent food and fantastic service from the lady with short blonde hair. Would definitely recommend anyone visiting to go to this restaurant.
Nice food, great location, and reasonable price. Nice music. Nice service. I liked the octopus salad. Would love to visit again.

Excellent view of the shore and fort bokar and the service, the food was so delicious!! We ordered seafood pizza absolutely amazing, very thin bottom layer. And fish soup was so fresh, just love everything about it

We went for lunch after having had lots of references. Beautiful restaurant at perfect location. Service is really old school. I had a cocktail, perfect made and presented. A gift seeing it and drinking it. Food is delicious and nicely presented. I myself had the King Prawns. Delicious!! Place to be and to eat!!
The location of the restaurant is amazing! It was the first place we sat upon our arrival in Dubrovnik, thanks to its inviting atmosphere. We had pizza which was very good. The service is great too.

Fab food and fab service Rakija was fantastic defo would recommend and return thanks pizza great 
!!!
very good service with nice food and cocktails.step by no regrets 3 times in a row: Highly recommended.

First night when we arrived in Dubrovnik we had booked table for 11 , we were seated under covered area, our server was Neven, we all had cold starters and main dishes, food was nice and well prepared not high class but for the prize they were more than honest. We had bride party in Dubrovnik and from the start of our trip everything was hastily, we asked for good place to go after the dinner he suggested us Revelin club and even booked lounge for us calling his friend who was working there. Restaurant was quite clean and nice decorated even live music was amazing it was pair of two, the girl was amazing.
Also really nice was from them that they gave us promotion card for their 3 more siblings restaurants and we visited all of them(Arsenal breakfast is superb ) ,thank you soo much for wonderfull dinning in all of your three restaurants, kisses from the girls see you soon ✨😘👰
Amazing food with an equally incredible view! The staff were lovely and very quick with all the food and drinks we ordered. Lovely meal.
The food was excellent, the waiters were very friendly. We took the seafood pasta and salmon. We'll come back next time!
Amazing location and the service was fantastic as were the drinks. The food was decent but not the best but the price was reasonable for the location so didn’t ruin the experience.
We had lunch overlooking the sea on our first day in Dubrovnik, beautiful location with great food service and they gave us a discount card for there sister restaurants in the city.

Lovely food and setting! The fish was great, would recommend the muscles and would recommend getting a table before sunset as the view is wonderful. 

Only downside was that the service was a little slow and the live music questionable with someone playing the keyboard quite badly.

Absolutely delicious food, charming staff and unbelievable views! We had the seafood linguine followed by two of their cakes (cheesecake and chocolate walnut cake), and the food was outstanding. Brilliant Bloody Mary and Kir Royale also.

We had an exceptional dinner at Dubravka 1836 l!! Everything from the service, setting, food and wine was brilliant. We didn’t have a reservation but I would recommend making one as we saw plenty of people trying to eat there. Our server was Neven from the start he was very attentive and even he was extremely busy he came and introduce to us and asked if we need some drinks to start, and that was so nice that he noticed because we came over after the walls, we shared mussels together on his recommendation, my husband had salmon in dill sauce i had a gratinated beef fillet for main,both very tasty, and cream to the end when i went to the toilet Neven and John made the best suprise ever for my birthday night at the midnight they were singing me in quiet a birthday song(sorry about tears of joy)and even had candle and message happy B-Day, thank you very much for the best dinner ever and see you again in two months. PS John is hoping that Liverpool will be #1
Lovely coffee spot, lovely staff, beautiful view and terrace, the food was so delicious and service is good.
The food was so delicious. The waiters were extremely friendly and couldn’t do enough. We had a beautiful seat on the outside. Stunning

Another year, another enjoyable meal. For many years we have enjoyed meals in this restaurant, it never fails to please. The food is expertly prepared, professionally served and always delicious. We were lucky to be served again by our favourite waitress, Anita, who makes the experience even more enjoyable.
See you again soon!

We first came for drinks and was seated against the wall with a view of the water and Ivan was lovely and took photos of us for us. Then we thought it was so lovely we came the next night for food (your second visit you get 10% off!) & Ivan served us again and he was equally as polite and helpful. Only thing to note is the hot starters are full sized meals but Ivan helped us to cancel the main meal when we realised this which was very kind. The seafood pasta was lovely and the chicken with potatoes was lovely. The Caribbean dream cocktail was gorgeous too. 100% recommend!

We were recommended this place by our holiday rep and it was wonderful. Feeling upmarket but was pleasantly surprised at how reasonable it was. My boyfriend and I visited this place a couple of times for lunch and we were both delighted with the wonderful cocktails and the very tasty and excellent quality food, as well as the fact its tucked away next to the walls of the old town, with wonderful sea views. The second time we went we ordered 2 beautiful cocktails, a large pizza (amazing) and a bottle of water and it came to about 27 quid... two thumbs up.

What a great pleasure to return and receive the same warm wellcome as last summer. The waiters pay attention to individual customers and exchange a few words when seating and taking the order. Food is delicious and the location just outside the city walls gives nice scenery to all directions. The menu is so reasonably priced in expensive Dubrovnik that I could eat here every day.
We ate here several times for lunch and dinner. Each time, the food was excellent and the service really good. The setting is lovely with beautiful views.
Nice breakfast, good service, beautiful location. Best meal so far in Dubrovnik, none of the nine of us have anything to complain about!

Amazing food, I recommend Bianca and ravioli
Amazing view, really kind service and they also gave us a coupon for 10% discount to use to any of the 3 restaurants they have
Beautiful view and atmosphere by the Old Town. I would recommend the ravioli with truffles and prosciutto

Beautiful views of the water and walls of Dubrovnik. Food was great! We had the ravioli and truffle with prosciutto. Service is also great. They have live music during the evening. Would come back and recommend to friends and family.

Great service. They want you to take your time and enjoy with any rush. Food was great quality and delicious. I had the ravioli truffle prosciutto. Wonderful view and outdoor seating. Fairly priced. Definitely recommend and would come back again.
The service was very fast, the staff it’s friendly! You have to try the octopus salad and mussels. Definitely will come back

This restaurant is part of a chain of three, including the Gradska kavana arsenal and the panoramic. All are very good. This one feels the busiest of the three, and is slightly cheaper than the other two. 
Food and drinks were very good, and service was excellent considering how busy it was the evening we visited. 
Views are amazing, try and sit close to the edge of the restaurant for the best view

We stumbled upon this restaurant after getting off the bus and it ended up being our best meal out! 
Drinks were cold! And quick! 
We had the chicken and bacon with dauphinois potatoes which were superb and the best Greek salad which has been spoken about daily since 😀 … the feta was out of this world. Portions were generous! 
Staff were so friendly and pleasant. 
Stunning location, chilled music and just 10/10!
It was great! The food was awesome. The service was great as well, the music was relaxing and beautiful setting.

Well organised, chilled atmosphere. The hostesses were very professional and quick.
Our head waiter Iwan was very knowledgeable, professional and welcoming.
Food is at the highest standards as well as their wine list. We tried the carpaccio and the mortadella pizza. 
Would return anytime!
We really enjoyed our time at this restaurant. The waitresses are very polite and kind. Good service and good food. The view is also very pretty😊

I never write reviews but felt I needed to give this restaurant the feedback they deserve. 
We were seated outside with a beautiful view. 

The food was gorgeous. We shared a seafood risotto and I had a steak which was cooked perfectly and melted in the mouth. 

There were plenty of waiters milling around and our waiter tended to our every need. My friend who is 30 weeks pregnant was overheating and they moved us to a table by a fan and brought ice over. When she couldn’t stomach her main meal, they took it off our bill which was completely above and beyond what we expected as we were totally willing to pay for the uneaten food. They invited us back warmly and wished my friend well. 

I can’t wait to visit again in September with my partner and son. Such lovely vibes, views and food. 

Thank you very much again for your fantastic service!!

Great menu and staff ,our second time in a week 
We had a lovely table overlooking the city walls 
Will go again before the end of our holiday
Trevor Cambridge England

Amazing food, amazing service and an outstanding view!! 

Make sure you make a booking for this restaurant as you do not want to miss out! We waited about 40 minutes to get a table outside and it was well worth the wait! 

Even though the restaurant was busy we did not feel rushed and the servers were amazing and friendly.

Dinner for two with a great view! But this wasn’t just a lovely setting - the food was excellent as was the service. I had the mixed seafood dish, my husband had a capriccio pizza, both exceeded our expectations and good value for the quality of our experience. Great atmosphere too, would highly recommend.
We booked the restaurant twice as the service, food and restaurant location were superb. I would strongly recommend booking in advance.
Seafood tagliatelle are very good. The quatro formagi pizza is horible. It doesn’t taste like cheese and it’s missing three of the four cheeses. The medium beefstake is dry and overdone.

We had lunch at this restaurant and was seated with a view of the water.

We orderedthe vegetable pizza and the pasta dish topped with salmon. Both dishes were excellent and we throughly enjoyed ourselves. This place becomes very popular in the evenings and advance booking is recommended. We came for lunch and managed to bag a nice table.
Excellent food, service fantastic and view was incredible! Well worth a visit, the wine and ambience made this restaurant

The atmosphere here is lovely, especially if you can get a view over the sea. We visited twice, once for breakfast (which was delicious, extremely fast too!), and once for dinner. The pizza is really tasty, as are the mussels. We enjoyed the omelettes in the morning too, only thing we found a little odd was the mozzarella in the omelette as obviously mozzarella has high water content it made it a little watery inside! Overall, really good though - would return!

We stopped in for lunch kind of expecting a tourist trap with mediocre food (given its location), but were very pleasantly surprised with our experience! The service was quick and very friendly, even around 1:00p during peak season, and the food and drinks were delicious. We would definitely return for another meal.

We had a wonderful time at Dubravka 1836 restaurant for my wife's birthday. Service and food was excellent. The location is perfect for an evening meal, especially at dusk. Just a word in the waiter's ear about my wife's birthday and we received a lovely chocolate cake and 3 if the staff sang happy birthday along with the house band. Fabulous night!
We were seated right alongside the wall with the best views of the sea and city walls. A fabulous night of good food, first class service and a brilliant sunset. Highly recommended.
We tried online to get a booking but it was booked out, so we tried a walk in and staff were very helpful, a table was available after 15 minutes. Lovely views, the seafood tagliatelle was delicious.

Nice breakfast with pretty view over the ocean and walls to the old town.

I ordered the sunny side up eggs with bacon. The bacon felt like high quality and we also got a small basket with bread and jams.

Amazing location and good service without feeling too touristy. Always very busy. The salmon was very undercooked so we sent it back but to be fair to the restaurant they did give us a free desert and reduced bill. Great service but wouldn’t return for the food.

Had a great late lunch; seated by wall so we had great views of Old Town walls, Fortress and Bay (GOT Kings Landing) . Great food and wine menu with excellent waiter service; recommend sea bream or fish options
Stunning location and a great food and wine menu. Worth booking ahead and asking for a table overlooking the gate. Staff are really friendly too

We came here on a Saturday evening and I think we were lucky to find a table without reservation. The staff were so friendly and made us feel really welcome. I had a vegetarian pizza which was really delicious and my partner had seafood risotto. The desert options were also lovely. We shared a cheese cake which I would highly recommend. We highly recommend this place to anyone.
reasonably priced, excellent food - we ate there three times in a week! Sister property to Nautika, a Michelin-starred restaurant just across the square.
Really nice setting, great food and service plus value for money. What else can one want. Only criticism, outside seating chairs a little unconfortable

Found this restaurant on our first night in Dubrovnik. Location is stunning - just outside the walls of the old town with the sound of the waves and a breeze coming in off the sea.
Great range of cocktails and drinks. The food was wonderful (try the vegetarian risotto) and catered for our range of tastes and allergies.
It was so good, we visited again on our last night.
Will definitely revisit the 1836 next time we are in Dubrovnik.

Back in this wonderful city for a number of days and we headed straight back to Dubravka restaurant.
As with our numerous previous visits the venue is stunning, sitting outside overlooking the Adriatic. 
Staff near perfect and the food good.
Mario, Anita, Ivan, Stepy and many other staff, too many to mention and always welcoming and efficient.

We booked a table at the Dubravka restaurant before travelling to Croatia for our holidays, we thought we would splash out for birthday treat.
We were not disappointed, the restaurant is at the entrance to the old city which is a lovely place, we were made to feel very welcome on our arrival and shown to our table , everything was explained clearly regarding menu choices and the drinks.
The view from the terrace was breath taking. The service was absolutely flawless. The team was very considerate and always present when we needed them.

Expected better after so many good reviews, but was disappointed. Lots of tables scrammed into a small area outside, pigeons flying around and underneath your feet while seated at the tables which was really uncomfortable so we moved inside to eat. Food was ok, we had pizza. Would not return.
Great food and lovely views! Restaurant is situated just outside the entrance to the old town with views over the city walls. Portion sizes are good and restaurant is good value for money!
Pleasant dinner on the spot with a wonderful atmosphere, thanks to which you will forgive even minor shortcomings :-)

The setting is priceless, overlooking the old harbor, with the walls on one side and the fort on the other. Some tasteful live music added to the experience. The service was excellent, and the menu extensive. Each course was delicious and the wine very good. And for Dubrovnik, the prices were very reasonable.

The food, the drinks and the view are stunning. I have been to Dubravka a few times now and whether i have had a reservation or not i have always been accomodated quickly. The selection of food and drinks is good and the smoked old fashioned is the best i've ever had. The view of the fort is a perfect setting.
It was my husbands birthday on the day we arrived in Dubrovnik and we had a late lunch here. The service, food and setting was fabulous

This was my first meal in croatia- and i had the mussels. The portions were HUGE! 

Antonio was my waiter and he was so attentive!

The music and vibe was truly relaxing- the only downside were the pigeons on the aide of the walls. Otherwise, great experience!

My partner and I had the most amazing romantic meal sitting outside with the beautiful lighting and music. Service was impeccable, 5 star. I highly recommend the chicken tagliatelle and the cheesecake.
Friendly and helpful staff - great food - fair prices - would highly recommend if you are visiting Dubrovnik old town.

Food nice and location very nice . This was all let down by rude unhappy waiter. We asked for bottle of water which was missing from our order. Waiter just grunted and threw his eyes up in the air. Very surly throughout Ruined the experience. Most of the staff seemed fine but this guy needs to maybe look at another line of work if he is so unhappy in his current job.

We came to this restaurant on recommendation of a friend. What thrilled us at first sight was the beautiful view of the walls of Dubrovnik.The food we ordered was great and the prices are popular.
We ate seafood risotto, pasta bolognese and salmon steak in dill sauce.Very delicios!
Beautiful restaurant with a nice ambience. The food was really nice and the service was excellent. The options are pricey but that's to be expected of every fine dining restaurant.

Very nicely set out, staff very smart, lovely position , we only had from starter menu and found it a little pricey, but we enjoyed it and it was very busy so obviously popular. Had a prime position so I expect price is reflected in this.

Great location, good food and wine at reasonable prices, attentive waiter and live music - what more can you ask for. I made a reservation for outdoor seating and was placed in a lovely spot along the outside wall. Just had a wonderful evening. I choose this restaurant for my first night figuring it to be a casual place for weary travelers. I subsequently spend much more money the next three nights and none were better than this stop.

We've been to Dubrovnik a few times and always return to this restaurant. The staff are always so friendly and welcoming. The coffee is always really good and it's a great location just outside of the old town city walls and offers amazing views. We will always return whenever in Dubrovnik.

Had a truly superb meal here, lovely location beside city walls with great coastal view. My partner had pork medallions which were lovely but we both agreed my dish of gratinated beef fillet was amazing; best meal I’ve had in years. Service and ambiance great, highly recommended.

Such a wonderful restaurant, service and food outstanding, and price very reasonable too. We ate here our first two nights in Dubrovnik, we hadn’t received a tip off, just by chance found it as walking past on the hunt for a restaurant. We did not expect the food and service to live up to the view, but it certainly did, so we booked for the following night and asked for a lovely harbour wall table which was wonderful. Both nights the food, and service was excellent. Grilled squid and vegetables and the fresh pasta amazing. Highly recommended!

We visited Dubravka 1836 for lunch based on a recommendation from our tour guide.

The restaurant is in a lovely location just outside the city walls with a view of the fort and the sea.

5 star review based on surprising food quality, service and value in such an obvious tourist location.

We had a nice simple lunch with Greek salad and grilled squid with a Sauvignon by the glass and a draught beer.

We returned a couple of days later for Dinner where we enjoyed beef carpaccio, veal and the fish plate with chard potatoes with more wines by the glass.

All were very tasty with friendly attentive service.

Musicians playing at dinner was a nice touch.

Booked this restaurant for our last special evening in Dubrovnik and it didn't disappoint. The waiter was so friendly and attentive. We had a table next to the sea wall, would recommend booking for this. The food was delicious, although it says 'starters' on the menu they are full size plates. Perfect evening would recommend.
Nevan was amazing. The seafood is second to none and the service unbelievable, not pricy either. Incredible view as well. Do not miss this place

Really nice casual dining with friends on bautifull terrace. Our waiter recomended us cocktails to start and they were great. My friend had mixed fish plate for main and i tried salmon. Both dishes looked and taste so good.
I can't forget great service from the second we were welcomed at the entrance till the moment we left the resaturant.

We had a lovely table and great service on top of delicious food. We didn’t feel rushed and there was a good choice of food. We did book the day before and I think this is necessary to get a table next to the sea
Stopped here for a glass of wine and enjoyed the atmosphere. Very busy area just at the entrance of the old town. Staff helpful. Will definitely go back next time we visit
Beautiful restaurant, we had a pleasant evening. The service and food were great. I definitely recommend this restaurant.

We ate here twice during our 1 week stay I'm Dubrovnik and loved both visits!

Great service, great staff. Reasonably priced and in a perfect location just outside the main gate in to old town and the bus terminal.

Would highly recommend and will return when we are there again!

We went here on 4th May 2022 for my partners 50th birthday after several recommendations raving about how romantic and lovely it was.
We weren't offered a 'window table' yet several couples after us were moved to them once available.
We ordered, myself lasagne and my partner a pizza which we asked for no onions or peppers on.
The food arrived and as soon as the waiter put it down he realised the pizza still had peppers and onions on it. Apologising he whipped it away. 2 minutes later he reappeared with the SAME pizza only the peppers and onions clearly had been picked off!!! 
Not wanting to cause a scene my partner started to eat it. Removing more onions as he did.
We paid and left very unimpressed.
Not a good meal for my partners 50th!!!!
Will not be back or recommending it to anyone.

This was our favourite bar/restaurant we used many times on our 4 day visit to Dubrovnik. Excellent central location nest to the harbour walls and Pile gate entrance! The staff are so friendly and efficient !

We have been for several times(food and drink),and every time was flawless. Good and relaxed atmosphere,nice atentive service and BEST sea food pizza I have ever tried. 
P.S Please can we have your Apple pie recipe. Please

Outstanding restaurant, the views are incredible, the service was perfect and the food was amazing! Despite only spending 36 hours in Dubrovnik myself and my mother ended up returning here for a second time! The breakfast is wonderful and the pizzas are divine

To be honest I didn’t expect this food at this location. Superb!! Pizza and risotto were superb! I’ll be back definitely, first visit here, but one to remember. Professional and atentive sevice, and view is stunning! Best regards to the chef! See you again!

Me and my husband where there for a light supper. Usually by our experience, those restoraunts near the tourist centre are not very good in terms of food and service, but we where pleasentlly surprised. 
From start to finish everythig was great.
We tried ravioli and seafood tagliatele and both were delicios. Service was excellent and timelly. Definitelly would recomend this place.

A superb setting. difficult to beat. Burratta for starters and seafood cold salad. all good. ravioli for mains and salmon huge, and sea bass and graninade potatoes were all awesome. I had mussels, they were very small and many still had beards on. so I wouldn't recommend them. the others defo.

Me and my wife ate here twice on our trip for breakfast and lunch. 
Both times we were seated by the wall with the beautiful view of turquoise Adriatic waters and the Lovrijenac fort in the back ground, this definitely enhanced our experience. 
The food was very nice and reasonably priced but I would like to give a special mention to the service provided. 
We were celebrating my wife’s 30th and we started the day off here. 
It was an exceptional gesture that after our brunch she was greeted with a complimentary “happy birthday” desert followed by x2 complimentary glasses of Prosecco. 
By no means did they have to do this but I felt this really set the day off in the right way and the wife couldn’t of been happier! 
I am very grateful for your kindness and would like to extend my gratitude.
If we ever return to Dubrovnik, we shall be sure to visit again!

Stopped here for dinner on our last night in Dubrovnik and weren't disappointed. Both the service and the food were excellent and the view of the old keep was beautiful. Would definitely recommend and reasonably priced as well.
Right at the Pile gate. Good selection of dishes, professional staff, enjoyable lunch. Not cheap but on a par with similar restaurants

After long walk around city walls we decided to have little break and grab some quick brunch.
Restaurant Dubravka looked like good place for rest and we weren’t wrong.
We tried pizza and were pleasantly surprised with selection of different pizzas they have in menu.
Pizza Mortadella with pistachio was very special and very tasty.
Also I need to mention great and polite service they have.
All in all; highly recommended!

We had eaten here twice during our stay in Dubrovnik. Always found the food really good and reasonably priced. This restaurant has the best views just outside the City walls. Service was always attentive and friendly. There is a card with a 10% coupon for a return visit there or their sister restaurants Panorama or Gradska kavana Arsenal located in the heart of Old city.

We visited in April and it was quite cold/windy so the main outside seating area was shut. Plenty of heaters and blankets inside as the side is still open, so we weren’t cold. Cocktails were fab & food/service good. There was a stray cat who kept running between tables, which was a bit odd.

We had to call a staff member to enquire about availability of a table for 4. Nobody wanted to know so we sat at a table which was free. After 15 minutes we had to approach a staff member to request menus and then 15 minutes later we had to call a member of staff again to place our order. We requested water with our order which was very slow to be delivered. Eventually our order was delivered and the quality was good. We requested more water which again was very slow to be delivered. We were going to select a desert but couldnt get anyone to take the order. I eventually went to the cashiers table , paid the bill and left. I have never experienced bad service like this in a very attractive location.
Seafood risotto was very good! The pizza was alright but nothing special. The service was good and the view was also beautiful.

Sat overlooking the sea shared a pizza and a glass of wine,then another, then another 
Perfect way to spend an afternoon in beautiful surroundings

We stumbled upon the Dubravka on our first day in Dubrovnik and struck lucky with the great food, friendly service and amazing setting between the walls of the Old Town and Lovrijenac fortress. We returned there again a couple of days later for a mid-morning coffee and then again for our final meal before heading up the coast. Unless you're paying top dollar, dining in Dubrovnik is a hit and miss affair, and we endured several overpriced, poor-to-mediocre meals during our stay. But the Dubravka was consistently high quality at a competitive price for the city. We were also given a discount card to use each time we returned or at their sister restaurants. The waiters - all three of whom were called Ivan - were very friendly and attentive. We would completely recommend this restaurant for its great food, ambience and setting.

Tried this cute place on our last day for lunch. The location is great, service was amazing and the food was really good. We hadn’t had a bad experience of food since we arrived in Dubrovnik so was hoping our last day wouldn’t disappoint, it didn’t. This restaurant is part of a group with others that we had also visited so we had some confidence it would be good. I went for chef’s steak and it was cooked perfectly and the sauce was wow. The potatoes were cooked perfectly and complemented the dishes. The cocktails were also very good. It felt very relaxed and I could have stayed there longer than we did.
What an amazing view and setting, we were very lucky to sit in first row of tables during the sunset, pizzas and cakes are amzing, definitely we are coming back again, keepbup the good work

Excellent service, great food and brilliant views. Staff were knowledgable about local wine, and happy to answer any questions. Excellent view (even though we didn’t book until lunch time ). Really recommend.

What a lovely restaurant this is. The location is perfect, right on the sea at the entrance to the Old Town. Beautiful views and perfect for an afternoon refreshment looking across to the fort and out to sea or for a romantic meal at night.
 The food is a very high standard and very reasonably priced we were able to have dinner for 3 with drinks for less than 700 Kuna.
 The main feature however and a key feature of Dubrovnik in general is the quality of the staff, they are extremely friendly, helpful and attentive. We found the service here the best we have experienced so far on our holiday.

Booked here for a birthday dinner whilst in Dubrovnik after finding it rated one of the best on trip advisor. 

We arrived 1hr early by accident but were seated without hassle and given blankets and a heater beside our table. 
Both of our dinners, desserts, drinks and cocktails were excellent but maybe portion size is a little small for the price, but overall generally well priced for the location. 

My only reason for the 4/5 instead of 5/5 would be that nothing was made special about my birthday even though we added that to the notes section of the booking and The waiters were a bit abrupt when asked questions about ingredients in cocktails etc.

A gem of a spot for lunch or dinner. It was recommended to us by our taxi driver (no. 37), and is excellent value, delicious food and great service. You get a 10% discount if you return and there’s no doubt that you will!

BEAUTIFUL VIEWS!!! The covered patio is also quite nice. Excellent service. I stopped here twice during my week in Croatia because of its great location and excellent food. First time had beef carpaccio, second time had a salad with chicken. Both were very fresh and tasty!

This restaurant looks so beautiful and is right by the City Gate with a fabulous view of the Fort and the sea. The atmosphere was so enjoyable and the heaters and blankets made it feel so cosy.
The service was so friendly and attentive and made us feel so welcome. 
The presentation of the food was lovely, and the fresh fish was the best we’ve had anywhere.
What a perfect last night in Dubrovnik, we will be sure to tell our family and friends to visit this gorgeous and restaurant
Delicious food, good service, reasonable prices and a fantastic view! It was our favourite restaurant of the trip.

Oh Wow this place is just stunning from the views out of the cove to sea to the service and the food. As the food was the reason for my it was just amazing! It one of them places that the main course comes as the course everything else is extra. But with the local currency at 8.3 to 1 GBP it was not that expensive i had a basket of assorted bread a main with a side and 2 drinks just under £30 well worth it!
Great food and service. I would recommend the ravioli with truffles. Pizza iz also great. Prices are moderately expensive but still affordable.

After going to it’s sister restaurants Gradska Kavana Arsenal and Panorama we decided to try Dubravka. Started with Seafood tagliatelle followed by Veal medallions in chanterelle sauce. Both excellent. The service we received was outstanding. A special thanks to Anita for making our evening so special.

We came twice once for dinner and once for breakfast as it was right by our hotel. The night service was dismal with young waiters seemingly not knowing what to do while the morning waiters were mature adults and friendly. I would suggest this place for breakfast.

Delightful outdoor breakfast with a view. I had a short period of time to eat, and they staff was able to accommodate that and still provide me with an excellent meal. I just wish I could have lingered there longer.
Lovely views. Nice food and friendly staff. Enjoyed a family dinner. Visited in October. Can get a bit cold outside even with heaters.
Me and my wife ate here every day that we was in Dubrovnik, the food was always nice and we had a variety of meals and the service was great. Highly recommend

Came to this restaurant twice, conveniently located just outside Old Town near the bus stops and Amerling Fountain where the tour guides wait. 
Truffle ravioli was delicious! 
Staff were very pleasant and when a very heavy Thunder & lightening storm came in from the sea, the waiter took us inside and made us feel looked after and safe. 
I was also quite partial to the coffee with whipped cream whilst taking in the view.

Had a fantastic meal . The service was excellent 
Very polite and welcoming . Lovely ambience 
Will highly recommend.
Conveniently located near the bus stop

We spent a leisurely cocktail and wine fuelled lunch here enjoying the incredible setting and delicious food. The fish platter is perfect, a lovely selection of local fish including fabulous perfectly cooked squid. Others had pizza which they highly rated. There is an extensive cocktail list, we managed to sample 10 different ones between us, all were delicious but I particularly enjoyed the Dubrovnik Mule. The staff are friendly and attentive and we were not rushed and allowed to sit and enjoy the surroundings and atmosphere.
Very nice restaurant...good view...the food is very good!! Try the raviolis and lasagna...amazing !!! Service is top notch👌 I highly recommend

Great spot. We started with drinks and wound up eating lunch it was so pleasant. The scenery was great as was the food. We had pizza and tomato soup, but delicious. They did not rush us at all. Server was great.

We were initially a bit concerned that the food and hospitality might not match the view but that was certainly not the case. Varied menu and all dishes ordered were great. We didn’t have a booking but waited 10 minutes or so and were shown to a great table right on the wall overlooking the bay. Steak was a particular favourite.
Had our first dinner here while visiting Dubrovnik and it did not disappoint. Great service and the food was excellent.

Had a lovely light lunch here on one of our first days in Dubrovnik.

Fantastic location, just outside the old city walls and overlooking the Adriatic and the kayaking beach. 

Food and service were very good. Recommended to book if going in an evening, as it always looked full throughout the evenings.

Price was quite expensive as expected but not outrageously so and you get a discount with the Dubrovnik Card!

The food and cocktails here were very nice with a gorgeous evening view of the city walls/bay. This was my least favourite restaurant of the Nautika chain in Dubrovnik as compared to the other 2 the service wasn’t quite as good but I’d say the food was. I’d book it you want to go here, we were lucky as walk ins we got a table next to the city walls but if you want an ocean view you’d need to book.

We first called in for cocktails late in the evening. The staff were very friendly and accommodating, the weather had turned cool and they provided heaters and blankets. The cocktails were delicious. We decided to go back the following day for dinner and we were not disappointed. Same friendly service and the best meal we had had all week. The food was so delicious we also returned the following evening and had another delicious meal. The restaurant is very handy for the bus terminus if you are staying outside the city.
The most fabulous pasta. Ravioli and truffles, to die for. Perfect setting to end our holiday . Lunch outside before we go to the airport. A must on your trip . Staff are very helpful.
We are here last night we have eaten here before on a previous visit to Dubrovnik. Food was excellent the service was great I am coeliac

We ate on the terrace overlooking the city walls and old Fort, stunning and very special views. The waiting staff were excellent. Sometimes in resturaunts in busy scenic/tourist location the food may not be great, I am happy to say this was not the case at this resturaunt. I had seafood linguine and my partner chose what he describes as one of the best pizzas he has ever had (the bolognese). We had 2 mains 2 sides 3 cocktails and water for under 60euro including tip which we found to great value given the quality of the food, service and location.

After a wonderful day on Lokrum island I decided to go this amazing place for lunch and it exceeded everything that I hoped for . 
 I managed to get a table overlooking the cost and the fort which was beautiful . The staff were very friendly and the food was amazing . 

I opted for the the veal cheeks with chard and vegetables . It was simply devine .The veal was tender and the vegetables were amazing . This was accompanied by a fantastic apple and melon cocktail . 

If you are looking for a fantastic meal with an amazing view then this is the place for you .

This restaurant is in the most beautiful location. The food is excellent but the best thing about this restaurant is the quality of the staff. The service is amazing. The staff are knowledgeable, friendly, polite and highly skilled. The excellent service makes the whole experience feel like a very special and memorable occasion. we have visited this restaurant many times and can't wait to return. Thanks to all the staff.

Everything you’d wish you could find within the they city walls. After several disappointing dinners in the old city walls, we stopped here just in front of the Pile Gate. Great seafood, top notch service and a wonderful view of the walls. Decent value too.

Got a 10% discount from Panorama and decided to try out the food since we enjoyed the meal there and it was a sister restaurant. My partner and I both got sea bass and it was absolutely delicious. We were still thinking about it the next day. Decided to go here again on our last night and the food did not disappoint. Would highly recommend and worth the money!
What a top service!! It's very rare to find such pleasant / friendly waiters. And what a scenic view from the terrace. And the seafood / fish plate was delicious! Highly recommend.

By far the best evening meal we had whilst in Dubrovnik, we both had different styles of steak with gratin potatoes, very very nice full of flavour! Thank you for a lovely meal, we will definitely be back next time we visit the city!
A nice pace to eat by the water and view of the Walls of the Old City. Food was good, prices were reasonable, service was great.

Had wonderful Seafood Tagliatelle with local wine and as a happy customer came back for two other meals. Food was always fresh and tasty, best I’ve had in Croatia so far! Also nice and friendly service, even when it’s busy (and it often is). Fantastic views both day and night :)

We stayed inside the walls but wanted to go outside for a bit so we chose this place because of the location just outside the Pile Gate and good people watching. We had martinis and calamari in the early evening. Ocean view .
Nice view and tasty food. Very big location with a lot of tables. The service was nice and the food was very tasty. Prices a bit high. All in all, it was a very successful lunch.

Having felt so deflated by the poor food in Croatia, we are staying in Lapad but are coming into Dubrovnik and old town recently, we decided to chance this restaurant, and we’re glad we did. Fantastic food, particularly the spaghetti bolognese (the pasta tasted so fresh!), the staff were incredible, friendly and very efficient and prices reasonable enough! Definitely recommend.

I would suggest either arriving early or booking a table. We arrived at 6 and got a table instantly however there was a large queue around 8. Outstanding hospitality by the staff and the food was delicious. I would highly recommend trying the cocktails. Good options for vegetarians, which is hard to come by in Croatia. I would definitely return if in the area again. Beautiful views of the Old Town walls.
Excellent location in old town Dubrovnik, amazing sea views, great food and service and considering the prime spot not overpriced.

Due to its good location and great view of Fortress Lovrijenac just outside the old city entrance, the restaurant is quite popular. Due to this we had to wait 30 minutes to get seated, but this is understandable, so we would advise to book a table ahead of time. 

This is a more expensive higher-end restaurant. We ordered an expensive dish on the menu mistakenly assuming it would be a 2 person portion because of the price.

 Having also eaten all the complimentary bread, we were still hungry after and mentioned this to the waiter when wanting to pay the bill. We had a lovely surprise when the manager came over and was so nice to us and offered a complimentary meal. We were blown away how nice the staff are. 

The food was great: we had fish soup (mixed feelings), seafood platter and the complimentary lamb with amazing sauce! (Gordon Ramsay would be proud)

I would definitely recommend this restaurant, but perhaps not if you are on a tighter budget.

Thank you Dubrovka!

We simply love this restaurant. Dinners here have a special vibe, the staff is very friendly and the food is delicious. From truffles raviolli to steaks or seafood everything is perfect, not to mention their home apple pie which is our favourite! Would recommend their house gin tonic, it was amazing. 
Thank you for our best dinners in Dubrovnik !

We had the best table with a beautiful view! The food is so delicious but the staff is the most important there.
Our waiter Niksa is also the manager and he was very helpfull and polite. Thank you Niksa for the recommendation of homemade cakes :-).
This restaurant is happy to have this guy!

Extremly friendly waiter, good food close to old town with a good view. 
Had fish carpaccio and the chef’s steak, was not disappointed.

I guess people come here for the view and atmosphere but not the food. Compared to other restaurants we visited in Croatia, the food here was below average. The cold seafood platter for starter was so so. It wasn’t particularly fresh or generous portion. My husband ordered grilled squid for main, and he got 4 tiny squid. It’s kind of a joke considering I got like 10 big squid at another restaurant in town. I ordered mussels and the sauce was kind of plain. We didn’t like the food too much so we decided to have gelato in the old town which was much better. The view was very nice if that’s what you’re looking for.

10+ for everything! 😊 Probably one of the best food we ever had, both main dishes and desserts 🤤

Highly recommended!

We came here for breakfast and had reserved 4 days in advance and received a table on the wall edge over looking the view. They ask you to confirm your reservation the day before via email. 

The breakfast menu is not vast and has more ‘set meal/ menu’ with a hot drink, orange juice, bread basket fruit bowl and a choice of omelette or egg. The menu could really do with some more options and choice - even a choice of different ingredient in the omelette. Orange juice glass was tiny and coffee didn’t taste good. The menu is the same as what you see online on their website. 

You can still get the same view in the public area and space next to the restaurant. The location is just outside the old city close to the taxi ranks. 

The service was really unfriendly and unwelcoming we had a gentleman serve us who was just so miserable and made us feel so unwelcome and service was slow. 

We paid around 180 kuna for the 2 ‘set’ breakfasts. Happy with the view but wouldn’t recommend or return. 

We were also told that we should of received a 10% off voucher with our bill for the other restaurants in the ‘Nautika’ group which we did not. We later went to Panorama restaurant (which is the same owner/ company) where we would of been able to use this discount. 

Check out my Instagram for some videos of our meal and other Croatia highlights. @lucyamberparsons
We were recommended by our tour guide to have breakfast at this restaurant. Great recommendation, food was great, staff really friendly, and the view is amazing. Worh every penny!
We were a group of seven. Everyone enjoyed their meals. I had a sea bass dish that was simply cooked and delicious.

The restaurant is a little bit expensive but the food is very very good. The location is ambiance is great. The service was good also. We got the pesto salmon pasta and a chicken dish and both were excellent.

The food was really nice. 
I recommend you to go there for dinner, the view is amazing.
